Asia Pacific Journal of Management, 29(4), 1131\u20131142. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1007\/s10490-011-9263-7; https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606; doi:10.22267\/rtend.202101.134","identifier":"https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.22267\/rtend.202101.134","title":"Innovation barriers in SMES: an approximation through a systematic review of literature ; Barreras de innovaci\u00f3n en PYMES: una aproximaci\u00f3n a trav\u00e9s de una revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica de literatura ; Barreiras de inova\u00e7\u00e3o nas PME: uma aproxima\u00e7\u00e3o atrav\u00e9s de uma revis\u00e3o sistem\u00e1tica da literatura","paper_abstract":"Innovation is a key factor in the competitiveness of countries and companies. Small and medium-sized companies that do not adopt innovation as part oftheir core strategy run the risk of not being competitive due to falling behind with obsolete products and processes. Innovative companies are decisive for adynamic and competitive economy. The purpose of this research is to identify the different barriers that affect the performance of the innovation process in small and medium-sized enterprises \u2013 PYMES. To analyze the innovation barriers that PYMES face, a review of the existing literature in different parts of the world, including Colombia, was carried out. The importance of this study derives from the fact that very few studies have explored the question of the factors that limit the innovation processes of PYMES, being a topic that offers guidance for future research in a field that is still emerging. ; La innovaci\u00f3n es un factor clave en la competitividad de los pa\u00edses y las empresas. Las peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas que no adoptan la innovaci\u00f3n dentro de su estrategia central corren el riesgo de no ser competitivas debido a quedarse rezagadas con productos y procesos obsoletos. Las empresas innovadoras son determinantes para una econom\u00eda din\u00e1mica y competitiva. El prop\u00f3sito de esta investigaci\u00f3n es identificar las diferentes barreras que afectan el desempe\u00f1odel proceso de innovaci\u00f3n en las peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas - PYMES. Para analizar las barreras de innovaci\u00f3n a las que se enfrentan las PYMES, se realiz\u00f3 una revisi\u00f3n de la literatura existente en diferentes lugares del mundo, incluyendo a Colombia. La importancia de este estudio se deriva del hecho de que muy pocos estudios han explorado la cuesti\u00f3n de los factores que limitan los procesos de innovaci\u00f3n de las PYMES, siendo un tema que ofrece orientaci\u00f3n para futuras investigaciones en un campo que a\u00fan est\u00e1 en emergiendo. ; A inova\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e9 um fator chave na competitividade de pa\u00edses e empresas. As pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas que n\u00e3o adotam a inova\u00e7\u00e3o como parte de suaestrat\u00e9gia principal correm o risco de n\u00e3o serem competitivas devido ao atraso nos produtos e processos obsoletos. Empresas inovadoras s\u00e3o decisivas parauma economia din\u00e2mica e competitiva. O objetivo desta pesquisa \u00e9 identificar as diferentes barreiras que afetam o desempenho do processo de inova\u00e7\u00e3o em pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas - PME. Para analisar as barreiras \u00e0 inova\u00e7\u00e3oenfrentadas pelas PMEs, foi realizada uma revis\u00e3o da literatura existente em diferentes partes do mundo, incluindo a Col\u00f4mbia. A import\u00e2ncia deste estudo deriva do fato de pouqu\u00edssimos estudos explorarem a quest\u00e3o dos fatores que limitam os processos de inova\u00e7\u00e3o das PMEs, sendo um t\u00f3pico que oferece orienta\u00e7\u00e3o para futuras pesquisas em um campo ainda em desenvolvimento.","published_in":"Tendencias; Vol. 21 N\u00fam. 1 (2020): Vol. XXI No. 1 Primer Semestre Enero - Junio 2020; 221-237 ; Tendencias; v. 21 n. 1 (2020): Vol. XXI N\u00ba 1 Primeiro Semestre Janeiro - Junho 2020; 221-237 ; Tendencias; Vol 21 No 1 (2020): Vol. XXI No. 1 First Semester January - June 2020; 221-237 ; 2539-0554 ; 0124-8693","year":"2020-06-30","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Benavides Pupiales, Luis Eduardo; Bola\u00f1os Delgado, Sandra Luc\u00eda","link":"https:\/\/revistas.udenar.edu.co\/index.php\/rtend\/article\/view\/5606","oa_state":"1","url":"144c1c9fd62ac002eb147cea2cc865b12b80a8439f28094888506d11220862fb","relevance":76,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"1cc665d9aab8883ab4a13e85ebdd2984be0407c2de33370d4eddd2b1c8e5d086","relation":"http:\/\/www.revistacientifica.uem.mz\/index.php\/BIO\/article\/view\/146\/118; http:\/\/www.revistacientifica.uem.mz\/index.php\/BIO\/article\/view\/146","identifier":"http:\/\/www.revistacientifica.uem.mz\/index.php\/BIO\/article\/view\/146","title":"APLICABILIDADE DO MARKETING DIGITAL COMO MEIO DE PROMO\u00c7\u00c3O DO MARKETING SOCIAL EM MEIO \u00c0 PANDEMIA DA COVID-19 NO CONTEXTO MO\u00c7AMBICANO","paper_abstract":"O marketing \u00e9 uma ferramenta contributiva para a notabilidade de produtos e servi\u00e7os. Os avan\u00e7os tecnol\u00f3gicos permitiram que o marketing migrasse para o digital permitindo a abrang\u00eancia e aproxima\u00e7\u00e3o entre consumidores e vendedores de forma f\u00e1cil, r\u00e1pida e directa. O presente estudo versa sobre a Aplicabilidade do Marketing Digital Como Meio de Promo\u00e7\u00e3o do Marketing Social Em Meio a Pandemia da COVID -19, atrav\u00e9s duma reflex\u00e3o focalizada de Mo\u00e7ambique. Em termos metodol\u00f3gicos, a pesquisa foi orientada no paradigma qualitativo com cunho explorat\u00f3rio, com recurso a pesquisa bibliogr\u00e1fica sobre as teorias de marketing social e digital. Os resultados deste estudo estabelecem que a aplicabilidade do marketing digital, n\u00e3o apenas em Mo\u00e7ambique, como no mundo, num momento em que as tecnologias de informa\u00e7\u00e3o e comunica\u00e7\u00e3o desempenham o papel fulcral para a sustentabilidade de todos sectores, evitando que a crise ganhe o seu espa\u00e7o. A viola\u00e7\u00e3o do Decreto Presidencial \u00e9 uma realidade em Mo\u00e7ambique, tal como relatam as equipes multissectoriais envolvidas no processo de controlo das medidas de preven\u00e7\u00e3o ao v\u00edrus, onde \u00e9 comum o encontro de aglomera\u00e7\u00e3o de pessoas, mau uso de m\u00e1scaras, enchentes nas paragens e dentro dos autocarros, entre outras viola\u00e7\u00f5es. A efectiva\u00e7\u00e3o do marketing social tem impactos relevantes sobre a sociedade, que a partir dos apelos dados as pessoas mudam seu comportamento e acatam rigorosamente os apelos contidos nas campanhas. Diante da problem\u00e1tica referente ao seguimento das medidas de preven\u00e7\u00e3o ao v\u00edrus, o Estado real\u00e7a a continuidade de ac\u00e7\u00f5es que consciencializem os cidad\u00e3os a pautarem pela mudan\u00e7a social.","published_in":"Revista Cient\u00edfica da UEM: S\u00e9rie Ci\u00eancias Biom\u00e9dicas e Sa\u00fade P\u00fablica; 2020: Edi\u00e7\u00e3o Especial sobre COVID-19","year":"2020-07-15","subject_orig":"Consciencializa\u00e7\u00e3o; mudan\u00e7a social; Tecnologias de informa\u00e7\u00e3o e comunica\u00e7\u00e3o","subject":"Consciencializa\u00e7\u00e3o; mudan\u00e7a social; Tecnologias de informa\u00e7\u00e3o e comunica\u00e7\u00e3o","authors":"vasco, Sofia Ahamad de Jany","link":"http:\/\/www.revistacientifica.uem.mz\/index.php\/BIO\/article\/view\/146","oa_state":"1","url":"1cc665d9aab8883ab4a13e85ebdd2984be0407c2de33370d4eddd2b1c8e5d086","relevance":75,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"ea3d047a340049adeb30591d8573aaf3b0623d3dd17440a6cb53515be5d54d03","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7524011; (Revista) ISSN 0719-1014","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7524011","title":"Consideraciones sobre poblaci\u00f3n excedente, trabajo y pobreza: el caso de los cirujas","paper_abstract":"En diferentes lugares del mundo, en ciudades de tama\u00f1o mediano y grande, existen conjuntos relativamente numerosos de individuos y familias que organizan sus vidas alrededor de la basura. En ese contexto, este art\u00edculo, teniendo como foco el trabajo del \u201cciruja\u201d, propone realizar algunas consideraciones, rescatando su comprensi\u00f3n como poblaci\u00f3n excedente, pero que se inserta, a trav\u00e9s de la propia actividad, en la l\u00f3gica de acumulaci\u00f3n capitalista. Es necesario situar la actividad en el contexto de las relaciones sociales que se establecen en el interior del circuito econ\u00f3mico que gira en torno del reciclaje de la basura. De hecho, a pesar de su precariedad, la actividad de los cirujas constituye el primer eslab\u00f3n del circuito econ\u00f3mico que gira en torno del reciclaje, o sea, el extremo informal que abastece materia prima y materiales para su reutilizaci\u00f3n a la industria de reciclaje, pasando por los dep\u00f3sitos de compraventa en el proceso de comercializaci\u00f3n de los materiales, mecanismo por el cual se extrae el trabajo excedente de los cirujas. ; In different places around the world, cities of medium and large size show sets relatively extense of human being and families that organize their lives by means of garbage. In this context, this essay focusing on the work of picker of paper that proposes to carry some considerations out rescuing the comprehension while exceed population, but inserted through its own activity, at capitalist accumulation logic. It starts with the premise that is essential to situate the activity in the context of social relations that estabilishe itself within the economic circuit that revolves around recycling rubbish. As a matter of fact, even in its precariousness, the activity of pickers is the first link in the economic circuit that revolves around for industry of recycling. It means, the informal extreme that provides raw material and materials for reusing, through the intermediaries in the process of marketing of materials, mechanism by which extract the surplus labor from the pickers.","published_in":"Contextos: Estudios de humanidades y ciencias sociales, ISSN 0719-1014, N\u00ba. 46, 2020","year":"2020","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Escurra, Mar\u00eda Fernanda","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7524011","oa_state":"2","url":"ea3d047a340049adeb30591d8573aaf3b0623d3dd17440a6cb53515be5d54d03","relevance":74,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"4c0e41c0afa62c7f08cb2104aba0bf006a8c3eef0db9927b7c984f1524421d89","relation":"https:\/\/journal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jim\/article\/view\/9163\/pdf; https:\/\/journal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jim\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/9163\/2320; https:\/\/journal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jim\/article\/view\/9163","identifier":"https:\/\/journal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jim\/article\/view\/9163","title":"Pengaruh Promosi Penjualan dan Celebrity Endorser terhadap Niat Beli Fashion Brand Lokal Giyomi pada Generasi Y dan Z","paper_abstract":"Marketing strategies change as technology develops. Marketers are demanded to be more creative in continuing to market their products so they will not be outdone by the times, fashion products are no exception. Giyomi is a local fashion brand that utilizes marketing with digital marketing using celebrity endorsers and offline marketing using sales promotions by holding bazaar tours and giving discounts for its products. however, this is still lacking interest among Y and Z generations because these generations prefer to use foreign brands such as ZARA and H&M. This research design to determine the effect of sales promotion and celebrity endorser on purchasing intentions on local fashion brands Y and Z generations (Study on the Giyomi brand). The sampling technique of this research used judgmental sampling and snowball sampling. The target population is generation Y and Z with criteria that use Instagram social media, of course, with a personal account that has followed Giyomi's Instagram account and knows Giyomi's promotion and celebrity endorser contained on Instagram social media. The number of samples of this study was 110 people. The results of this study indicate there is a significant positive influence between sales promotion and celebrity endorsers on purchasing intentions on local fashion brands Y and Z generations.","published_in":"Jurnal Ilmu Manajemen; Vol 8, No 4 (2020) ; 2549-192X","year":"2020-08-05","subject_orig":"brand local; celebrity endorser; purchase intentions; sales promotions","subject":"brand local; celebrity endorser; purchase intentions; sales promotions","authors":"Nugroho, Dicky Adi; Iriani, Sri Setyo","link":"https:\/\/journal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jim\/article\/view\/9163","oa_state":"1","url":"4c0e41c0afa62c7f08cb2104aba0bf006a8c3eef0db9927b7c984f1524421d89","relevance":73,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"0ea6d8b86440f1634fda9723149ac2b6ebc037f4d4a652fdac1aae9743bb2fe5","relation":"http:\/\/civilejournal.org\/index.php\/cej\/article\/view\/2171\/pdf; http:\/\/civilejournal.org\/index.php\/cej\/article\/view\/2171; doi:10.28991\/cej-2020-03091532","identifier":"http:\/\/civilejournal.org\/index.php\/cej\/article\/view\/2171; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.28991\/cej-2020-03091532","title":"Sustainable Solutions in the Hospitality Industry and Competitiveness Context of \u201cGreen Hotels\u201d","paper_abstract":"This interdisciplinary paper researches the importance of sustainable hotel engineering and organisation of facilities for the purposes of realisation of a sustainable and responsible hospitality facility business. Considered through the interdisciplinary aspect, at the same time, it represents a research goal with the focus on the segment of youth tourists, who, as existing consumers of low-budget expenditure, are turning into DINKY, as well as the segment of conscious adult consumers in the future. The paper, through a questionnaire, researches the perception of the importance of resource management, with the implementation of innovative technologies by youth tourists\u2019 related attitudes and experiences. The methodology is based predominantly on qualitative research methods and includes analysis and conceptual methodology and survey research methods of youth tourists\u2019 attitudes. The quantitative research was processed by using the statistical methodology combined with techniques of creative thinking formation. The results point to the predominance of importance in which over 90% of respondents confirm the importance of sustainable initiatives and resource management with the following rank: food, water, energy, and waste management. Further analysis implies an opposite attitude where only 52.9% of participants would be willing to pay higher prices for sustainable solutions in hotels. The results and recommendations contribute to knowledge and ideas by recognizing competitiveness of hotels, which design and engineer the business system and operations with support of sustainable technologies in an interdisciplinary way. The paper also contributes to the comprehension of combined and successfully communicated economic and marketing values of sustainable innovations supported by digital technologies.","published_in":"Civil Engineering Journal; Vol 6, No 6 (2020): June; 1104-1113 ; 2476-3055 ; 2676-6957","year":"2020-06-01","subject_orig":"Sustainability; Resources; Architecture and Design; Hospitality Industry; Youth Tourism Segment","subject":"Sustainability; Resources; Architecture and Design; Hospitality Industry; Youth Tourism Segment","authors":"Flori\u010di\u0107, Tamara","link":"http:\/\/civilejournal.org\/index.php\/cej\/article\/view\/2171","oa_state":"1","url":"0ea6d8b86440f1634fda9723149ac2b6ebc037f4d4a652fdac1aae9743bb2fe5","relevance":72,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"ae35c7c4f87f02c1ad736eb37e25ac929406a428d962a796c3041995272e4832","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22599; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2015.v4.i2.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22599; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2015.v4.i2.01","title":"Editorial","paper_abstract":"Con este n\u00famero completamos el tercer a\u00f1o completo de vida de la revista Commons. Comparative Perspectives on Social Movements: Political Opportunities, Mobilizing Structures, and Cultural Framings, 261-274.; https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67285; doi:10.5209\/esmp.67285","identifier":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67285; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5209\/esmp.67285","title":"2018 Presidential elections in Colombia: analysis of the news coverage of Caracol and RCN ; Las elecciones presidenciales del 2018 en Colombia: an\u00e1lisis del cubrimiento noticioso de los noticieros de Caracol y RCN","paper_abstract":"The elections of 2018 in Colombia took place in the middle of a process of political transition in the post-conflict context where the continuity of peace agreements and the tension over new thematic agendas were at stake. This implied a scenario of uncertainty that was not alien to that also affected the media in the way in which they covered the electoral process. This article shows the results of the analysis made to 586 news of Caracol Noticias and Noticias RCN by the Media Observatory of the Universidad de la Sabana in partnership with the Electoral Observation Mission. The analysis shows a transformation in the thematic agenda, the persistence of polarization, the gender imbalance and the coexistence of traditional and new journalistic practices, surrounded by a scenario of political uncertainty that framed the electoral process. ; Las elecciones del 2018 en Colombia se dieron en medio de un proceso de transici\u00f3n pol\u00edtica en el marco del posconflicto donde estaba en juego la continuidad de los acuerdos de paz y la tensi\u00f3n por nuevas agendas tem\u00e1ticas. Esto implic\u00f3 un escenario de incertidumbre que no fue ajeno a los medios de comunicaci\u00f3n e incidi\u00f3 en la forma en como cubrieron el proceso electoral. Este articulo muestra los resultados del an\u00e1lisis realizado a 586 noticias de Caracol Noticias y Noticias RCN por parte del Observatorio de Medios de la Universidad de la Sabana en alianza con la Misi\u00f3n de Observaci\u00f3n Electoral. El an\u00e1lisis evidencia una transformaci\u00f3n en la agenda tem\u00e1tica, la persistencia de la polarizaci\u00f3n, el desequilibrio de g\u00e9nero y la coexistencia de pr\u00e1cticas period\u00edsticas tradicionales y nuevas, en medio del escenario de incertidumbre pol\u00edtica que enmarco el proceso electoral.","published_in":"Estudios sobre el Mensaje Period\u00edstico; Vol. 26 N\u00fam. 1 (2020); 47-57 ; 1988-2696 ; 1134-1629","year":"2020-01-16","subject_orig":"Elections; public opinion; informational balance; agenda setting; media coverage; Elecciones; opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica; equilibrio informativo; cubrimiento medi\u00e1tico","subject":"Elections; public opinion; informational balance; agenda setting; media coverage; Elecciones; opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica; equilibrio informativo; cubrimiento medi\u00e1tico","authors":"C\u00e1rdenas Ruiz, Juan David","link":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67285","oa_state":"1","url":"15b14f9811e731d6067fb306991a4e537ebc0b82576f79d0cb6f57e26bc28f58","relevance":70,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"e3f4c8ee8445f8948225cfb6c98df32722eadb09fa921f1e7361eb8ea24b30bf","relation":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67286\/4564456552854; Albert Rivera se reivindica como el candidato de los consensos (5 de julio de 2015). Revista de Estudios Literarios, Issue 37.; https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67286; doi:10.5209\/esmp.67286","identifier":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67286; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5209\/esmp.67286","title":"Persuasive communication in Politics as a Fundamental Element in the Success of New Political Parties in Spain: Issuer, Message and Context. The case of Podemos and Ciudadanos ; La comunicaci\u00f3n persuasiva en pol\u00edtica como elemento fundamental en el \u00e9xito de nuevas formaciones pol\u00edticas en Espa\u00f1a: emisor, mensaje y contexto. Caso Podemos y Ciudadanos","paper_abstract":"The communication is a key element in any electoral process, which efficiency is determined by variables as the characteristics socio-demographic of the voters, the power of the issuer of the political message, the channel chosen for the diffusion of the political speeches or the economic environment where the election campaign takes place. Following this argument, the present article will focus on describing thecontent of the political messages used in Spain during December 2015. The reason is that this period coincides with the development of the campaign electoral that ended on December 20 with the celebration of a general elections. Specifically, the article analyzes the persuasive language used for two new political forms that could determinated the electoral results, not being possible to reach the sufficient majority to form government. The consequence was the celebration of a new choices on June 26, 2016. These political forms are \u00abCiudadanos\u00bb and \u00abPodemos\u00bb. There is very prominent the importance of this study since immediately after the presence of these two political forces, the political Spanish situation has changed in the whole nation. Both political forms and his messages have managed to catch the attention of thousands of citizens and there has existed a clear change of intention of vote of the traditional parties. The study of the persuasive message of Podemos and Ciudadanos is very important to understand the vote in Spain today. ; La comunicaci\u00f3n es un elemento clave en la captaci\u00f3n de votos en cualquier proceso electoral, cuya efectividad se ve condicionada por variables como las caracter\u00edsticas sociodemogr\u00e1ficas del receptor, el poder del emisor, el canal elegido para su difusi\u00f3n o el entorno econ\u00f3mico donde se desarrolle el discurso. En este contexto el estudio del lenguaje persuasivo cobra una especial relevancia, puesto que de su uso depender\u00e1, en muchos casos, que la intenci\u00f3n con la que se lanza el mensaje coincida con los resultados esperados. Es por ello, que se hace necesario profundizar en el conocimiento de los elementos del mensaje de persuasi\u00f3n en pol\u00edtica que determinan la intencionalidad del voto y sus efectos sobre los resultados electorales. M\u00e1s concretamente, en el presente art\u00edculo se propone un an\u00e1lisis del contenido persuasivo de los mensajes utilizados en Espa\u00f1a durante el mes de diciembre de 2015, periodo que coincide con la campa\u00f1a electoral previa a los comicios celebrados el 20 de diciembre de ese mismo a\u00f1o, por dos nuevas formas pol\u00edticas que surgen de dos idearios diferenciados: Ciudadanos y Podemos, como una de las causas de los resultados electorales obtenidos en los comicios celebrados en dicha fecha y que supusieron la desestabilizaci\u00f3n del parlamento espa\u00f1ol, al no ser posible alcanzar la mayor\u00eda suficiente para formar gobierno y cuya consecuencia fue la celebraci\u00f3n de unas nuevas elecciones el 26 de junio de 2016. Es muy destacable la importancia de este estudio puesto que, a ra\u00edz de la presencia de estas dos fuerzas pol\u00edticas, el panorama pol\u00edtico espa\u00f1ol ha cambiado en toda la naci\u00f3n. Los dos partidos y sus mensajes han logrado captar la atenci\u00f3n de miles de ciudadanos y ha existido un cambio claro de intenci\u00f3n de voto de los partidos tradicionales. Nike 'Dream Crazier' 2019 as a feminist campaign at Instagram ; \u00c9tica y deontolog\u00eda en publicidad. Nike 'Dream Crazier' 2019 como campa\u00f1a feminista en Instagram","paper_abstract":"This research studies the Nike Dream Crazier 2019 campaign, on Instagram, in the first month of its release. A double methodology is established: a longitudinal bibliographical exploration, which reflects on ethics and deontology, on sexist advertising, and the main investigations that define the phenomenon; and a correlational inquiry, which measures virality on Instagram, through the hashtag #DreamCrazier and the 10 most influential users, according to the Keyhole software. The results show that influencers are unknown women, who use a simple language, loaded with hashtags and emojis, which reduce the language barrier. They become the paradigm of cultural produsage, being users of the brand and producing positive advertising contents that spread throughout the world. ; Esta investigaci\u00f3n estudia la campa\u00f1a Nike Dream Crazier 2019, en Instagram, en el primer mes de lanzamiento. Se establece una metodolog\u00eda doble: exploraci\u00f3n bibliogr\u00e1fica longitudinal, que reflexiona sobre \u00e9tica y deontolog\u00eda, en publicidad sexista, y las principales investigaciones que definen el fen\u00f3meno; e indagaci\u00f3n correlacional, que mide la viralidad en Instagram, a trav\u00e9s del hashtag #DreamCrazier y los 10 usuarios m\u00e1s influyentes, seg\u00fan el software Keyhole. Los resultados muestran que las influencers son mujeres desconocidas, que emplean un lenguaje sencillo, cargado de hashtags y emojis, que reducen la barrera idiom\u00e1tica. Se convierten en paradigma del produsage cultural, siendo usuarias de la marca y produciendo contenidos publicitarios positivos que expanden por todo el mundo.","published_in":"Comunicaci\u00f3n y G\u00e9nero; Vol 3 No 1 (2020); 3-15 ; Comunicaci\u00f3n y G\u00e9nero; Vol. 3 N\u00fam. 1 (2020); 3-15 ; 2605-1982","year":"2020-01-30","subject_orig":"Advertising; ethics; Instagram; hashtags; female sport; Publicidad; \u00e9tica; deporte femenino","subject":"Advertising; ethics; Instagram; hashtags; female sport; Publicidad; \u00e9tica; deporte femenino","authors":"Padilla Castillo, Graciela; Presol Herrero, \u00c1frica","link":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/CGEN\/article\/view\/63975","oa_state":"1","url":"c4c062aea74fdc11b124bf90f2d9ef892bff7360efdd77302259163e0d91ae85","relevance":68,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"2e1d43a3fcb9dffcf531b4fcad87cb945e0ab84e3cc1385ae6e04a06cff244e5","relation":"https:\/\/ojs.bilpublishing.com\/index.php\/jbar\/article\/view\/1020\/pdf; https:\/\/ojs.bilpublishing.com\/index.php\/jbar\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/1020\/288; https:\/\/ojs.bilpublishing.com\/index.php\/jbar\/article\/view\/1020; doi:10.30564\/jbar.v1i3.1020","identifier":"https:\/\/ojs.bilpublishing.com\/index.php\/jbar\/article\/view\/1020; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.30564\/jbar.v1i3.1020","title":"Comparative Analysis of DMO Website Features: A Case Study of Three Asian Tourism Destinations","paper_abstract":"In the digital era, more and more people tend to look for travel-related information on the Internet. Hence, destination marketing organization (DMO) websites can play a decisive role in affecting people\u2019s destination choices. Based on the study of Pai, Xia, and Wang, Macao\u2019s DMO website received the lowest score in the effectiveness when compared to the other four tourism destinations: Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, and Thailand. This paper aimed to carry out a comparative analysis on the functionality among three DMO websites in Asia. Each website was examined in great detail, and the features were categorized according to a well-established conceptual framework pioneered by Li and Wang. Consequently, the results of this study gave useful information and new insights to destination marketing managers in terms of gap analysis and the development of new features for their websites. The results of this research could be used as benchmarking purposes in regards to website functionality. In addition, DMO websites in western countries, such as Canada, were also examined for a better understanding of the comprehensiveness of the available website functionality aimed for prospective visitors. Business and managerial implications were also discussed.","published_in":"Journal of Business Administration Research; Vol 3, No 1 (2020) ; 2630-5194","year":"2020-01-20","subject_orig":"DMO; Destination marketing; Website evaluation; Content analysis; Online communication","subject":"DMO; Destination marketing; Website evaluation; Content analysis; Online communication","authors":"Chek, Harry Hou In; Lei, Simon Kong","link":"https:\/\/ojs.bilpublishing.com\/index.php\/jbar\/article\/view\/1020","oa_state":"1","url":"2e1d43a3fcb9dffcf531b4fcad87cb945e0ab84e3cc1385ae6e04a06cff244e5","relevance":67,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"03caf4d1d6f05b74b68711b37dd34d4b7d1ac2fce7d4e7c239f8c244300d2636","relation":"http:\/\/jurnal.unpad.ac.id\/prosiding\/article\/view\/25361\/pdf; http:\/\/jurnal.unpad.ac.id\/prosiding\/article\/view\/25361; doi:10.24198\/jppm.v6i3.25361","identifier":"http:\/\/jurnal.unpad.ac.id\/prosiding\/article\/view\/25361; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.24198\/jppm.v6i3.25361","title":"PELATIHAN PEMBUATAN WEBSITE UNTUK PELAKU INDUSTRI KERAMIK DI KABUPATEN PURWAKARTA","paper_abstract":"Kegiatan industri keramik di Purwakarta mengalami pasang dan surut dari waktu ke waktu. Beberapa puluh tahun yang lalu pernah mengalami masa pertumbuhan yang pesat, namun saat ini mengalami masa surut. Surutnya industri tersebut disebabkan beberapa hal seperti kalah bersaing dengan produk China, strategi pemasaran yang kurang bervariasi dan konvensional dan masalah bahan baku. Salah satu solusi atas masalah pemasaran adalah pemasaran melalui media sosial, yang dikenal dengan Online Marketing.Saat ini para pelaku industri belum mengenal dengan baik online marketing dan website, sehingga perlu diberikan pelatihan pembuatan website dan pemasaran online. Oleh karena itu tujuan pelatihan ini adalah untuk memberikan pengetahuan dan ketrampilan dalam pemasaran online, sehingga volume penjualan dapat ditingkatkan dan menjangkau konsumen yang lebih luas.Kegiatan pelatihan dikemas dengan judul \u201cPelatihan Pembuatan Website untuk Pelaku Industri Keramik di Kabupaten Purwakarta.\u201d Materi pelatihan meliputi pengetahuan dasar online marketing, tata cara pemasaran melalui media sosial, pengemasan produk dalam bentuk digital dan penyajian melalui media sosial. Hasil pelatihan menunjukkan adanya perubahan pada peserta. Pertama, adanya peningkatan pengetahuan dan ketrampilan penggunaan media sosial untuk kegiatan pemasaran produk. Kedua semangat untuk menerapkan pengetahuan dan ketrampilan secara nyata dalam kegiatan pemasaran produk. Ketiga keinginan memperoleh pengetahuan lebih mendalam, mendetail dan praktis melalui pelatihan lanjutan.","published_in":"Prosiding Penelitian dan Pengabdian kepada Masyarakat; Vol 6, No 3 (2019): Prosiding Penelitian dan Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat; 315-325 ; 2581-1126 ; 2442-448X ; 10.24198\/jppm.v6i3","year":"2020-02-11","subject_orig":"website; industri keramik; purwakarta","subject":"website; industri keramik; purwakarta","authors":"Raharja, Sam'un Jaja; Rivani, Rivani; Arifianti, Ria","link":"http:\/\/jurnal.unpad.ac.id\/prosiding\/article\/view\/25361","oa_state":"1","url":"03caf4d1d6f05b74b68711b37dd34d4b7d1ac2fce7d4e7c239f8c244300d2636","relevance":66,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"833904c197f28a5edd3cd940796e8f07d298ce922eac76e52c1d4fa749c556d1","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475509; (Revista) ISSN 2477-9024","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475509","title":"Influencia de las Redes Sociales en la Rentabilidad de las Empresas: caso: Empresas ecuatorianas de Retail","paper_abstract":"This work aims to analyze the influence level of social networks on business success, it has been developed through two research tools, the first tool consists of an observation chart towards social networks managed by the companies selected as the object study, whose analysis was performed based on four items: activity, community, visibility and interactivity; Regarding the second tool, the use of a Likert scale survey stands out, which has made it possible to know the perception of consumers concerning the use of social networks as an information tool for their purchasing trends. The instruments applied made it possible to determine that management in social networks does not represent a key point about business success, however, of the 5 companies analyzed, less than 50% manage social networks, allowing them to reject the hypothesis proposed, it means, that the management of social networks in a company does not affect significatively on its profits, there is a low frequency of publications in both companies, with higher profits, such as companies with negative profits considered in the study, however, the level of profits considered in both registers, has a significant difference. ; El presente trabajo tiene por objetivo analizar el nivel de influencia de las redes sociales ante el \u00e9xito empresarial, ha sido desarrollado a trav\u00e9s de dos herramientas de investigaci\u00f3n, la primera consiste en un cuadro de observaci\u00f3n hacia las redes sociales gestionadas por las empresas seleccionadas como objeto de estudio, cuyo an\u00e1lisis se realiz\u00f3 en base a cuatro \u00edtems: actividad, comunidad, visibilidad e interactividad; en cuanto a la segunda herramienta, se destaca el uso de una encuesta de escala Likert, que ha permitido conocer la percepci\u00f3n de los consumidores referente al uso de redes sociales como herramienta de informaci\u00f3n para sus tendencias de compra. Los instrumentos aplicados, permitieron determinar que la gesti\u00f3n en redes sociales no representa un punto clave frente al \u00e9xito empresarial, no obstante, de las 5 empresas analizadas, menos del 50% gestiona redes sociales, permitiendo rechazar la hip\u00f3tesis planteada, es decir, que la gesti\u00f3n de redes sociales en una empresa no influye de manera significativa en las utilidades, existe una baja frecuencia de publicaciones tanto en las empresas con mayores utilidades, como en las empresas de utilidades negativas consideradas en el estudio, sin embargo, el nivel de utilidades considerado para ambos listados, posee una diferencia significativa.","published_in":"INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 2, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Mayo-Agosto, 2020)), pags. 219-233","year":"2020","subject_orig":"social network; hal-02553306; https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02553306; doi:10.1016\/j.intmar.2020.02.001","identifier":"https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02553306; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1016\/j.intmar.2020.02.001","title":"Cutting the Internet's Environmental Footprint: An Analysis of Consumers' Self-Attribution of Responsibility","paper_abstract":"International audience ; This research project investigates consumers' willingness to adopt online pro-environmental behaviors. First, we conducted an exploratory qualitative study that revealed respondents' low awareness of the environmental impact of Internet usage and reluctance to change their online behaviors. Consumers tend to decline all responsibility and expect companies and public authorities to take the necessary measures. Moreover, they are led by contradictory motives: not harming the environment on the one hand and continuing to use the Internet the way they currently do on the other. Based on these findings, two quantitative studies were conducted to investigate the determinants of consumers' self-attribution of responsibility to reduce the digital footprint of their online activity (e.g., using an eco-friendly search engine). Our conceptual model emphasizes the mechanisms of cognitive dissonance and highlights the crucial role of skepticism toward pro-environmental solutions. Implications for IT companies and public policy makers are discussed.","published_in":"ISSN: 1094-9968 ; EISSN: 1520-6653 ; Journal of Interactive Marketing ; https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02553306 ; https:\/\/www.ssoar.info\/ssoar\/handle\/document\/67692; http:\/\/nbn-resolving.org\/urn:nbn:de:0168-ssoar-67692-8; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.21003\/ea.V176-02","identifier":"https:\/\/www.ssoar.info\/ssoar\/handle\/document\/67692; http:\/\/nbn-resolving.org\/urn:nbn:de:0168-ssoar-67692-8; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.21003\/ea.V176-02","title":"Development of trust marketing in the digital society","paper_abstract":"The development of a digital society, rapid access to information sources changes the consumers' behaviour in terms of goods and services purchased online. In these conditions, the key to business development is trust: trust in web sites, information and brands represented on the Internet. Trust promotes consumers\u2019 decision-making with regard to interaction and changes the approaches to marketing activities of business entities. The study identifies the factors that contribute to the development of trust and focuses on the importance of communication and consumer values, including the digital culture. The stages of trust marketing development, which are based on the principles of the theory of trust and consumer behaviour in a digital environment, are specified. The research was conducted with the involvement of online users through an on-line survey in April-July 2018 and included 2,038 respondents. Research questions were formed on the basis of focus groups, which included active Internet users. The research concerned Russian-speaking and Ukrainian-speaking Internet users. It reflects a certain socio-cultural environment of the Internet and gives impetus to continue the research focused on the multicultural comparison. This research gives an idea of consumers\u2019 confidence in the digital environment and defines the conceptual aspects of developing trust marketing in relation to interaction, communication, consumer values and development stages. As the results of the study revealed, changes in consumer behaviour in the Internet environment, lack of direct contact with staff members enhance the value of trust in the company or brand. Therefore, trust marketing becomes the most demanded concept of modern marketing. According to this concept, marketing tools of enterprises in a digital society should be configured to establish trust relationships with consumers. This generates changes in the behaviour of enterprises themselves. The practical aspects of this research are to provide business stakeholders with guidance on developing trust marketing in a digital society based on consumer behaviour understanding. The social consequences of trust marketing development are the digital citizens' satisfaction with their livelihoods by increasing confidence in business and the state, minimizing the risks in the digital environment.","published_in":"Economic Annals-XXI ; 3-4 ; 13-25","year":"2020-05-12T07:21:05Z","subject_orig":"Wirtschaft; Economics; Marketing; Digitalisierung; Konsumverhalten; Internet; Kaufverhalten; Vertrauen; Kundenorientierung; digitalization; consumption behavior; buying behavior; confidence; customer orientation","subject":"Wirtschaft; Economics; Marketing; Digitalisierung; Konsumverhalten; Internet; Kaufverhalten; Vertrauen; Kundenorientierung; digitalization; consumption behavior; buying behavior; confidence; customer orientation","authors":"Popova, Nadezhda; Kataiev, Andrei; Skrynkovskyy, Ruslan; Nevertii, Anna","link":"https:\/\/www.ssoar.info\/ssoar\/handle\/document\/67692","oa_state":"1","url":"a109eb08ce3943341b4c8ee8bd1a6214c14958cc31a3a6f93bc1742694e206d5","relevance":62,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"4ae84a3a9491767b497bc2feaf2761370a78c1b147c896f22bcab28850c95215","relation":"http:\/\/www.fepbl.com\/index.php\/ijmer\/article\/view\/96\/214; http:\/\/www.fepbl.com\/index.php\/ijmer\/article\/view\/96","identifier":"http:\/\/www.fepbl.com\/index.php\/ijmer\/article\/view\/96","title":"DETERMINANTS OF CHAMPIONSHIP ATTRACTIVENESS OF POPULAR EVENTS IN BURKINA FASO: THE CRITICAL ROLE OF BIOTOPE, BIOCENOSIS, AND MEDIA ON THE NATIONAL FOOTBALL CHAMPIONSHIP","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this paper is to investigate the attractiveness of the popular events in Burkina Faso such as the national championship of football. In the West African context in general, and particularly in Burkina Faso, there are some challenges in the national Championship of football and this study concern is to bring out some solutions to the football issues in the Burkinabe context. There are two (2) approaches in this study. The first approach is a qualitative one. The second approach is a quantitative one. Qualitative data is collected by the mean of a digital recorder through semi-structured interviews and transcribed by hand. Quantitative data is collected by the means of a questionnaire and data is analyzed using Sphinx IQ2. The results show that the Burkinabe national championship attractiveness is strongly related to the biocenosis attractiveness, the biotope attractiveness, the media choice and the media impact.","published_in":"International Journal of Management & Entrepreneurship Research; Vol. 2 No. 1 (2020); 11-21 ; 2664-3596 ; 2664-3588","year":"2020-06-21","subject_orig":"Football; Championship; Attractiveness; Marketing; Sports","subject":"Football; Championship; Attractiveness; Marketing; Sports","authors":"Ki\u00e9ki\u00e9ta, Mamadou; Nass\u00e8, Th\u00e9ophile Bindeou\u00e8","link":"http:\/\/www.fepbl.com\/index.php\/ijmer\/article\/view\/96","oa_state":"1","url":"4ae84a3a9491767b497bc2feaf2761370a78c1b147c896f22bcab28850c95215","relevance":61,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"486075ad110a6f86775c123c918279bf7497a113698771eae31c90ca2597ac9c","relation":"FDG '20 : International Conference on the Foundations of Digital Games; International Conference on the Foundations of Digital Games; 10.1145\/3402942.3402985; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1145\/3402942.3402985; 978-1-4503-8807-8; https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/11397; URN:ISBN:978-1-4503-8807-8","identifier":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/11397","title":"Why Is CryptoKitties (Not) Gambling?","paper_abstract":"CryptoKitties (Axiom Zen 2017) is a pioneering blockchain-based game that disrupts the \u2018classic game model\u2019 (Juul 2003; 2013) in a way that turns it into a gambling web application. As previous research has shown, its mechanics are almost exclusively based on chance (Scholten et al 2019), and the rest is mostly speculation with game assets (Lee, Yoo and Jang 2019). This raises the question whether this game requires any skill, such as strategic planning. In my case study, I revisit the game system and perform a practice of playing it to differentiate between unpredictable (or \u201caleatory\u201d, as in Johnson 2018) and decision-making points in the game. I argue that mapping the journey of a player should complement analysis of the game system to assess the balance between skill and chance in a better-informed manner. ; \u00a9 Alesja Serada. Psychology and Marketing, 27(11), 1050-1073. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1002\/mar.20373; https:\/\/revistas.unal.edu.co\/index.php\/innovar\/article\/view\/83256; doi:10.15446\/innovar.v30n75.83256","identifier":"https:\/\/revistas.unal.edu.co\/index.php\/innovar\/article\/view\/83256; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.15446\/innovar.v30n75.83256","title":"Lovemark effect: analysis of the differences between students and graduates in a love brand study at a public university ; Efecto lovemark: an\u00e1lisis de las diferencias entre estudiantes y egresados en un estudio de \u201cmarca de amor\u201d en una universidad p\u00fablica ; Efeito lovemark: an\u00e1lise das diferen\u00e7as entre estudantes e graduados em um estudo de amor pelas marcas realizado em uma universidade p\u00fablica","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this paper is to consolidate the measurement of a lovemark and unify a set of elements that form a lovemark in university institutions by considering the differences between students and graduates. Based on a review of factors that build a lovemark, brand loyalty relationships were explored. In addition, an empirical study was carried out and applied to a sample of 257 participants at the National University of Colombia (UNAL), one of the most important uni\u00adversities in this country. The results validated the positive effects of brand love, brand experience, and brand involvement on brand loyalty, the determining factor of a university lovemark. This article is one of the first works integrating all the constructs proposed by prior research studies, which, until now, have approached lovemark and brand loyalty separately. ; Este art\u00edculo busca consolidar la medici\u00f3n de una lovemark y unificar el conjunto de elementos que conforman una marca de este tipo en instituciones universitarias a partir del an\u00e1lisis de las diferencias exis\u00adtentes entre estudiantes y egresados. Con base en una revisi\u00f3n de los fac\u00adtores que construyen una lovemark, se exploraron relaciones de lealtad de marca. Adem\u00e1s, se llev\u00f3 a cabo un estudio emp\u00edrico sobre una muestra de 257 participantes miembros de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia (UNAL), una de las instituciones de educaci\u00f3n superior m\u00e1s importantes del pa\u00eds. Los resultados validaron los efectos positivos de las variables amor por la marca, experiencia de marca y participaci\u00f3n de la marca sobre la lealtad hacia ella, un factor determinante de lovemark para una univer\u00adsidad. Este art\u00edculo es uno de los primeros en integrar todos los constructos propuestos por investigaciones anteriores, que, hasta ahora, se han rela\u00adcionado por separado en la teor\u00eda de lovemark y lealtad de marca. ; O objetivo deste trabalho \u00e9 consolidar a medi\u00e7\u00e3o de uma lovemark e unificar um conjunto de elementos que forma uma lovemark em institui\u00ad\u00e7\u00f5es universit\u00e1rias ao considerar as diferen\u00e7as entre estudantes e gradu\u00adados. Com base em uma revis\u00e3o de fatores que constroem uma lovemark, as rela\u00e7\u00f5es de fidelidade \u00e0 marca foram exploradas. Adicionalmente, um es\u00adtudo emp\u00edrico foi conduzido e aplicado a uma amostra de 257 participantes da Universidade Nacional da Col\u00f4mbia (UNAL), uma das universidades mais importantes do pa\u00eds. Os resultados validaram os efeitos positivos do amor pela marca e da experi\u00eancia de marca, e o envolvimento com a marca na fidelidade \u00e0 marca, o fator determinante para uma lovemark universit\u00e1ria. Este artigo \u00e9 um dos primeiros trabalhos a integrar todas as proposi\u00e7\u00f5es de artigos de pesquisa anteriores que, at\u00e9 o momento, haviam abordado love\u00admark e fidelidade de marca separadamente.","published_in":"Innovar; Vol. 30, N\u00fam. 75 (2020); 43-56 ; 2248-6968 ; 0121-5051","year":"2020-01-01","subject_orig":"Administration; Accountancy; social Sciences; Lovemark; loyalty; higher education; brand; JEL: M31; M32; I29; Administraci\u00f3n; Contadur\u00eda; Ciencias Sociales; lealtad; educaci\u00f3n superior; marca; Administra\u00e7\u00e3o; Contabilidade; Ci\u00eancias Sociais; educa\u00e7\u00e3o superior; fidelidade","subject":"Administration; Accountancy; social Sciences; Lovemark; loyalty; higher education; brand; JEL: M M I Administraci\u00f3n; Contadur\u00eda; Ciencias Sociales; lealtad; educaci\u00f3n superior; marca; Administra\u00e7\u00e3o; Contabilidade; Ci\u00eancias Sociais; educa\u00e7\u00e3o superior; fidelidade","authors":"Montoya-Restrepo, Iv\u00e1n Alonso; S\u00e1nchez Torres, Javier A.; Rojas Berrio, Sandra Patricia; Montoya-Restrepo, Alexandra","link":"https:\/\/revistas.unal.edu.co\/index.php\/innovar\/article\/view\/83256","oa_state":"1","url":"17e1d38cac541d3a71e23f4949ede9b53240cf392462ed4c58447971b03bea0f","relevance":59,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"b9e320d11b3bfa6105e145123547e78d423e6866e7f9ccc9cb949d5d9d510364","relation":"http:\/\/www.unicap.br\/ojs\/index.php\/agora\/article\/view\/1613\/1413; ABECASIS, T. \"Fake News Nas Redes. (2019). \"An overview of online fake news: Characterization, detection, and discussion\", Information Processing and Management, 126(1) (2019), p. 1-26.; http:\/\/www.unicap.br\/ojs\/index.php\/agora\/article\/view\/1613; doi:10.25247\/P1982-999X.2020.v20n1.p05-26","identifier":"http:\/\/www.unicap.br\/ojs\/index.php\/agora\/article\/view\/1613; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25247\/P1982-999X.2020.v20n1.p05-26","title":"Catalisadores das Fake News: Uma Discuss\u00e3o Te\u00f3rica no \u00c2mbito Sociol\u00f3gico","paper_abstract":"A desinforma\u00e7\u00e3o est\u00e1 em ascens\u00e3o nesta era intitulada de p\u00f3s-verdade, e apresenta-se como um assunto capaz de permitir um amplo campo de investiga\u00e7\u00e3o. Tendo em considera\u00e7\u00e3o as amea\u00e7as e consequ\u00eancias da desinforma\u00e7\u00e3o, atrav\u00e9s de casos pr\u00e1ticos dos \u00faltimos anos, \u00e9 importante perceber no vi\u00e9s sociol\u00f3gico poss\u00edveis fatores que impulsionam as pessoas para a credibiliza\u00e7\u00e3o de inverdades. Com isso, o presente artigo prop\u00f5e uma revis\u00e3o de literatura, com trabalhos publicados de 2015 a 2019, e uma discuss\u00e3o sobre os poss\u00edveis fatores no contexto referido. Como resultado, foram apresentados insights capazes de trazer uma reflex\u00e3o para investiga\u00e7\u00f5es futuras.Desinforma\u00e7\u00e3o; vi\u00e9s sociol\u00f3gico; fake news; catalisadores.","published_in":"Revista \u00c1gora Filos\u00f3fica; v. 20, n. 1 (2020): Filosofia e Psicologia; 05-26 ; 1982-999X ; 1679-5385 ; 10.25247\/P1982-999X.2020.v20n1","year":"2020-05-07","subject_orig":"Filosofia; Ci\u00eancias Humanas; Desinforma\u00e7\u00e3o. In view of the above, the local tourism actors have to fully embrace the digital transformation by integrating Information Technologies into their operational routines. With this in mind, it is here presented the development of a technological infrastructure to provide with new digital assets to the natural parks of the Insubria, cross-border region stretching between Northern Italy and Southern Switzerland. This work is carried out within the INSUBRI.PARKS project, funded by the Interreg program of the European Union. The final goal of the project is to increase tourism attractiveness of the Insubria region through the provision of new infrastructure, the design of new tourism experiences, and the deployment of Information Technology tools to support the cross-border tourism management and marketing. The tools development is described in detail and the application prototypes are presented. The work leverages exclusively Free and Open Source Software that provides the infrastructure with large rooms of improvements and customization while reducing both development and maintenance costs. Future directions for the work are outlined by considering the amelioration of the presented tools, the development of additional components, and the practical applications of the infrastructure functionalities from the perspective of both park managers and visitors.","published_in":"","year":"2020-08","subject_orig":"article; Verlagsver\u00f6ffentlichung","subject":"article; Verlagsver\u00f6ffentlichung","authors":"Oxoli, D.; Terza, V.; Cannata, M.; Brovelli, M. A.","link":"https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5194\/isprs-archives-XLIII-B4-2020-277-2020","oa_state":"1","url":"80a666a3d5a7d1e02f78ec2db676a5824b9e559dd44574c1db3ff7061e335eca","relevance":57,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":"https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5194\/isprs-archives-XLIII-B4-2020-277-2020"},{"id":"acc7b01171b0f1c70451ec8b27e10304917f8adb9b67fe19e9871d0b92c8a138","relation":"https:\/\/radar.brookes.ac.uk\/radar\/items\/debe50b7-a6a3-4007-9d56-c0ac26877bad\/1\/; https:\/\/radar.brookes.ac.uk\/radar\/file\/debe50b7-a6a3-4007-9d56-c0ac26877bad\/1\/344-1888-3-PB.pdf","identifier":"https:\/\/radar.brookes.ac.uk\/radar\/items\/debe50b7-a6a3-4007-9d56-c0ac26877bad\/1\/; https:\/\/radar.brookes.ac.uk\/radar\/file\/debe50b7-a6a3-4007-9d56-c0ac26877bad\/1\/344-1888-3-PB.pdf","title":"Understanding authenticity in digital cause-related advertising: Does cause involvement moderate intention to purchase?","paper_abstract":"The paper provides a survey understanding of two dimensions of perceived authenticity in digital cause-related marketing (CRM) display advertising and models the impact on consumers\u2019 responses. It develops a model with a set of six hypotheses and tests them through a multivariate structural equation technique on quantitative data generated by a survey procedure on a UK-based consumer panel. The 465 online panel participants consisted of 60% males and 40% females between the ages of 18 and 35. The findings provide empirical evidence that the perceived donation amount and ad-context congruence are intertwined perspectives of authenticity in digital CRM display ads, and show that both of these dimensions provide input to conferring authenticity on the ads. However, the perceived donation amount accounts for a stronger effect than ad-context congruence. The paper finds firms\u2019 altruistic motives an influential antecedent to the mediating role of attitudes towards the ad (AaD) as a fundraising tool. This is due to the nature of the impact of authenticity on the link with intention to purchase. Contrarily to expectation, the level of firms\u2019 involvement with a social cause does not moderate intention to purchase from the consumers\u2019 standpoint. The paper provides an interpretation of authentic perception in digital CRM advertising and proposes a composite model of the mechanism of this effect on consumers\u2019 response. In DCRM advertising, increasing the perception of donation magnitude is a key driver to advertising success, and the level of association with a social cause is not a significant factor in segmenting and targeting consumers.","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Ndasi, Wilson; Akcay, Ediz Edip","link":"https:\/\/radar.brookes.ac.uk\/radar\/items\/debe50b7-a6a3-4007-9d56-c0ac26877bad\/1\/","oa_state":"1","url":"acc7b01171b0f1c70451ec8b27e10304917f8adb9b67fe19e9871d0b92c8a138","relevance":56,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"942b71919fd14bd8c481343555e3262a682f2853347d64743a7abc662ec3a3df","relation":"https:\/\/ejournal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jptn\/article\/view\/31886\/28933; https:\/\/ejournal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jptn\/article\/view\/31886","identifier":"https:\/\/ejournal.unesa.ac.id\/index.php\/jptn\/article\/view\/31886","title":"PENGEMBANGAN MEDIA PEMBELAJARAN CROSSWORD PUZZLE DIGITAL PADA KOMPETENSI DASAR MENJELASKAN KONSEP PEMASARAN ONLINE KELAS XI BISNIS DARING DAN PEMASARAN SMK NEGERI 4 SURABAYA","paper_abstract":"ABSTRAK Penelitian ini memiliki tujuan: 1) Menjelaskan dan mengetahui proses pengembangan media pembelajaran Crossword Puzzle Digital, 2) Mendeskripsikan kelayakan media pembelajaran, 3) Mengetahui respon peserta didik. Model pada penelitian ini adalah 4D yang terdiri dari Define, Design, Develop, Disseminate, tetapi penelitian ini hanya sampai Develop. Instrumen penelitian yang digunakan adalah: 1) Lember telaah ahli digunakan untuk mendapatkan penilaian berupa saran revisi media pembelajaran. 2) Lembar validasi ahli berfungsi untuk memberikan penilaian media pembelajaran Crossword Puzzle Digital. 3) Angket respon peserta didik berfungsi untuk melihat penilaian peserta didik terhadap media Crossword Puzzle Digital. Didapat penilaian validasi ahli materi mendapatkan 88% dengan kategori sangat layak, penilaian validasi ahli media mendapatkan 80% dengan kategori layak, dan uji coba lapangan mendapatkan hasil 91,9% dengan kategori sangat layak. Kesimpulan penelitian pengembangan media Crossword Puzzle Digital dapat digunakan dalam pembelajaran bisnis Online. Kata Kunci : Media Pembelajaran, Crossword Puzzle Digital, Adobe Flash CS6, Konsep Pemasaran Online Abstract This study has the following objectives: 1) Explain and know the process of developing a Crossword Puzzle Digital learning media, 2) Describe the feasibility of learning media, 3) Determine students responses. The model in this study is 4D which consists of Define, Design, Develop, Disseminate, but this research only goes to Develop. The research instruments used were: 1) Lembers expert analysis was used to obtain an assessment in the form of a revised suggestion of learning media. 2) Expert validation sheet serves to provide an assessment of Crossword Puzzle Digital learning media. 3) Questionnaire responses of students function to see students assessments of the Crossword Puzzle Digital media. Obtained the validation assessment of the material experts received 88% in the very feasible category, the validation assessment of the media experts received 80% in the feasible category, and field trials received 91.9% in the very feasible category. The conclusion of Crossword Puzzle Digital media development research can be used in online business learning. A Journal of English Studies; orcid:0000-0001-7019-3803","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11320\/9314; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.15290\/cr.2020.29.2.02","title":"Annual Company Reports\u2019 narratives migrate to the Web: A diachronic perspective","paper_abstract":"Despite the dramatic innovation brought about in the field of corporate communication by the advent of the World Wide Web, when it comes to annual company reports (ACRs), companies seem to introduce few innovative digital elements in the drafting and formatting of the narrative sections. The present study, as the last step of a long-term research project, aimed at investigating this genre from a diachronic point of view by concentrating on the transformations that ACRs\u2019 corporate narratives undergo once they migrate to the Web. Two standpoints emerge: the first sees companies that are highly engaged in the digital environment take advantage of several digital tools at once, while the second proposes a slightly less technological approach whereby simple ACRs in pdf format are uploaded on the company website therefore lacking the most interactive functions. While radical changes in the presentation of ACRs\u2019 narratives between 2000 and 2018 cannot be traced, some companies have decided to deal with such narratives by reporting either the complete narrative or its synthesis. ; cinzia.giglioni@uniroma1.it ; Cinzia Giglioni holds a research and teaching position at the Department of Political Sciences, University of Rome \u201cLa Sapienza\u201d. She was a contract professor for several years in different universities in Italy, teaching both BA and first level master degree students. Her research interests span from second language acquisition to discourse analysis, especially in the context of LSP research. Her most recent contributions focus on the linguistic aspects of corporate and political communication. She has presented papers at several international conferences and symposia, and has published the results of her research in journals and edited volumes. She regularly collaborates with various international research groups, including CLAVIER (The Corpus and Language Variation in English Research Group) and GERAS (Groupe d\u2019 Etude et de Recherche en Anglais de Sp\u00e9cialit\u00e9). ; Universit\u00e0 di Roma \u201cLa Sapienza\u201d ; Argenti, P. 2005. International Journal of Advertising, 1\u201320. doi.org\/10.1080\/02650487.2019.1575106; https:\/\/journals.sfu.ca\/indexcomunicacion\/index.php\/indexcomunicacion\/article\/view\/575","identifier":"https:\/\/journals.sfu.ca\/indexcomunicacion\/index.php\/indexcomunicacion\/article\/view\/575","title":"User Generated Content, Its Relationship with Brand Personality and Brand Equity ; Contenido generado por los usuarios, su relaci\u00f3n con la personalidad de marca y el valor de marca","paper_abstract":"Social Networks are nowadays a very important way for companies to make brand communication. Because studies about this topic in Mexico are scarce it is relevant to know how User Generated Content that consumers communicate through these social platforms is related with the perception they have about brands. A quantitative study was done as part of a doctoral thesis, which had as main objective to determine the relationship there is between these three variables: User Generated Content (UGC), Brand Personality (BP), and Consumer Based Brand Equity (CBBE). Using a sample of 211 smartphone users, a Confirmatory Factor Analysis was conducted from which a Structural Equation Model was developed, finding that BP has an impact on UGC and CBBE, but UGC are not related directly to CBBE in the Mexican context of the metropolitan area of Guadalajara. ; Las redes sociales digitales (RSD) son una gran herramienta de comunicaci\u00f3n de marca para las organizaciones en la actualidad. Debido a que las investigaciones en M\u00e9xico son escasas, es relevante conocer c\u00f3mo los contenidos que los consumidores crean en estas plataformas se relacionan con las percepciones que ellos desarrollan acerca de las marcas. Se realiz\u00f3 una investigaci\u00f3n cuantitativa que tuvo como objetivo determinar las relaciones entre tres variables perceptuales, las cuales son los contenidos generados por los usuarios (CGU), la personalidad de marca (PM) y el valor de marca con base en el consumidor (VMBC) referente al sector tel\u00e9fonos m\u00f3viles inteligentes (smartphones). Con una muestra de 211 usuarios de tel\u00e9fonos celulares se hizo un an\u00e1lisis factorial confirmatorio, a partir del cual se elabor\u00f3 un modelo de ecuaciones estructurales, con el que se encontr\u00f3 que la PM influye a los CGU y el VMBC, pero que los CGU no influyen directamente en el VMBC en el contexto mexicano de la Zona Metropolitana de Guadalajara.","published_in":"index.comunicaci\u00f3n; Vol. 10, N\u00fam. 1 (2020): Ordinario 2020; 125-147 ; 2174-1859 ; 2444-3239","year":"2020-04-06","subject_orig":"Brand Equity; Brand Personality; User Generated Content; Consumer; Social Networks; Structural Equation System; ; comunicaci\u00f3n; marketing; administraci\u00f3n; comportamiento del consumidor; valor de marca; personalidad de marca; contenido social; consumidor; redes sociales; ecuaciones estructurales","subject":"Brand Equity; Brand Personality; User Generated Content; Consumer; Social Networks; Structural Equation System; ; comunicaci\u00f3n; marketing; administraci\u00f3n; comportamiento del consumidor; valor de marca; personalidad de marca; contenido social; consumidor; redes sociales; ecuaciones estructurales","authors":"Ruiz-Aguilar, Mario Antonio; Avalos-Pelayo, Rafael","link":"https:\/\/journals.sfu.ca\/indexcomunicacion\/index.php\/indexcomunicacion\/article\/view\/575","oa_state":"1","url":"698ac037c2f9fe8dba2e87b3ff297274d671f681326489fcbabba714c076212c","relevance":53,"resulttype":["Journal\/newspaper article"],"doi":""},{"id":"9d5d103e2d3fa4c4f62ec3237f4716899cea6aac1e7ba2cecbe84c65c33fa3eb","relation":"http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779\/927; http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779\/928; http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779\/929; Alberca, F.A. Jour\u00adnal of Travel Research (51), 768-778.; http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779; doi:10.3989\/estgeogr.202056.056","identifier":"http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.3989\/estgeogr.202056.056","title":"The \u201cnetwork\u201d protocol applied to the study of tourist destinations: the case of Gijon (Spain) ; El protocolo \u201cnetwork\u201d aplicado al estudio de los destinos tur\u00edsticos: el caso de Gij\u00f3n (Espa\u00f1a)","paper_abstract":"The definition of the concept of destination is a very complicated matter, given the need for consensus between different types of academics and professionals. However, it is essential to establish an adequate framework of knowledge for planning and managing tourism. Most of the new proposals revolve around the Network perspective, with intra and interrelation\u00adships between agents, attractions and tourist services, and even destinations. The \u201csecond generation\u201d experience factor, support\u00aded by the phenomenon of co-creation, is currently considered the leitmotif for tourists. According to this concept, it is the tourists who, with the choices of resources and services, and with their movements in the territories, really define a destination as such, and in its different facets. This work uses the well-known SmartMax game to offer an empirical protocol of knowledge, quantitative and qualitative, of a tourist destination. Relying on data on the mobility of tourists, and using multivariable analysis techniques, it is possible to identify the different profiles of geographic space as a tourist destination, as well as the relative weight of each one: single destination, headquarters, a destination of circuit and hiking destination. In this way, a useful methodology is built for the empirical knowledge of tourist destinations, in general, and even for its application in other areas of geographic marketing, in particular. ; La definici\u00f3n del concepto de destino es un asunto muy complejo, dada la necesidad de consenso entre distintos tipos de acad\u00e9micos y de profesionales, pero muy necesaria para poder establecer un marco adecuado de conocimiento orientado a la planificaci\u00f3n y a la gesti\u00f3n del turismo. La mayor\u00eda de las nuevas propuestas giran en torno a la perspectiva de Red (Network), con intra e interrelaciones entre agentes, atracciones y servicios tur\u00edsticos, e incluso destinos. El factor experiencia de \u201csegunda generaci\u00f3n\u201d, apoyado en el fen\u00f3meno de la co-creaci\u00f3n, es actualmente considerado el leit motiv para el turista. De acuerdo a tal concepto son los turistas quienes, con las elecciones de recursos y servicios, y con sus movimientos en los territorios, definen realmente un destino como tal, y en sus diferentes facetas. Este trabajo recurre al uso del conocido juego del SmartMax para ofrecer un protocolo emp\u00edrico de conocimiento, cuantitativo y cualitativo, de un destino tur\u00edstico. Apoy\u00e1ndose en datos sobre la movilidad de los turistas, y mediante t\u00e9cnicas de an\u00e1lisis multivariable, se consigue identificar los diferentes perfiles de un espacio geogr\u00e1fico como destino tur\u00edstico, as\u00ed como el peso relativo de cada uno de ellos: destino \u00fanico, sede central, destino de circuito y destino de excursionismo. De esta forma se construye una metodolog\u00eda \u00fatil para el conocimiento emp\u00edrico de los destinos tur\u00eds\u00adticos, de forma general, e incluso para su aplicaci\u00f3n en otros \u00e1mbitos del marketing geogr\u00e1fico, en particular.","published_in":"Estudios Geogr\u00e1ficos; Vol. 81 No. 288 (2020); e041 ; Estudios Geogr\u00e1ficos; Vol. 81 N\u00fam. 288 (2020); e041 ; digital-\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433, \u0456\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u0442-\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433; \u0432\u0438\u0432\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043d\u0430 \u0440\u0438\u043d\u043e\u043a. ; The concept of \u201ctourist product\u201d is analyzed, attention is focused on the fact that the novelty of the product is the result of a creative search and independent commercial value. A tourist product may be new in relation to meeting a new need or a new consumer, an existing product, a new market. The evaluation of the application of the concept of \u201cnew product\u201d in marketing has been carried out. Means of achieving the commercial value of tourism products are proposed. The need for constant updating of the product range of a tourist enterprise is determined. Varieties and features of the introduction of new tourism products are considered. The scheme of the process of planning the promotion of a new tourist product is presented, with the concretization of means of retaining consumers and identifying the target segment. This idea of planning the promotion of a new tourist product allows you to minimize the risks that arise both in the external and internal environment. Horizontal and vertical methods of promoting new tourism products to the market, their essence, features, advantages and differences under restrictions on the activities of tourism enterprises, are determined. The necessity of taking into account the peculiarities of new tourism products when entering the market is proved, in particular, promotion methods are defined. The corporate and contractual schemes of vertical cooperation and their application areas, parity partnership schemes and cooperative ties of horizontal promotion through outsourcing are investigated. Means are proposed for achieving the commercial success of a formed tourism product based on market testing, trial marketing, and market testing. Possible causes of failures in interactions with consumers of a new tourism product are identified. The use of Internet technologies that are developing rapidly to promote new tourism products is proposed. The methods of online advertising are indicated: traditional (offline) and a digital model in terms of promoting a travel product on the global Internet.Keywords: travel agency, tourist product; new tourist product; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.36097\/rsan.v1i38.1197","title":"La creaci\u00f3n de fanpage en el desarrollo de emprendimientos locales","paper_abstract":"Las redes sociales se han convertido en una herramienta fundamental para el desarrollo empresarial, principalmente en los procesos de comunicaci\u00f3n con sus mercados y los emprendimientos, por peque\u00f1os que resulten, no son ajenos a esta tendencia. El presente art\u00edculo muestra los resultados alcanzados por cinco emprendimientos locales que dise\u00f1aron sus fanpages, con el apoyo de estudiantes de la carrera de Marketing de la Universidad San Gregorio de Portoviejo, dentro del proyecto de vinculaci\u00f3n Asesoramiento Comercial a Operadores Econ\u00f3micos para el Desarrollo de la Econom\u00eda Popular y Solidaria y PyMES. Para evaluar los resultados, se aplic\u00f3 la t\u00e9cnica de la Entrevista a los emprendedores, de quienes se obtuvo sus percepciones respecto a las mejoras logradas en sus procesos comerciales, una vez puesta en marcha de sus fanpages","published_in":"Revista San Gregorio; N\u00fam. 38 (2020): Revista San Gregorio.
