\u0432\u0440\u0435\u043c\u044f \u0431\u043e\u043b\u044c\u0448\u043e\u0439 \u0432\u0435\u0441 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u043e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u0442\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0435\u0432\u044b\u0439 \u0441\u0435\u0433\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0432 \u0441\u0432\u044f\u0437\u0438 \u0441 \u0432\u043e\u0437\u043d\u0438\u043a\u043d\u043e\u0432\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435\u043c \u0446\u0435\u043b\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0431\u043b\u043e\u043a\u0430 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u0434\u0438\u0441\u0446\u0438\u043f\u043b\u0438\u043d: \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043f\u0441\u0438\u0445\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0433\u0438\u0438, \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u044d\u043a\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043c\u0438\u043a\u0438, \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043f\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0430. \u0423\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0430\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0430\u044f \u0441\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0430\u044f \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0441\u0438\u0438, \u0432\u044b\u0437\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u0430\u044f \u043d\u043e\u0432\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0438\u043d\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u043d\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0437\u0430\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044f\u043c\u0438 \u043e\u0431\u0449\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0430. \u0410\u043a\u0442\u0443\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0437\u0438\u0440\u0443\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u044c \u0432 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0445 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0438\u044f\u0445, \u043a\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0440\u044b\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u043e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u0442\u0430\u044e\u0442 \u043d\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0439 \u0441\u043c\u044b\u0441\u043b \u0438 \u043e\u0440\u0438\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0438\u0440\u044b \u0432\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0438\u0435 \u043f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0430 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430 \u043d\u0430 \u0446\u0438\u0444\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0443\u044e \u043f\u043b\u0430\u0442\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0443. \u0412\u0435\u0441\u043e\u043c\u044b\u043c \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u043e\u043d\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043c \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0438 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u043d\u043e\u0432\u044f\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0442\u0430\u043a\u0436\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0438\u0438, \u043f\u043e\u0437\u0432\u043e\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0438\u0435 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0430\u043c \u043d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u0435\u0440\u044b\u0432\u043d\u043e \u0430\u0434\u0430\u043f\u0442\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u043a \u0438\u0437\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f\u043c \u0432 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0430\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0441\u043b\u0438. ; \u0423 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0442\u0456 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043e \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u0439 \u043f\u0456\u0434\u0445\u0456\u0434 \u0434\u043e \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438 \u0432 \u0443\u043c\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0445 \u0442\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0441\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0444\u0430\u0445\u0443. \u0414\u0438\u0433\u0456\u0442\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0456\u044f \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u0433\u0430\u043b\u0443\u0437\u0456, \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0433\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u044f \u0444\u0443\u043d\u043a\u0446\u0456\u0439 \u0442\u0430 \u0437\u0430\u0432\u0434\u0430\u043d\u044c \u0443 \u0446\u0430\u0440\u0438\u043d\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0456\u0439, \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u0432\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0456\u0432 \u0442\u0430 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u0435\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0456\u0432 \u0441\u043f\u0440\u0438\u0447\u0438\u043d\u0438\u043b\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0443 \u0440\u0435\u0432\u0456\u0437\u0456\u0457 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438. \u0417\u0432\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0434\u043e \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u044f\u043a \u0434\u043e \u0437\u0430\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043d\u0438\u0447\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043f\u043e\u043d\u044f\u0442\u0442\u044f \u0442\u0435\u043e\u0440\u0456\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438 \u0434\u043e\u0437\u0432\u043e\u043b\u0438\u043b\u043e \u0430\u043a\u0442\u0443\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0437\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438 \u0442\u043e\u0439 \u043d\u0430\u0431\u0456\u0440 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u044c, \u0432\u043c\u0456\u043d\u044c, \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0456\u0439\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u044f\u043a\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0439 \u0442\u0430 \u0446\u0456\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0439, \u0449\u043e \u0441\u043a\u043b\u0430\u0434\u0430\u044e\u0442\u044c \u0431\u0430\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0443 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u044c \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0444\u0435\u0441\u0456\u0457. \u0412\u0456\u0434\u043f\u043e\u0432\u0456\u0434\u043d\u043e \u0434\u043e \u043a\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0438\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0457 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0456 \u0417. \u0412\u0430\u0439\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0433\u0430, \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0430 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u0456\u0441\u0442\u044c \u044f\u043a \u0446\u0456\u043b\u044c\u043e\u0432\u0430 \u0444\u0443\u043d\u043a\u0446\u0456\u044f \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043e\u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u0438 \u043c\u0430\u0454 \u0441\u043a\u043b\u0430\u0434\u043d\u0443 \u0430\u0440\u0445\u0456\u0442\u0435\u043a\u0442\u043e\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0443 \u0456 \u0456\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0454 \u0447\u043e\u0442\u0438\u0440\u0438 \u0441\u043a\u043b\u0430\u0434\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0438: \u0444\u0430\u0445\u043e\u0432\u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u044e, \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0439\u043d\u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u044e, \u0441\u043f\u0435\u0446\u0456\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0456\/\u0433\u0430\u043b\u0443\u0437\u0435\u0432\u0456 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0442\u0430 \u0441\u043e\u0446\u0456\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0443 \u043e\u0440\u0456\u0454\u043d\u0442\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u0456\u0441\u0442\u044c. \u041a\u043e\u0436\u043d\u0430 \u0437\u0456 \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0438\u0436\u043d\u0435\u0432\u0438\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u0439 \u043f\u0456\u0434 \u0432\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u043e\u043c \u043d\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0445 \u0443\u043c\u043e\u0432 \u0440\u0435\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0444\u0430\u0445\u0443 \u0442\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0441\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0443\u0454\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f, \u0437\u043c\u0456\u043d\u044e\u0454\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u0457\u0445 \u043f\u0438\u0442\u043e\u043c\u0430 \u0432\u0430\u0433\u0430. \u0422\u0430\u043a, \u0456\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0456 \u043d\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0447\u043a\u0438 \u0437\u0430\u0437\u043d\u0430\u044e\u0442\u044c \u0437\u043c\u0456\u043d \u043f\u0456\u0434 \u0432\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u043e\u043c \u043f\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0438\u043f\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043c\u043e\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0435\u0439. \u0416\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0430 \u0441\u043f\u0456\u0432\u0443\u0447\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0443\u0454 \u0437\u043e\u0432\u0441\u0456\u043c \u0456\u043d\u0448\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0430\u043b\u0433\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0442\u043c\u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043d\u0438\u0446\u0442\u0432\u0430. \u0412\u043e\u043d\u0430 \u043f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0431\u0430\u0447\u0430\u0454 \u043d\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0447\u043a\u0438 \u0432\u0435\u0440\u0438\u0444\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0456\u043d\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457, \u0432\u0437\u0430\u0454\u043c\u043e\u0434\u0456\u0457 \u0437 \u0434\u043e\u043f\u0438\u0441\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0447\u0430\u043c\u0438-\u0430\u043c\u0430\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0442\u0430 \u043c\u043e\u0436\u043d\u043e\u0432\u043b\u0430\u0434\u0446\u044f\u043c\u0438, \u044f\u043a\u0456 \u0437\u0430\u043b\u0443\u0447\u0430\u044e\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u0434\u043e \u0440\u043e\u0437\u0432\u2019\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043b\u0435\u043c \u0440\u0456\u0437\u043d\u043e\u0457 \u043c\u0430\u0441\u0448\u0442\u0430\u0431\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0442\u0430 \u0441\u043f\u0440\u044f\u043c\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044f, \u0441\u043f\u0456\u043b\u043a\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0437 \u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u044e \u0430\u0443\u0434\u0438\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0456\u0454\u044e, \u0449\u043e \u043e\u0431\u0443\u043c\u043e\u0432\u043b\u044e\u0454\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f\u043c \u0447\u0438\u043d\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430 \u0437\u0432\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0437\u0432\u2019\u044f\u0437\u043a\u0443 \u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457. \u0412\u043e\u0434\u043d\u043e\u0447\u0430\u0441 \u0431\u0456\u043b\u044c\u0448\u043e\u0457 \u0432\u0430\u0433\u0438 \u043d\u0430\u0431\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0454 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043d\u043d\u0454\u0432\u0438\u0439 \u0441\u0435\u0433\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0443 \u0437\u0432\u2019\u044f\u0437\u043a\u0443 \u0456\u0437 \u0432\u0438\u043d\u0438\u043a\u043d\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f\u043c \u0446\u0456\u043b\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0431\u043b\u043e\u043a\u0443 \u043c\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0430\u043e\u0440\u0456\u0454\u043d\u0442\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u0434\u0438\u0441\u0446\u0438\u043f\u043b\u0456\u043d: Communications and Communicative Technologies; \u2116 20 (2020): Communications and Communicative Technologies; 13-18 ; 2617-1821 ; 2617-1813 ; 10.15421\/29200101 Butyrina, M."},{"id":"151000b86f96ad14ea643f7386c69ab3104774781e48e07fdd7b6422f934887d","content":"BLOGGERS AND INFLUENCERS - THE PHENOMENON OF DRIVING CONSUMER FASHION CHOICES ; BLOGERI I INFLUENCERI, FENOMENI UTJECAJA NA POTRO\u0160A\u010cE MODNIH ODJEVNIH PROIZVODA Social networking has become an integral part of everyday life of today\u2019s modern consumer. Social media are used for sending messages and sharing product-related information, experiences, and recommendations with virtual friends. The dramatic increase in social media use has posed a major challenge to the fashion industry, prompting it to adapt its communication and content to social media users. Content posted on social networks caters for the needs of consumers and provides both them and businesses with benefits of social media marketing campaigns. A variety of criteria are used to measure the success of marketing efforts on social media platforms, such as fashion influencer tags, audience engagement, and the percentage of discussions related to fashion. The fashion industry, which once struggled to reach its target market, is now achieving it much more easily and faster thanks to social networking. In today's digital landscape, communication is more important than ever. Social media influencers have become a worthy extension of the marketing department; their authority is unquestionable, and their reach and impact are greater than that of any traditional advertising method. The fashion industry sees the influencer as an archetypal consumer, a persona who embodies the real consumer and whose characteristics it considers when creating a trend, a fashion product, and eventually the marketing campaign itself. The paper aims to identify the role of influencers in the fashion industry and examine the extent to which they affect\/ consumer purchase decisions. ; Dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee postale su neizostavan dio svakodnevnog \u017eivota dana\u0161njeg suvremenog potro\u0161a\u010da. Potro\u0161a\u010di prenose poruke, pri\u010daju o proizvodima i iskustvima i daju preporuke svojim \u201evirtualnim\u201c prijateljima o proizvodima koji im se svi\u0111aju. Modnoj industriji dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee postale su u kratkom roku temeljni komunikacijski izazov i sadr\u017eaj koji je plasiran na dru\u0161tvenoj mre\u017ei prilago\u0111en je korisniku. Sukladno navedenom, sadr\u017eaj na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama je na sjeci\u0161tu je stvarnih potreba potro\u0161a\u010da i benefita koji potro\u0161a\u010di imaju od kampanja na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama. Marketin\u0161ke platforme dru\u0161tvenih mre\u017ea vode se sa razli\u010ditim kriterijima poput tagova modnih Influencera, uklju\u010denost publike te postotku razgovora o modi. Industrija mode koja je neko\u0107 s te\u0161ko\u0107om dolazila do ciljanog potro\u0161a\u010da, danas zahvaljuju\u0107i dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama dolaze lak\u0161e i br\u017ee. U vremenu totalne komunikacije, ali i zagu\u0161enja komunikacijskih kanala, influenceri postaju po\u017eeljna ekstenzija i njihov je autoritet neupitan, a utjecaj ve\u0107i i od najbolje reklame. Industrija mode Influencere do\u017eivljava kao arhetipskog potro\u0161a\u010da kojeg zami\u0161lja kada kreira trend, modni proizvod i u kona\u010dnici samu marketin\u0161ku kampanju. U radu \u0107e se nastojati utvrditi stvarna uloga Influencera u modnoj industriji, te \u0107e se kroz provedeno istra\u017eivanje istra\u017eiti njihova uloga i zna\u010daj pri dono\u0161enju odluke o modnom proizvodu. social networks; consumers; fashion; fashion brands; consumption; influencers; fashion market; communication; information; dru\u0161tvene mre\u017ee; potro\u0161a\u010di; moda; modne marke; potro\u0161nja; influenceri; tr\u017ei\u0161te mode; komunikacija; informacije CroDiM : International Journal of Marketing Science ; ISSN 2584-7236 (Online) ; Volume 3 ; Issue 1 Martin\u010devi\u0107, Ela; Vukovi\u0107, Dijana; Hunjet, Anica"},{"id":"1f448a89cad65d3ebea29d47d4561632aa2054bdef6d245bb711162deb351e67","content":"El reciclaje de madera una herramienta para emprender y cuidar el planeta This business management proposal, focuses on the reuse of a product that is normally discarded after being used in the transportation of various accessories, especially appliances, this waste can cause a negative impact on the environment since this material has a decomposition period of many years. The preponderant figures of this project indicate that there is sufficient market to exploit the recycling of pinewood and turn this activity into a business model. The objective of this article is to study how the recycling of pinewood (Pallet) can be seen from a future business perspective. The descriptive research method was used because it allowed to evaluate the characteristics of pine wood and relate it as a potential business to undertake it. A household-directed survey was applied to determine their opinion of the reuse of pinewood in novel products, in addition to resorting to the criteria of different professionals who like to purchase products made with pine, another marketing segment of these products made With recycling can be, furniture and office supplies, ornaments among others. The investigation determined significant results on the need to recycle providing the necessary bases to create businesses in which certain families can benefit. ; Esta propuesta de gesti\u00f3n empresarial, se enfoca en la reutilizaci\u00f3n de un producto que normalmente es desechado luego de ser utilizado en la transportaci\u00f3n de varios accesorios, especialmente de electrodom\u00e9sticos, este desecho puede causar un impacto negativo en el medio ambiente ya que este material tiene un periodo de descomposici\u00f3n de muchos a\u00f1os. Las cifras preponderantes de este proyecto indican que existe mercado suficiente para explotar el reciclaje de madera de pino y convertir esta actividad en un modelo de negocio. El objetivo de este art\u00edculo es estudiar de qu\u00e9 manera el reciclaje de madera de pino (Palet), puede ser visto desde una perspectiva de negocio futuro. Se utiliz\u00f3 el m\u00e9todo de investigaci\u00f3n descriptivo porque permiti\u00f3 evaluar las caracter\u00edsticas de la madera de pino y relacionarla como un potencial negocio para emprenderlo. Se aplic\u00f3 una encuesta direccionada a los hogares para determinar su opini\u00f3n de la reutilizaci\u00f3n de la madera de pino en productos novedosos, adem\u00e1s de recurrir al criterio de diferentes profesionales que les gusta adquirir productos realizados con el pino, otro segmento de comercializaci\u00f3n de estos productos realizados con el reciclaje puede ser, muebles y enseres de oficina, adornos entre otros. La investigaci\u00f3n determin\u00f3 resultados significativos sobre la necesidad de reciclar aportando las bases necesarias para crear negocios en el que ciertas familias puedan beneficiarse. recycling; waste; wood; business; environment; reciclaje; desechos; madera; negocio; ambiente INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Enero - Abril, 2020)), pags. 150-165 Caisa Yucailla, Elias David; Padilla Mart\u00ednez, Mario Patricio; R\u00edos Lara, Geovanny Fabricio"},{"id":"41703fbe514fc1114df64bf55f3de655911b320e83e138c0f8ee23a856f27d25","content":"Introducci\u00f3n de marca de banano org\u00e1nico en el mercado ecuatoriano The purpose of the study is to propose a marketing plan to introduce an organic banana brand. The fruit has a potential for consumption growth. The article focuses on proposing bases for banana associations or companies in terms of product marketing. A cross-sectional methodology was applied, with field work and use of instruments such as surveys, interviews, direct observation. The target audience that has been identified are mostly women between the ages of 20 and 40, with monthly salaries exceeding a unified basic salary, belonging to the upper-middle social class, who take care of their own well-being; aimed at the consumption of healthy foods that contribute to environmental sustainability. Regarding the marketing mix, packaging, labeling, value proposition strategies were formulated; the price was estimated based on the costs of the competition; a short channel is proposed between producer, wholesaler and final customer; The defined advertising media are offline and online, guaranteeing the impact and visibility of the product in the market. ; El objetivo del estudio es proponer un plan de marketing para introducir una marca de banano org\u00e1nico. La fruta tiene un potencial de crecimiento de consumo. El art\u00edculo se centra en proponer bases para las asociaciones o empresas bananeras en cuanto a la comercializaci\u00f3n del producto. Se aplic\u00f3 una metodolog\u00eda de tipo transversal, con trabajo de campo y utilizaci\u00f3n de instrumentos como encuestas, entrevistas, observaci\u00f3n directa. El p\u00fablico objetivo que se ha identificado son mayoritariamente mujeres entre los 20 a 40 a\u00f1os de edad, con remuneraci\u00f3n mensual superior a un salario b\u00e1sico unificado, pertenecientes a la clase social media-alta, que cuidan del bienestar propio; tendientes al consumo de alimentos saludables que contribuyan a la sostenibilidad medioambiental. Con respecto al mix del marketing se formularon estrategias de packaging, etiquetado, propuesta de valor; se estim\u00f3 el precio en base a los costos de la competencia; se propone un canal corto entre productor, mayorista y cliente final; los medios publicitarios definidos son offline y online, garantizando el impacto y visibilidad del producto en el mercado. environment analysis; organic banana; target; marketing mix; an\u00e1lisis del entorno; banano org\u00e1nico; p\u00fablico objetivo INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Enero - Abril, 2020)), pags. 166-183 Villanueva, V\u00edctor Alexander; A\u00f1azco Correa, Cristhian Daniel; Bonisoli, Lorenzo"},{"id":"2c0c4807047e9613b1d7eff11c6575f9db49c1709f9d88895eba7832cf4b79c1","content":"\u201cI\u2019m sorry you don\u2019t flag it when you advertise\u201d: audience and commercial content on the Sofia Barbosa YouTube channel ; \u201cTenho pena que n\u00e3o sinalizes quando fazes publicidade\u201d: audi\u00eancia e conte\u00fado comercial no canal Sofia Barbosa no YouTube The main theme of the article is the context of digital microcelebrity experienced by children and adolescents, particularly on social networking sites such as YouTube. The purpose of the study is to understand how young audiences of the popular Portuguese channel Sofia Barbosa on YouTube construct meaning about the commercial content and authenticity that the youtuber presents. The methodology used is qualitative bias and netnography is employed in analysing 1.961 comments made by subscribers on 10 videos posted between January and October 2018. As a means of better understanding the context of the comments we also analysed the visual, verbal and commercial aspects of the videos. The comments demonstrate a perception on the part of followers of closeness and intimacy in relation to Sofia and a strong acceptance of the commercial content promoted by the young woman. However, critical reflections about the marketing practices of the youtuber can at various times be perceived, namely on the lack of transparency in commercial relations; this presents itself as an opportunity to balance a romanticised view that many subscribers have of microcelebrities with a more rational understanding of the industry that sustains them. ; Este artigo trata do contexto da microcelebriza\u00e7\u00e3o digital vivenciado por crian\u00e7as e adolescentes, nomeadamente, em sites de redes sociais como o YouTube. O objetivo do trabalho est\u00e1 em perceber como as jovens audi\u00eancias do popular canal portugu\u00eas Sofia Barbosa, no YouTube, constroem sentidos sobre os conte\u00fados comerciais e a autenticidade que a youtuber apresenta. A metodologia utilizada tem cariz qualitativo e contou com a netnografia para a an\u00e1lise de 1.961 coment\u00e1rios feitos pelos subscritores em 10 v\u00eddeos publicados entre janeiro e outubro de 2018. Como forma de melhor compreender o contexto em que estavam inseridos os coment\u00e1rios, analisamos tamb\u00e9m os aspetos visuais, verbais e comerciais dos v\u00eddeos. Os coment\u00e1rios demonstram uma perce\u00e7\u00e3o de proximidade e intimidade por parte dos seguidores em rela\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0 Sofia e uma forte aceita\u00e7\u00e3o do conte\u00fado comercial promovido pela jovem. No entanto, percebe-se em v\u00e1rios momentos uma reflexividade cr\u00edtica em rela\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0s pr\u00e1ticas mercadol\u00f3gicas da youtuber, nomeadamente no que diz respeito \u00e0 falta de transpar\u00eancia nas rela\u00e7\u00f5es comerciais, o que se apresenta como uma oportunidade para equilibrar uma vis\u00e3o romantizada que muitos subscritores t\u00eam das microcelebridades com uma compreens\u00e3o mais racional sobre a ind\u00fastria que os sustenta.  Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o e Sociedade; vol. 37 (2020): Crian\u00e7as, jovens e media: perspetivas atuais; 93-107 ; Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o e Sociedade; Vol 37 (2020): Children, youth and media: current perspectives; 93-107 ; 2183-3575 ; 1645-2089 Carvalho, Barbara Janiques de; Mar\u00f4po, Lidia"},{"id":"176b94e73cda0b30269ff03a7d21c3a29901885d67db994dcbf313eb87fb4636","content":"Traveler segmentation through social media for intercultural marketing purposes: the case of Halkidiki This paper aims to present a methodology for the segmentation of travelers by studying social media profiles and extracting information on their preferences and demographic traits. Through the study of the sample\u2019s social media profiles (Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter), information about travelers\u2019 demographics and preferences are combined for the segmentation of the tourists visiting a Greek region. From the analysis of the data, 10 preference-based segments occur, while the cultural-based division corresponds to the main national groups visiting the region. Wirtschaft; Economics; customer segmentation; customer profiling; digital marketing; intercultural marketing; Marketing; Tourismus; Soziale Medien; interkulturelle Kommunikation; tourism; social media; intercultural communication; 20400; 40200; 10900 Journal of Tourism, Heritage & Services Marketing ; 5 ; 1 ; 15-23 Mavragani, Eleni; Nikolaidou, Paraskevi; Theodoraki, Efi"},{"id":"35af5c0bbd373178fdcbdefe2f4ac8eab4390a2a66e1c25c1c090f42e6841431","content":"MARKETING DIGITAL E COMPORTAMENTO DO CONSUMIDOR: Evid\u00eancias no mercado de varejo de vestu\u00e1rio de Cuiab\u00e1-MT Com a mudan\u00e7a nas rela\u00e7\u00f5es sociais e o surgimento de novos canais de intera\u00e7\u00f5es, passou a ser uma necessidade para as empresas conhecer o comportamento deste novo consumidor altamente conectado, e assim, conhecer as influ\u00eancias que levam a comprar determinado produto. O marketing digital apresenta-se como uma nova maneira de intera\u00e7\u00e3o da empresa informar seu consumidor sobre seu produto, por meio de diversas a\u00e7\u00f5es, tais como, marketing de conte\u00fado, marketing de m\u00eddias sociais e ferramentas de monitoramento e segmenta\u00e7\u00e3o. Dessa forma, o presente estudo tem por objetivo principal analisar como o marketing digital influencia a decis\u00e3o de compra de consumidores do varejo de vestu\u00e1rio de Cuiab\u00e1-MT, buscando identificar as estrat\u00e9gias utilizadas pelas empresas, analisar o comportamento de consumo, destacando os influenciadores de decis\u00e3o. Para tanto, foi realizada uma pesquisa mista a partir de tr\u00eas entrevistas, sendo duas com gestores de lojas do segmento estudado e uma com um especialista do assunto, e realizado um levantamento (survey) junto aos consumidores da regi\u00e3o estudada. Os principais resultados mostram que os consumidores em sua maioria n\u00e3o s\u00e3o influenciados por a\u00e7\u00f5es de marketing digital, por\u00e9m, as empresas reconhecem a import\u00e2ncia deste para que o cliente a encontre, destacando a cria\u00e7\u00e3o de relacionamentos. Comportamento do consumidor; Influ\u00eancias de compra; Marketing Digital; Varejo de vestu\u00e1rio Journal Study and Research in Administration; Vol. 4 No. 2 (2020): Maio-Agosto (2020); 95-118 ; Revista Estudos e Pesquisas em Administra\u00e7\u00e3o; v. 4 n. 2 (2020): Maio-Agosto (2020); 95-118 ; 2594-7559 ; 10.30781\/repad.v4i2 Silva, Marcos J\u00fanior de Figueiredo; Trigueiro, Francisco Mirialdo Chaves; Thiago, Fernando"},{"id":"ff02aac6933a77ea0c1f05c218893df7dbaa5338264edff69b5a1db16e338635","content":"ACTIVITY OF YOUNG PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES IN THE DIGITAL ENVIRONMENT Young people with disabilities are often socially inactive because their participation in social and economic processes is limited. In order to reduce this, digital technologies are important, the use of which allows any individual to engage in various types of activities (educational, cultural, economic, etc.).Objective of the paper: to analyze the results of exploratory research on the activity of young people with disabilities in the digital environment. Methods: questionnaire, focus discussion.The results suggest that support and education measures require a differentiated approach, in which it is important to determine the level of interests and digital competence of each young person with disabilities, clearly set goals that can be adapted to individual needs, tasks according to individual abilities\/skills. This means working in small groups or individually. young people with disabilities; digital technologies; activity in the digital environment Education Reform: Education Content Research and Implementation Problems; Vol 1 (2020): Education Reform: Education Content Research and Implementation Problems; 33-41 ; 2661-5266 ; 2661-5258 Usca, Svetlana; Vindece, Aija"},{"id":"5c17c2214581a3d7a6dfa561a5ff145610eed8a74d0af2c0b603afeb56f56b9d","content":"Social media for cultural communication: A critical investigation of museums\u2019 Instagram practices Purpose: The purpose of the study is to investigate the use of Instagram by museums in the Greek cultural scene. Specifically, the study focuses on examining the use of Instagram by museum communication professionals and aims at carrying out a twofold investigation: Firstly, if and how the Instagram is used to reach out to their visitors and secondly, the public response to this type of communication. Methods: A list of all archaeological museums in Greece was obtained and related Instagram accounts were retrieved. The dataset structure was enhanced by eleven variables, which were measured and visualized by a descriptive statistics analysis. Inter-variable correlations, normality and equality tests were also performed. Moreover, a linear predictive model for the number of museum tags was investigated. Results: Only one museum in Greece maintains an Instagram account. Visitors usually tag museum exhibits or people and exhibits on the photographs they upload on their personal accounts. T-tests and Mann-Whitney U tests revealed equal distributions for all variables between central and peripheral museums. Implications:Museum officials have not seized the opportunity offered by social media and especially Instagram today. Their importance seems to be underestimated. With respect to the linear model derived, results suggest that more features should be surveyed; this could be the subject of future research studies. Publizistische Medien; Journalismus,Verlagswesen; Sozialwissenschaften; Soziologie; News media; journalism; publishing; Social sciences; sociology; anthropology; Instagram; interaktive; elektronische Medien; Freizeitforschung; Freizeitsoziologie; Interactive; electronic Media; Leisure Research; Museum; Soziale Medien; Digitale Medien; Marketing; Griechenland; social media; digital media; Greece; 20400; 40200 Journal of Tourism, Heritage & Services Marketing ; 6 ; 2 ; 38-44 Amanatidis, Dimitrios; Mylona, Ifigeneia; Mamalis, Spyridon; Kamenidou, Irene (Eirini)"},{"id":"6c02c7e76004c1b6e7cd45617697eda34ce8b130becc17bec9bcaadb8633ebf1","content":"THE IMPACTS OF ONLINE SOCIAL NETWORKS ON ACCOMMODATION PREFERENCES: THE CASE OF TURKEY ; \u00c7EVR\u0130M\u0130\u00c7\u0130 SOSYAL A\u011eLARIN KONAKLAMA TERC\u0130HLER\u0130 \u00dcZER\u0130NE ETK\u0130LER\u0130: T\u00dcRK\u0130YE \u00d6RNE\u011e\u0130 Online social networks directly influence the sectorsby shaping the preferences of individuals. In this respect, it is not acoincidence that social media is seen as a digital marketing tool today. Inthis context, this study aims to examine the impacts of online social networkson accommodation preferences of tourists with a country case analysis. Inaccordance with this purpose, a questionnaire has been conducted with a largesample of 497 respondents. Data has been analysed using the frequencydistributions, One-Way ANOVA Test, Tamhane t Test and Pearson CorrelationAnalysis. The main findings indicate that Turkish tourists use online socialnetworks frequently, they intend to share their experiences and also there aredifferences in research and sharing attitudes as to education level. This studyintends to make a contribution to the related literature by providing detailedevidences with a large sample from Turkey. ; \u00c7evrimi\u00e7i sosyal a\u011flar,bireylerin tercihlerini \u015fekillendirerek sekt\u00f6rleri do\u011frudan etkilerler. Buba\u011flamda, sosyal medyan\u0131n g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde bir pazarlama arac\u0131 olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcl\u00fcyor olmas\u0131bir tesad\u00fcf de\u011fildir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma, \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i sosyal a\u011flar\u0131n turistlerinkonaklama tercihleri \u00fczerine etkilerini \u00fclke bazl\u0131 bir analiz ile ara\u015ft\u0131rmay\u0131ama\u00e7lamaktad\u0131r. Bu ama\u00e7 do\u011frultusunda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, 497 kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131dan olu\u015fan geni\u015fbir \u00f6rnekleme dair anket uygulamas\u0131 sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na yer verilmektedir. Anketsonucunda elde edilen veriler frekans da\u011f\u0131l\u0131mlar\u0131, Tek Y\u00f6nl\u00fc ANOVA Testi,Tamhane t Testi ve Pearson Korelasyon Analizi kullan\u0131larak analiz edilmektedir.Temel bulgular, T\u00fcrk turistlerin \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i sosyal a\u011flar\u0131 s\u0131kl\u0131klakulland\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131, tecr\u00fcbelerini bu a\u011flarda payla\u015fma e\u011filiminde olduklar\u0131n\u0131 veayr\u0131ca ara\u015ft\u0131rma ve payla\u015f\u0131m tutumlar\u0131nda e\u011fitime g\u00f6re farkl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131n s\u00f6zkonusu oldu\u011funu i\u015faret etmektedir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma, T\u00fcrkiye\u2019den geni\u015f bir \u00f6rneklemedair veriler ile elde edilmi\u015f detayl\u0131 bulgular sunarak ilgili literature katk\u0131yapmay\u0131 hedeflemektedir. Key Words: Social Networks,Tourism,Accommodation,Survey,Turkey; Sosyal A\u011flar,Turizm,Konaklama,Anket,T\u00fcrkiye Volume: 11, Issue: 1 99-115 ; 1309-887X ; 2149-0465 ; Ege Stratejik Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar Dergisi T\u00dcRKCAN, Burcu"},{"id":"6da9fba2b87e87030f534a29374a712fa972fdfe3ed8f4a7e3ca3322de127bbf","content":"Dijital Pazarlama ile Haz\u0131r Giyim Sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde Pazarlama \u0130leti\u015fimi Ba\u011flam\u0131nda Tutundurma Faaliyetlerine Y\u00f6nelik \u0130nceleme ; Review of Promotion Activities in The Context of Marketing Communication in Digital Marketing with Apparel Industry G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde k\u00fcreselle\u015fme ve teknolojinin geli\u015fimine ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak her alanda meydana gelen de\u011fi\u015fimler, \u00fcretim bi\u00e7imlerine yans\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 gibi t\u00fcketici istek ve beklentilerine de yans\u0131maktad\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla firmalar t\u00fcketici istek ve ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131na an\u0131nda cevap verebilmek i\u00e7in teknolojinin sunmu\u015f oldu\u011fu imk\u00e2nlar\u0131 en iyi \u015fekilde kullanarak ya\u015fanan de\u011fi\u015fimlere uyum sa\u011flayabilmelidir. Do\u011fru hedef kitleye ula\u015f\u0131labilmesi i\u00e7in de firmalar\u0131n dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131 aktif bir \u015fekilde kullanabilmesi gerekmektedir.Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada T\u00fcrkiye haz\u0131r giyim sekt\u00f6r\u00fc ve dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131 ile ilgili literat\u00fcr incelemesi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olup ayr\u0131ca haz\u0131r giyim sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n kullan\u0131lmas\u0131 ile sa\u011flanacak olan avantajlara de\u011finilmi\u015ftir. ; Today, the changes that occur in all areas due to globalization and the development of technology are reflected in the forms of production as well as in the demands and expectations of consumers. Therefore, companies should be able to adapt to the changes experienced by using the facilities provided by technology in the best way in order to respond to the demands and needs of consumers instantly. In order to reach the right target audience, companies need to be able to actively use their digital marketing practices.In this study, literature review of Turkish apparel sector and digital marketing applications was made and the advantages that will be achieved by using digital marketing applications in apparel industry were mentioned. Haz\u0131r Giyim,dijital pazarlama,dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131; Apparel Industry,Digital Marketing,Digital Marketing Applications Volume: 2, Issue: 1 21-29 ; 2687-5268 ; Turkish Journal of Fashion Design and Management TA\u015eTEPE, \u00d6zlem"},{"id":"9e692a08d2f2581c7d9df295b3421a5ef108447347ec760ea07e886ef6f504be","content":"An\u00e1lisis comparativo sobre el emprendimiento de los estudiantes en los distintos programas de licenciatura de la UACyA - UAN This research aim is to show an analysis of the interest in entrepreneurship of the students who are studying the last semester of the university degree. A study with a quantitative approach was proposed, with a simple transversal descriptive method. For this purpose, documentary research was carried out; For the data collection, the survey technique was used. The information comes from a sample of 183 students from the degrees of the Academic Unit of Accounting and Administration of the Autonomous University of Nayarit (UACyA-UAN), in Mexico. The tabulation and analysis are shown using the SPSS statistical program. Among the most important results, it is mentioned that, with regard to gender, the Bachelor of Marketing is the most frequent in males (55.56%) and in the desire of their students to undertake (36%). Concerning the influence of the subjects of entrepreneurship, the appreciation of the Degree in International Business shows 100%. Likewise, they will prevail over the university as influential for business creation. The academies should continue to work in a collegial manner to support and encourage students to be entrepreneurs.Keywords:Entrepreneurship, University, Students, Influences. ; El objetivo de esta investigaci\u00f3n, es mostrar un an\u00e1lisis del inter\u00e9s sobre el emprendimiento, de los estudiantes que cursan el \u00faltimo semestre de la carrera universitaria. Se plante\u00f3 un estudio con enfoque cuantitativo, de m\u00e9todo descriptivo transversal simple.Para tal efecto se llev\u00f3 a cabo la investigaci\u00f3n documental; para la recolecci\u00f3n de datos se utiliz\u00f3 la t\u00e9cnica de encuestaLa informaci\u00f3n proviene de una muestra de 183 alumnos de las licenciaturas de la Unidad Acad\u00e9mica de Contadur\u00eda y Administraci\u00f3n de la Universidad Aut\u00f3noma de Nayarit (UACyA-UAN), en M\u00e9xico.La tabulaci\u00f3n y an\u00e1lisis se muestran mediante el programa estad\u00edstico SPSS. Entre los resultados m\u00e1s importantes, se menciona que, con respecto al g\u00e9nero, la Licenciatura en Mercadotecnia es la de mayor frecuencia en el sexo masculino (55.56%) y en el deseo de sus estudiantes por emprender (36%). En relaci\u00f3n a la influencia de las materias de emprendedurismo, la apreciaci\u00f3n de la Licenciatura en Negocios Internacionales muestra un 100%. As\u00ed mismo, preponderan a la universidad como influyente para la creaci\u00f3n de negocios.Se observa la conveniencia de que las Academias contin\u00faen trabajando de manera colegiada para apoyar y animar a los estudiantes a ser emprendedores.Palabras clave: Emprendimiento, Universidad, Estudiantes, Influencias.doi: https:\/\/doi.org\/10.36825\/RITI.08.15.010 Emprendimiento; universidad; estudiantes; influencias; Entrepreneurship; university; students; influences Revista de Investigaci\u00f3n en Tecnolog\u00edas de la Informaci\u00f3n: RITI, ISSN 2387-0893, Vol. 8, N\u00ba. 15, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Enero-Junio), pags. 105-113 Gonz\u00e1lez Hern\u00e1ndez, Maricruz; Su\u00e1rez Flores, Marina; Bogar\u00edn Correa, Mar\u00eda Romelia; Aguirre Bravo, Ana Alessandra"},{"id":"275635fe48c9a0a5e2ab95dd72a8894d9675e552b867d689b82af0e73b0592ef","content":"Imagen del destino desde la perspectiva del turista The tourist destination image influences the perceived quality, satisfaction and experience of visitors\u2019 holidays. The objective of the present study was to analyze the formation of the tourist destination image, through the systematic review of research reports which consider the combination of the three continuous bipolar elements. The meta-analysis was carried out based on previous studies in different fields such as leisure, hotel, tourism and marketing. The meta-analytic process of 46 articles was developed through the random analysis of their effects. It is emphasized that the continuum with the most representativeness in the target image is the common-unique element. It is shown that tourists make their decision to visit a place based on common functional and psychological characteristics and those unique and exclusive characteristics that a destination provides. Therefore, the results of the study contribute greatly to the management of destination marketing. ; La imagen del destino tur\u00edstico influye en la calidad percibida, la satisfacci\u00f3n y la experiencia de las vacaciones de los visitantes. El objetivo del estudio fue analizar la formaci\u00f3n de dicha imagen mediante la revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica de informes de investigaci\u00f3n que consideran la combinaci\u00f3n de los tres continuos bipolares. Se llev\u00f3 a cabo el meta an\u00e1lisis sobre la base de estudios previos en distintos campos, como ocio, hoteler\u00eda, turismo y marketing. El proceso meta anal\u00edtico de 46 art\u00edculos se desarroll\u00f3 a partir del an\u00e1lisis de efectos aleatorios. Se destaca que el continuo con mayor representatividad en la imagen del destino es el com\u00fan-\u00fanico. Se demuestra que el turista toma su decisi\u00f3n de visita con base en caracter\u00edsticas comunes funcionales, psicol\u00f3gicas y aquellas caracter\u00edsticas \u00fanicas y exclusivas que proporciona un destino. Por lo tanto, los resultados del estudio aportan significativamente a la gesti\u00f3n del marketing de destino. Systematic review; meta-analysis; three continuous; destination image; Revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica; meta an\u00e1lisis; tres continuos; imagen del destino Anuario Turismo y Sociedad, ISSN 0120-7555, Vol. 26, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Enero-Junio), pags. 45-66 Castro Analuiza, Juan Carlos; Palacios P\u00e9rez, Jheimy Morelia; Plazarte Alomoto, Lauro Vladimiro"},{"id":"f1b3889e0c15324a13cd9de8cc55219410b0f1829d39d987b1a80b7ebecd99be","content":"Turismo de salud y redes colaborativas en innovaci\u00f3n: caso los algodones, Baja California The analysis of tourism is expressed through complex systems comprised of the stringing together of various stakeholders. For this reason, its operation depends on the effective management of the relationships that occur between the different components of the tourism system. With this in mind, this research is a case study that seeks to discuss the collaboration networks between health tourism stakeholders and stakeholders in Los Algodones, Baja California, which has given way to the generation of product \/ service, process, organization and marketing innovation. Therefore, a qualitative study was carried out that consisted in the development of a Panel Discussion that brought together agents interested in the health services tourism system; where they expressed opinions on the strategies of collaboration between actors and stakeholders in health tourism and the innovative actions undertaken to maximize the competitiveness and sustainability of the tourism activity; concluding that health tourism in Los Algodones is in transition stages between cooperation and collaboration between interested agents and in the process of consolidation as an open and highly competitive system. ; El an\u00e1lisis del turismo se expresa por medio de sistemas complejos compuestos por el aglutinamiento de diversos agentes interesados, por esta raz\u00f3n, su funcionamiento depende de la gesti\u00f3n efectiva de las relaciones que se producen entre los distintos componentes del sistema tur\u00edstico. Bajo este entendido, la presente investigaci\u00f3n es un estudio de caso que busca discutir las redes de colaboraci\u00f3n entre actores y stakeholders de turismo de salud en Los Algodones, Baja California, que han permitido la generaci\u00f3n de innovaci\u00f3n en productos\/servicios, procesos, organizaci\u00f3n y mercadotecnia. Por lo anterior, se llev\u00f3 a cabo un estudio de tipo cualitativo que consisti\u00f3 en el desarrollo de una mesa de discusi\u00f3n que reuni\u00f3 a agentes interesados en el sistema tur\u00edstico de servicios de salud. En dicha mesa se expresaron opiniones sobre las estrategias de colaboraci\u00f3n entre actores y stakeholders de turismo de salud y las acciones emprendidas en innovaci\u00f3n para maximizar la competitividad y la sostenibilidad de la actividad tur\u00edstica. Se concluye que el turismo de salud en Los Algodones se encuentra en etapa de transici\u00f3n entre la cooperaci\u00f3n y la colaboraci\u00f3n entre agentes interesados y en proceso de consolidaci\u00f3n como sistema abierto y altamente competitivo. Stakeholders\u00b4; relations; social network analysis; innovation; health tourism; Relaciones entre stakeholders; an\u00e1lisis de redes sociales; innovaci\u00f3n; turismo de salud Anuario Turismo y Sociedad, ISSN 0120-7555, Vol. 26, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Enero-Junio), pags. 67-88 Zerme\u00f1o Flores, Sonia Guadalupe; Amaya Molinar, Carlos Mario; Cuevas Contreras, Tom\u00e1s Jes\u00fas"},{"id":"3af60c2f5947c7ab8ff4cc730a3efd0c7d002db671ce9c0c3e5b2aaedcc55e0b","content":"Soft System Methodology (SSM) Analysis to Increase the Number of Prospective Students The competition between campus, whether it\u2019s a public college and private college in Central Java, is very tight with the increasing number of interested students for prospective students from various regions. The close competition requires many campuses to compete to provide the best facilities and services. The research objective is expected to support the \"XY\" university promotion strategy to help the university in the knowledge capture process. Data collection was carried out using the group discussion forum (FGD) method with a structured interview process for university leaders, university officials, marketing departments, and students. The technique used in this study is a soft system methodology (SSM). The results of this study model knowledge capture (KC) on the \"XY\" university promotion strategy and produce knowledge documentation that provides benefits in making policy strategies and has an impact on increasing the number of prospective new college students by optimizing digital marketing. ; The competition between campus, whether it\u2019s a public college and private college in Central Java, is very tight with the increasing number of interested students for prospective students from various regions. The close competition requires many campuses to compete to provide the best facilities and services. The research objective is expected to support the \"XY\" university promotion strategy to help the university in the knowledge capture process. Data collection was carried out using the group discussion forum (FGD) method with a structured interview process for university leaders, university officials, marketing departments, and students. The technique used in this study is a soft system methodology (SSM). The results of this study model knowledge capture (KC) on the \"XY\" university promotion strategy and produce knowledge documentation that provides benefits in making policy strategies and has an impact on increasing the number of prospective new college students by optimizing digital marketing. Promotion Strategy; Soft System Methodology; Knowledge Capture INTENSIF: Jurnal Ilmiah Penelitian dan Penerapan Teknologi Sistem Informasi; Vol. 4 No. 1 (2020): February 2020; 63-74 ; INTENSIF: Jurnal Ilmiah Penelitian dan Penerapan Teknologi Sistem Informasi; Vol 4 No 1 (2020): February 2020; 63-74 ; 2549-6824 ; 2580-409X Nikhlis, Neilin; Iriani, Ade; Hartomo, Kristoko Dwi"},{"id":"088ed33e09c7174a889fa5218b22b5209d877157751e9879476e8f7d15536b47","content":"Empowering The Communities in The Coastal Areas Of Lamongan East Java to Improve Their Welfare ; Poder A Las Comunidades En Las Zonas Costeras De Lamongan East Java Para Mejorar Su Bienestar ; Capacitar As Comunidades Nas Zonas Costeiras Do Java Do Lamongano Para Melhorar Seu Bem-Estar East Java is a Province that has the potentials to grow and develop its Micro, Small, Medium Enterprises (Hence: MSMEs) in each of itscity\/regency both located in the coastal and inland regions. The number of MSMEs in Indonesia is currently around 59.2 million (CNN Indonesia \/ Safir Makki). Three point seventy-nine (3.79) million of which have utilized the online platform in marketing their products, composing about about 8% of the total MSME entrepreneurs in Indonesia. In the digital era 4.0, of course, MSMEs entrepreneurs must also follow the current digital developments. The number of MSMEs in Lamongan City is 252,734 units. Some of these are based on the coastal areas, and they have enormous economic potentials,yet they have not yet grown optimally due to the constraints of management quality, access to funding, managerial models, business opportunities, and accessto information. For this reason, the researchers feel the urge to design an empowering model for the MSMEs in the coastal area communities to develop them more effectively as to foster the growth of MSMEs centers which are expected to contribute a lot to the local government, especially in Lamongan, East Java. The objectives of the research are: (a) identifying the characteristics of the community empowerment models (b) formulating a model of community empowerment to set up effective MSME centers (c) testing the effectiveness of community empowerment models in developing MSME centers (d) evaluating and refining the community empowerment models in developing MSME centers, and eventually formulating an effective management model for MSME centers in the coastal areas in East Java. The research makes use of a descriptive approach combined with quantitative methods. The object of the research is Brondong Village in Brondong District, Lamongan Regency. The results of this research reveal that the model of the community empowerment pattern in the MSME centers in Brondong Village in Brondong Lamongan District, in the coastal area of East Java is not yet effective, and that improvements in the aspects of community empowerment, household asset management, social interaction, institutions, and strategies for the community empowerment are imperative. And joint guidance and assistance from the local government, as well as its related agencies, and higher education institutions are necessary ; East Java es una provincia que tiene el potencial de crecer y desarrollar sus micro, peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas (por lo tanto: MIPYME) en cada una de sus ciudades \/ regencias ubicadas tanto en las regiones costeras como en las del interior. El n\u00famero de MIPYME en Indonesia es actualmente de alrededor de 59,2 millones (CNN Indonesia \/ Safir Makki). Tres puntos setenta y nueve (3.79) millones de los cuales han utilizado la plataforma en l\u00ednea para comercializar sus productos, componiendo aproximadamente el 8% del total de empresarios MIPYME en Indonesia. En la era digital 4.0, por supuesto, los empresarios de MIPYME tambi\u00e9n deben seguir los desarrollos digitales actuales. El n\u00famero de MIPYMES en la ciudad de Lamongan es de 252,734 unidades. Algunos de estos se basan en las \u00e1reas costeras, y tienen un enorme potencial econ\u00f3mico, sin embargo, a\u00fan no han crecido de manera \u00f3ptima debido a las limitaciones de la calidad de la gesti\u00f3n, el acceso a la financiaci\u00f3n, los modelos de gesti\u00f3n, las oportunidades comerciales y el acceso a la informaci\u00f3n. Por esta raz\u00f3n, los investigadores sienten la necesidad de dise\u00f1ar un modelo de empoderamiento para las MIPYME en las comunidades de la zona costera para desarrollarlas de manera m\u00e1s efectiva y fomentar el crecimiento de los centros de MIPYMES que se espera que contribuyan mucho al gobierno local, especialmente en Lamongan. , Java Oriental. Los objetivos de la investigaci\u00f3n son: (a) identificar las caracter\u00edsticas de los modelos de empoderamiento comunitario (b) formular un modelo de empoderamiento comunitario para establecer centros efectivos de MIPYME (c) probar la efectividad de los modelos de empoderamiento comunitario en el desarrollo de centros de MIPYME (d) evaluando y refinando los modelos de empoderamiento de la comunidad en el desarrollo de centros de MIPYME, y eventualmente formulando un modelo de gesti\u00f3n efectivo para centros de MIPYME en las \u00e1reas costeras en Java Oriental. La investigaci\u00f3n utiliza un enfoque descriptivo combinado con m\u00e9todos cuantitativos. El objeto de la investigaci\u00f3n es el pueblo de Brondong en el distrito de Brondong, Regencia de Lamongan. Los resultados de esta investigaci\u00f3n revelan que el modelo del patr\u00f3n de empoderamiento de la comunidad en los centros de MIPYME en la aldea de Brondong en el distrito de Brondong Lamongan, en la zona costera de Java Oriental, a\u00fan no es efectivo, y que las mejoras en los aspectos del empoderamiento de la comunidad, activos del hogar La gesti\u00f3n, la interacci\u00f3n social, las instituciones y las estrategias para el empoderamiento de la comunidad son imprescindibles. Y la orientaci\u00f3n y asistencia conjunta del gobierno local, as\u00ed como sus agencias relacionadas, y las instituciones de educaci\u00f3n superior son necesarias ; East Java \u00e9 uma prov\u00edncia com potencial para crescer e desenvolver suas micro, pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas (da\u00ed: MPME) em cada cidade \/ regi\u00e3o, ambas localizadas nas regi\u00f5es costeira e interior. Atualmente, o n\u00famero de MPME na Indon\u00e9sia \u00e9 de cerca de 59,2 milh\u00f5es (CNN Indon\u00e9sia \/ Safir Makki). Tr\u00eas ponto setenta e nove (3,79) milh\u00f5es utilizaram a plataforma on-line no marketing de seus produtos, compondo cerca de 8% do total de empres\u00e1rios de MPME na Indon\u00e9sia. Na era digital 4.0, \u00e9 claro, os empres\u00e1rios de MPMEs tamb\u00e9m devem acompanhar os desenvolvimentos digitais atuais. O n\u00famero de MPME na cidade de Lamongan \u00e9 de 252.734 unidades. Alguns deles s\u00e3o baseados nas \u00e1reas costeiras e t\u00eam um enorme potencial econ\u00f4mico, mas ainda n\u00e3o cresceram de maneira ideal devido \u00e0s restri\u00e7\u00f5es de qualidade da gest\u00e3o, acesso ao financiamento, modelos gerenciais, oportunidades de neg\u00f3cios e acesso \u00e0 informa\u00e7\u00e3o. Por esse motivo, os pesquisadores sentem o desejo de elaborar um modelo empoderador para as MPME nas comunidades da zona costeira, para desenvolv\u00ea-las de forma mais eficaz, a fim de promover o crescimento dos centros de MPME que, espera-se, contribuam muito para o governo local, especialmente em Lamongan. , Java Leste. Os objetivos da pesquisa s\u00e3o: (a) identificar as caracter\u00edsticas dos modelos de empoderamento da comunidade (b) formular um modelo de empoderamento da comunidade para estabelecer centros eficazes de MPME (c) testar a efic\u00e1cia dos modelos de empoderamento da comunidade no desenvolvimento de centros de MPME (d) avaliar e refinar os modelos de empoderamento da comunidade no desenvolvimento de centros para MPME e, eventualmente, formular um modelo de gerenciamento eficaz para centros de MPME nas \u00e1reas costeiras de East Java. A pesquisa utiliza uma abordagem descritiva combinada com m\u00e9todos quantitativos. O objetivo da pesquisa \u00e9 a vila de Brondong, no distrito de Brondong, na regi\u00e3o de Lamongan. Os resultados desta pesquisa revelam que o modelo do padr\u00e3o de empoderamento da comunidade nos centros de MPME na vila de Brondong, no distrito de Brondong Lamongan, na zona costeira de Java Oriental, ainda n\u00e3o \u00e9 eficaz, e que as melhorias nos aspectos de empoderamento da comunidade, patrim\u00f4nio familiar gest\u00e3o, intera\u00e7\u00e3o social, institui\u00e7\u00f5es e estrat\u00e9gias para o empoderamento da comunidade s\u00e3o imperativos. E orienta\u00e7\u00e3o e assist\u00eancia conjuntas do governo local, bem como de suas ag\u00eancias relacionadas e institui\u00e7\u00f5es de ensino superior s\u00e3o necess\u00e1rias. Community Empowerment; Training Development; Community Empowerment Model; Empoderamento da Comunidade; Treinamento e Desenvolvimento; Modelo de empoderamento da comunidade; Empoderamiento de la comunidad; Entrenamiento y desarrollo; Modelo de Empoderamiento Comunitario Research, Society and Development; Vol. 9 No. 5; e04952745 ; Research, Society and Development; Vol. 9 N\u00fam. 5; e04952745 ; Research, Society and Development; v. 9 n. 5; e04952745 ; 2525-3409 Handini, Sri; Sukesi, Sukesi; Astuti, Hartati Kanty"},{"id":"130b8eecb04cd164524ffc9c00cc2bde7bcdeb2689184e5d145ec67330fe9258","content":"INTEGRAL MARKETING TECHNOLOGICAL PLAN APPLIED TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF VETERINARIES, IN THE CITY OF RIOBAMBA ; PLAN TECNOL\u00d3GICO DE MARKETING INTEGRAL APLICADO AL DESARROLLO DE VETERINARIAS, EN LA CIUDAD DE RIOBAMBA The migration of companies to digital platforms has become imperative, the development of a technological plan was carried out with the purpose of proposing an alternative that efficiently increases the sales of products and services related to the upbringing and quality of life of the pets of the city of Riobamba. Nowadays, the acquisition of pets as family members, as companions of affection, friends of walking, sports or care, has become common and a basis for this is the desire to link veterinarians with pet owners. The creation of the plan, makes it easier for pet owners to find a stable place for their medical care, the purchase of pet supplies, and the benefits that locals can offer. In the absence of a record of the number of pets, the calculation for the surveys was made from the PEA of the city of Riobamba, where a number of 382 people was obtained and for the veterinary and related surveys a total of 45. The proposal of this application aims to help veterinary owners with the influx of frequent customers. Given this, a saving was obtained in the feasibility analysis. ; La migraci\u00f3n de las empresas hacia las plataformas digitales se ha vuelto imperante, el desarrollo de un plan tecnol\u00f3gico se lo realiz\u00f3 con el prop\u00f3sito de proponer una alternativa que incremente de manera eficiente las ventas de los productos y servicios relacionado con la crianza y calidad de vida de las mascotas de la ciudad de Riobamba. Hoy en d\u00eda la adquisici\u00f3n de mascotas como miembros de la familia, como compa\u00f1eros de afecto, amigos de caminata, de deporte o de cuidado, se ha vuelto com\u00fan y a base de esto nace el querer vincular las veterinarias con los due\u00f1os de mascotas. La creaci\u00f3n del plan, plantea el facilitar a los due\u00f1os de las mascotas el encontrar un lugar estable para su atenci\u00f3n m\u00e9dica, compra de art\u00edculos para mascotas, y beneficios que los locales puedan ofrece. Al no existir un registro de n\u00famero de mascotas, el c\u00e1lculo para los encuestas se realiz\u00f3 a partir de la PEA de la ciudad de Riobamba, donde se obtuvo un n\u00famero de 382 personas y para las encuestas a las veterinarios y afines se tuvo un total de 45. La propuesta de \u00e9sta aplicaci\u00f3n pretende ayudar a los due\u00f1os de veterinarias con la afluencia de clientes frecuentes. Ante esto se obtuvo en el an\u00e1lisis de factibilidad un ahorro.  mktDESCUBRE; Vol 1 No 3 (2020): Special Edition 1st International Marketing Congress; 328 - 337 ; 2602-8522 ; 1390-7352 ; 10.36779\/mktdescubre\/v#.# Aguilar Cajas, H\u00e9ctor Oswaldo; Rivera Abarca, Ana Luc\u00eda; Miranda Salazar, Maria Fernanda"},{"id":"cb45231648bfbeb33ae2b11b3992d4302a17f6d1e960ba7a7549bc9238a37b95","content":"Scoping review of studies on food marketing in Latin America: Summary of existing evidence and research gaps OBJECTIVE: To document the evidence about marketing of ultra-processed foods and \u201cnon-alcoholic\u201d beverages in Latin America. METHODS: We performed a structured search of quantitative and qualitative studies in PubMed, SciELO and LILACS, published between January 2000 and May 2017 and conducted in Latin America. We conducted a quality assessment following a standardized tool and a thematic analysis to identify key typologies of marketing across studies RESULTS: Out of 521 studies screened by title and abstract, we included 36 in this review; 27 of them analyzed television advertisement. Other marketing channels studied were food packaging, point of sale and outdoor advertisement. Studies found television advertises foods and beverages that are mostly ultraprocessed foods and have low nutritional value, particularly those promoted during children\u2019s programming. We also observed children have a literal interpretation of images printed on food packaging, so this can be deceiving. Several studies also found proximity to unhealthy foods may increase their consumption. Finally, the thematic analysis identified the following typologies of food marketing: a) television advertisement, b) food packaging marketing, c) marketing strategies at points of sale and d) other marketing strategies. We found almost no advertisements for unprocessed or minimally processed foods such as fruits and vegetables. We did not find any studies on digital marketing conducted in the region. CONCLUSIONS: This review found that the main channel of food marketing was television advertising. This synthesis provides insights to the challenges unhealthy eating represents to the public health of Latin America and identifies knowledge gaps to guide future research.  Revista de Sa\u00fade P\u00fablica; v. 53 (2019); 107 ; Revista de Sa\u00fade P\u00fablica; Vol 53 (2019); 107 ; Revista de Sa\u00fade P\u00fablica; Vol. 53 (2019); 107 ; 1518-8787 ; 0034-8910 Chemas-Velez, Maria Manuela; G\u00f3mez, Luis F.; Velasquez, Alcides; Mora-Plazas, Mercedes; Parra, Diana C."},{"id":"79fbf73d1eb43a2a498dba29c69154fa99ed26f8f96a01ac789513f1543bea1b","content":"HALAL TOURISM PROMOTION USING E-COMMERCE SOCIAL MEDIA ON TOURIST VISIT: \u201cSTUDY IN BENGKULU PROVINCE\u201d The concept of tourism today is divided into two, namely conventional tourism and halal tourism. Halal Tourism is a form of cultural-based tourism that promotes the values and norms of Islamic Sharia as its basic foundation. In this digital age millennials access all information through cyberspace. So as to be able to spread information and capture market share in tourism we can utilize electronic marketing or e-marketing. E-marketing or electronic marketing refers to the application of marketing principles and techniques through electronic media and more specifically the internet. E-commerce is a sales system that developed after the discovery of the Internet. This marketing system can be felt to reach the entire world simultaneously without the need for representative branches in all countries. Besides marketing like this can be done 24 hours without stopping in marketing the products. Bengkulu Province Tourism Office data recorded the number of domestic and foreign tourist arrivals in 2018 of 662,766 visits, 798 visits came from foreign tourists (tourists). In 2019, it is targeted to increase the number of domestic tourist visits to reach 394,265\u2013420,025 and tourists to reach 3,972\u20134,995 visits. With the target of increasing tourist arrivals in Bengkulu, the local government must be more vigorous in terms of tourism promotion in Bengkulu Province. Bengkulu Province which began to face the challenges of tourism was felt to be able to start introducing Halal Tourism as a new Brand in its tourism activities. The difference of this research with the previous one is the independent variable Halal Tourism (X1) by using dimensions: Halal Destination, Halal Public Facilities, Halal Lifestyle, Halal Food in Bengkulu Province. This study uses intervening variables E-Commerce Social Media (Y) which uses dimensions: Context, Communications, Collaboration, Connection to determine the effect on the dependent variable of tourist visits (Z) in Bengkulu Province. This research uses qualitative analysis.The type of data collected in this paper is primary data carried out by distributing questionnaires in the field to get a clear picture of the potential of Halal Tourism using E-Commerce Social Media to increase tourism visits in Bengkulu Province. . The number of samples taken was 150 respondents who met the criteria set by the researcher. The results of the study stated that Halal Tourism (X1) has a significant influence on the variable E-Commerce Social Media (Y). independent variable Halal Tourism (X1) and intervening E-Commerce Social Media (Y) have a significant and partial significant effect on the tourist visit variable (Z). By using the sobel test, the results are obtained that the intervening coefficient has a significant influence on the variable Halal Tourism (X1) on the variable Tourist Visits. Conclusions obtained by researchers that the Government of Bengkulu Province began to be able to introduce halal products in Bengkulu Province, improve existing facilities to make it more Islamic, introduce the Tabot festival which is a traditional warning greeting containing Islamic elements, build sharia hospitality , multiply information about halal food in Bengkulu Province. Such information can be disseminated on the Bengkulu government's tourism website, tourism agency social media accounts, travel agents in Bengkulu Province and outside Bengkulu Province in order to attract local and foreign tourists. halal tourism; e-marketing; social media JELAJAH: Journal of Tourism and Hospitality; Vol. 2 No. 1 (2020); 33 - 44 ; 2685-094X ; 10.33830\/jelajah.v2i1 Damarsiwi, Eska Prima Monique; Indriasari, Nia; Anggraini, Ida"},{"id":"2d2e884e6131da99164bcc30b0890818d384fb579c27572e1c328217525b6704","content":"PAZARLAMADA YEN\u0130 B\u0130R PENCERE: D\u0130J\u0130TAL PAZARLAMA ; A NEW WINDOW IN MARKETING: DIGITAL MARKETING Sosyal a\u011flar\u0131n ve teknolojinin h\u0131zla geli\u015fmesi, i\u015fletmelerin t\u00fcketicilerle ileti\u015fim kurma bi\u00e7imlerinde b\u00fcy\u00fck de\u011fi\u015fikliklere gitmesine neden olmu\u015ftur. \u0130nternet ve dijital pazarlama, m\u00fc\u015fterileri cezbetmek ve elde tutmak i\u00e7in kampanyalarda \u00f6nemli fakt\u00f6rler haline gelmi\u015ftir. Dijital pazarlama bir elektronik cihaz veya internet arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla yap\u0131lan t\u00fcm pazarlama \u00e7abalar\u0131n\u0131 i\u00e7ermektedir. Dijital pazarlama, \u00fcr\u00fcn\/hizmetlerin pazarlanmas\u0131nda ve reklam faaliyetlerinde, geleneksel y\u00f6ntemlere g\u00f6re \u00f6nemli farklar yaratmaktad\u0131r ve ayr\u0131ca g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir kurumsal imaj ve m\u00fc\u015fteri memnuniyetini artt\u0131rmak i\u00e7in kilit oyuncu rol\u00fcn\u00fc g\u00fc\u00e7lendirmektedir. Dijital pazarlaman\u0131n benimsenmesi, \u00f6zellikle k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck i\u015fletmelerin pazarlardaki zorlu rekabet \u015fartlar\u0131nda daha uygun maliyetlerle m\u00fc\u015fterilere ula\u015fmas\u0131, rakipleriyle ve daha b\u00fcy\u00fck i\u015fletmelerle rekabet etmesi i\u00e7in kritiktir. Bu makalenin amac\u0131, dijital pazarlamayla ilgili geni\u015f bir kavramsal \u00e7er\u00e7eve olu\u015fturmakt\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca i\u015fletme y\u00f6neticilerine dijital pazarlama stratejileri, dijital pazarlama kanallar\u0131 ve dijital pazarlama avantajlar\u0131yla ilgili bir rehber olu\u015fturmakt\u0131r. ; The rapid development of social networks and technology has led to major changes in the way businesses communicate with consumers. Internet and digital marketing have become important factors in campaigns to attract and retain customers. Digital marketing involves all marketing efforts made through an electronic device or the Internet. Digital marketing makes significant differences in the marketing of products \/ services and advertising activities compared to traditional methods, and also strengthens the key player role to enhance a strong corporate image and customer satisfaction. The adoption of digital marketing is critical for small businesses to reach customers at more competitive costs in tough competitive conditions in the markets, and to compete with competitors and larger businesses. The purpose of this article is to create a broad conceptual framework related to digital marketing. It is also to create a guide for business managers about digital marketing strategies, digital marketing channels and digital marketing advantages. dijital pazarlama,dijital pazarlama stratejileri,dijital pazarlama kanallar\u0131; digital marketing,digital marketing strategies,digital marketing channels Volume: 3, Issue: 1 63-75 ; 2651-4737 ; Journal of Business in The Digital Age GED\u0130K, Yasemin"},{"id":"144c1c9fd62ac002eb147cea2cc865b12b80a8439f28094888506d11220862fb","content":"Innovation barriers in SMES: an approximation through a systematic review of literature ; Barreras de innovaci\u00f3n en PYMES: una aproximaci\u00f3n a trav\u00e9s de una revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica de literatura ; Barreiras de inova\u00e7\u00e3o nas PME: uma aproxima\u00e7\u00e3o atrav\u00e9s de uma revis\u00e3o sistem\u00e1tica da literatura Innovation is a key factor in the competitiveness of countries and companies. Small and medium-sized companies that do not adopt innovation as part oftheir core strategy run the risk of not being competitive due to falling behind with obsolete products and processes. Innovative companies are decisive for adynamic and competitive economy. The purpose of this research is to identify the different barriers that affect the performance of the innovation process in small and medium-sized enterprises \u2013 PYMES. To analyze the innovation barriers that PYMES face, a review of the existing literature in different parts of the world, including Colombia, was carried out. The importance of this study derives from the fact that very few studies have explored the question of the factors that limit the innovation processes of PYMES, being a topic that offers guidance for future research in a field that is still emerging. ; La innovaci\u00f3n es un factor clave en la competitividad de los pa\u00edses y las empresas. Las peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas que no adoptan la innovaci\u00f3n dentro de su estrategia central corren el riesgo de no ser competitivas debido a quedarse rezagadas con productos y procesos obsoletos. Las empresas innovadoras son determinantes para una econom\u00eda din\u00e1mica y competitiva. El prop\u00f3sito de esta investigaci\u00f3n es identificar las diferentes barreras que afectan el desempe\u00f1odel proceso de innovaci\u00f3n en las peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas - PYMES. Para analizar las barreras de innovaci\u00f3n a las que se enfrentan las PYMES, se realiz\u00f3 una revisi\u00f3n de la literatura existente en diferentes lugares del mundo, incluyendo a Colombia. La importancia de este estudio se deriva del hecho de que muy pocos estudios han explorado la cuesti\u00f3n de los factores que limitan los procesos de innovaci\u00f3n de las PYMES, siendo un tema que ofrece orientaci\u00f3n para futuras investigaciones en un campo que a\u00fan est\u00e1 en emergiendo. ; A inova\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e9 um fator chave na competitividade de pa\u00edses e empresas. As pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas que n\u00e3o adotam a inova\u00e7\u00e3o como parte de suaestrat\u00e9gia principal correm o risco de n\u00e3o serem competitivas devido ao atraso nos produtos e processos obsoletos. Empresas inovadoras s\u00e3o decisivas parauma economia din\u00e2mica e competitiva. O objetivo desta pesquisa \u00e9 identificar as diferentes barreiras que afetam o desempenho do processo de inova\u00e7\u00e3o em pequenas e m\u00e9dias empresas - PME. Para analisar as barreiras \u00e0 inova\u00e7\u00e3oenfrentadas pelas PMEs, foi realizada uma revis\u00e3o da literatura existente em diferentes partes do mundo, incluindo a Col\u00f4mbia. A import\u00e2ncia deste estudo deriva do fato de pouqu\u00edssimos estudos explorarem a quest\u00e3o dos fatores que limitam os processos de inova\u00e7\u00e3o das PMEs, sendo um t\u00f3pico que oferece orienta\u00e7\u00e3o para futuras pesquisas em um campo ainda em desenvolvimento.  Tendencias; Vol. 21 N\u00fam. 1 (2020): Vol. XXI No. 1 Primer Semestre Enero - Junio 2020; 221-237 ; Tendencias; v. 21 n. 1 (2020): Vol. XXI N\u00ba 1 Primeiro Semestre Janeiro - Junho 2020; 221-237 ; Tendencias; Vol 21 No 1 (2020): Vol. XXI No. 1 First Semester January - June 2020; 221-237 ; 2539-0554 ; 0124-8693 Benavides Pupiales, Luis Eduardo; Bola\u00f1os Delgado, Sandra Luc\u00eda"},{"id":"1cc665d9aab8883ab4a13e85ebdd2984be0407c2de33370d4eddd2b1c8e5d086","content":"APLICABILIDADE DO MARKETING DIGITAL COMO MEIO DE PROMO\u00c7\u00c3O DO MARKETING SOCIAL EM MEIO \u00c0 PANDEMIA DA COVID-19 NO CONTEXTO MO\u00c7AMBICANO O marketing \u00e9 uma ferramenta contributiva para a notabilidade de produtos e servi\u00e7os. Os avan\u00e7os tecnol\u00f3gicos permitiram que o marketing migrasse para o digital permitindo a abrang\u00eancia e aproxima\u00e7\u00e3o entre consumidores e vendedores de forma f\u00e1cil, r\u00e1pida e directa. O presente estudo versa sobre a Aplicabilidade do Marketing Digital Como Meio de Promo\u00e7\u00e3o do Marketing Social Em Meio a Pandemia da COVID -19, atrav\u00e9s duma reflex\u00e3o focalizada de Mo\u00e7ambique. Em termos metodol\u00f3gicos, a pesquisa foi orientada no paradigma qualitativo com cunho explorat\u00f3rio, com recurso a pesquisa bibliogr\u00e1fica sobre as teorias de marketing social e digital. Os resultados deste estudo estabelecem que a aplicabilidade do marketing digital, n\u00e3o apenas em Mo\u00e7ambique, como no mundo, num momento em que as tecnologias de informa\u00e7\u00e3o e comunica\u00e7\u00e3o desempenham o papel fulcral para a sustentabilidade de todos sectores, evitando que a crise ganhe o seu espa\u00e7o. A viola\u00e7\u00e3o do Decreto Presidencial \u00e9 uma realidade em Mo\u00e7ambique, tal como relatam as equipes multissectoriais envolvidas no processo de controlo das medidas de preven\u00e7\u00e3o ao v\u00edrus, onde \u00e9 comum o encontro de aglomera\u00e7\u00e3o de pessoas, mau uso de m\u00e1scaras, enchentes nas paragens e dentro dos autocarros, entre outras viola\u00e7\u00f5es. A efectiva\u00e7\u00e3o do marketing social tem impactos relevantes sobre a sociedade, que a partir dos apelos dados as pessoas mudam seu comportamento e acatam rigorosamente os apelos contidos nas campanhas. Diante da problem\u00e1tica referente ao seguimento das medidas de preven\u00e7\u00e3o ao v\u00edrus, o Estado real\u00e7a a continuidade de ac\u00e7\u00f5es que consciencializem os cidad\u00e3os a pautarem pela mudan\u00e7a social. Consciencializa\u00e7\u00e3o; mudan\u00e7a social; Tecnologias de informa\u00e7\u00e3o e comunica\u00e7\u00e3o Revista Cient\u00edfica da UEM: S\u00e9rie Ci\u00eancias Biom\u00e9dicas e Sa\u00fade P\u00fablica; 2020: Edi\u00e7\u00e3o Especial sobre COVID-19 vasco, Sofia Ahamad de Jany"},{"id":"ea3d047a340049adeb30591d8573aaf3b0623d3dd17440a6cb53515be5d54d03","content":"Consideraciones sobre poblaci\u00f3n excedente, trabajo y pobreza: el caso de los cirujas En diferentes lugares del mundo, en ciudades de tama\u00f1o mediano y grande, existen conjuntos relativamente numerosos de individuos y familias que organizan sus vidas alrededor de la basura. En ese contexto, este art\u00edculo, teniendo como foco el trabajo del \u201cciruja\u201d, propone realizar algunas consideraciones, rescatando su comprensi\u00f3n como poblaci\u00f3n excedente, pero que se inserta, a trav\u00e9s de la propia actividad, en la l\u00f3gica de acumulaci\u00f3n capitalista. Es necesario situar la actividad en el contexto de las relaciones sociales que se establecen en el interior del circuito econ\u00f3mico que gira en torno del reciclaje de la basura. De hecho, a pesar de su precariedad, la actividad de los cirujas constituye el primer eslab\u00f3n del circuito econ\u00f3mico que gira en torno del reciclaje, o sea, el extremo informal que abastece materia prima y materiales para su reutilizaci\u00f3n a la industria de reciclaje, pasando por los dep\u00f3sitos de compraventa en el proceso de comercializaci\u00f3n de los materiales, mecanismo por el cual se extrae el trabajo excedente de los cirujas. ; In different places around the world, cities of medium and large size show sets relatively extense of human being and families that organize their lives by means of garbage. In this context, this essay focusing on the work of picker of paper that proposes to carry some considerations out rescuing the comprehension while exceed population, but inserted through its own activity, at capitalist accumulation logic. It starts with the premise that is essential to situate the activity in the context of social relations that estabilishe itself within the economic circuit that revolves around recycling rubbish. As a matter of fact, even in its precariousness, the activity of pickers is the first link in the economic circuit that revolves around for industry of recycling. It means, the informal extreme that provides raw material and materials for reusing, through the intermediaries in the process of marketing of materials, mechanism by which extract the surplus labor from the pickers.  Contextos: Estudios de humanidades y ciencias sociales, ISSN 0719-1014, N\u00ba. 46, 2020 Escurra, Mar\u00eda Fernanda"},{"id":"4c0e41c0afa62c7f08cb2104aba0bf006a8c3eef0db9927b7c984f1524421d89","content":"Pengaruh Promosi Penjualan dan Celebrity Endorser terhadap Niat Beli Fashion Brand Lokal Giyomi pada Generasi Y dan Z Marketing strategies change as technology develops. Marketers are demanded to be more creative in continuing to market their products so they will not be outdone by the times, fashion products are no exception. Giyomi is a local fashion brand that utilizes marketing with digital marketing using celebrity endorsers and offline marketing using sales promotions by holding bazaar tours and giving discounts for its products. however, this is still lacking interest among Y and Z generations because these generations prefer to use foreign brands such as ZARA and H&M. This research design to determine the effect of sales promotion and celebrity endorser on purchasing intentions on local fashion brands Y and Z generations (Study on the Giyomi brand). The sampling technique of this research used judgmental sampling and snowball sampling.
