\u0406\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u0442.\u041a\u043b\u044e\u0447\u043e\u0432\u0456 \u0441\u043b\u043e\u0432\u0430: \u0442\u0443\u0440\u0444\u0456\u0440\u043c\u0430, \u0442\u0443\u0440\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0443\u043a\u0442; \u043d\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0439 \u0442\u0443\u0440\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0443\u043a\u0442; digital-\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433, \u0456\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0435\u0442-\u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433; \u0432\u0438\u0432\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043d\u0430 \u0440\u0438\u043d\u043e\u043a. ; The concept of \u201ctourist product\u201d is analyzed, attention is focused on the fact that the novelty of the product is the result of a creative search and independent commercial value. A tourist product may be new in relation to meeting a new need or a new consumer, an existing product, a new market. The evaluation of the application of the concept of \u201cnew product\u201d in marketing has been carried out. Means of achieving the commercial value of tourism products are proposed. The need for constant updating of the product range of a tourist enterprise is determined. Varieties and features of the introduction of new tourism products are considered. The scheme of the process of planning the promotion of a new tourist product is presented, with the concretization of means of retaining consumers and identifying the target segment. This idea of planning the promotion of a new tourist product allows you to minimize the risks that arise both in the external and internal environment. Horizontal and vertical methods of promoting new tourism products to the market, their essence, features, advantages and differences under restrictions on the activities of tourism enterprises, are determined. The necessity of taking into account the peculiarities of new tourism products when entering the market is proved, in particular, promotion methods are defined. The corporate and contractual schemes of vertical cooperation and their application areas, parity partnership schemes and cooperative ties of horizontal promotion through outsourcing are investigated. Means are proposed for achieving the commercial success of a formed tourism product based on market testing, trial marketing, and market testing. Possible causes of failures in interactions with consumers of a new tourism product are identified. The use of Internet technologies that are developing rapidly to promote new tourism products is proposed. The methods of online advertising are indicated: traditional (offline) and a digital model in terms of promoting a travel product on the global Internet.Keywords: travel agency, tourist product; new tourist product; digital marketing, internet marketing; market launch.  \u0412\u0435\u0441\u0442\u043d\u0438\u043a \u0425\u0435\u0440\u0441\u043e\u043d\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043d\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0442\u0435\u0445\u043d\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0443\u043d\u0438\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0441\u0438\u0442\u0435\u0442\u0430; \u0422\u043e\u043c 2, \u2116 1(72) (2020) ; \u0412\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u043a \u0425\u0435\u0440\u0441\u043e\u043d\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043d\u0430\u0446\u0456\u043e\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0442\u0435\u0445\u043d\u0456\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0443\u043d\u0456\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0441\u0438\u0442\u0435\u0442\u0443; \u0422\u043e\u043c 2, \u2116 1(72) (2020) ; Visnik of Kherson National Technical University; \u0422\u043e\u043c 2, \u2116 1(72) (2020) ; 2078-4481 \u0428\u0430\u0440\u043a\u043e, \u041c\u0430\u0440\u0433\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0430 \u0412\u0430\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0456\u0457\u0432\u043d\u0430; \u041f\u0435\u0442\u0440\u0443\u0448\u0435\u043d\u043a\u043e, \u041d\u0430\u0442\u0430\u043b\u044f \u0412\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c\u0438\u0440\u0456\u0432\u043d\u0430"},{"id":"6a55c52714a8f961c01189f0d3937bf722dfc98b26d357c83285b1b5ce740632","content":"La creaci\u00f3n de fanpage en el desarrollo de emprendimientos locales Las redes sociales se han convertido en una herramienta fundamental para el desarrollo empresarial, principalmente en los procesos de comunicaci\u00f3n con sus mercados y los emprendimientos, por peque\u00f1os que resulten, no son ajenos a esta tendencia. El presente art\u00edculo muestra los resultados alcanzados por cinco emprendimientos locales que dise\u00f1aron sus fanpages, con el apoyo de estudiantes de la carrera de Marketing de la Universidad San Gregorio de Portoviejo, dentro del proyecto de vinculaci\u00f3n Asesoramiento Comercial a Operadores Econ\u00f3micos para el Desarrollo de la Econom\u00eda Popular y Solidaria y PyMES. Para evaluar los resultados, se aplic\u00f3 la t\u00e9cnica de la Entrevista a los emprendedores, de quienes se obtuvo sus percepciones respecto a las mejoras logradas en sus procesos comerciales, una vez puesta en marcha de sus fanpages marketing digital; redes sociales; fanpage; emprendimiento; econom\u00eda popular Revista San Gregorio; N\u00fam. 38 (2020): Revista San Gregorio. ENERO-MARZO 2020 ; 2528-7907 ; 1390-7247 ; 10.36097\/rsan.v1i38 Due\u00f1as Espinoza, Francisco Xavier; Zambrano Garc\u00eda, Jorge Tom\u00e1s; Cano Pita, Galo Enrique; P\u00e1rraga Pati\u00f1o, Evelyn Jackeline"},{"id":"162219a54ed73f083a9e7d8adc6976fd343b88967b0e5d5b7dd8a8d7891e2f2e","content":"Estudio exploratorio sobre la experiencia multisensorial en el museo vivencial de vino y pisco en Arequipa - Per\u00fa Exploratory Study on the Multisensorial Experience at the Vivencial Museum of Wine and Pisco in Arequipa, Per\u00fa. Stimulate the senses of wine tourism is key to improve your experience. This research seeks to explore the experience of visitors by interacting with the multisensory technology implemented into the Experiential Wine and Pisco Museum in Arequipa, Peru. A qualitativephenomenological methodology has been used to achieve the aforementioned purpose. The results give an account of the experience of the visitors was mostly satisfactory, the visitors felt stimulated all their senses, generating in them a novel experience, indeed. However, there are elements that negatively affected the visit. This research allows to understand the importance, limitations and consequences of the application of innovative technology in the wine and pisco tourism sector. ; Estimular los sentidos de los visitantes a museos es clave para mejorar su experiencia. Esta investigaci\u00f3n busca explorar la experiencia de los visitantes al interactuar con la tecnolog\u00eda de estimulaci\u00f3n sensorial implementada en el Museo Vivencial del Vino y Pisco en la ciudad de Arequipa, Per\u00fa. Se ha usado una metodolog\u00eda cualitativa-fenomenol\u00f3gica para alcanzar el fin ya indicado. Los resultados dan cuenta de una experiencia en su mayor\u00eda satisfactoria, siendo que los visitantes sintieron estimulados todos sus sentidos, generando en ellos una experiencia novedosa. Sin embargo, existen elementos que afectaron negativamente la visita. Esta investigaci\u00f3n permite comprender la importancia, limitaciones y las consecuencias de la aplicaci\u00f3n de tecnolog\u00eda innovadora en el sector del turismo del vino y pisco. marketing sensorial; cognici\u00f3n corporizada; tecnolog\u00eda; innovaci\u00f3n; experiencia sensorial; sensorial marketing; embodied cognition; technology; innovation sensorial experience Estudios y perspectivas en turismo, ISSN 1851-1732, Vol. 29, N\u00ba. 1, 2020, pags. 96-119 Infantes Ch\u00e1vez, Alejandra E.; Garc\u00eda Zavala, Gabriela P.; Quaresma, Manuela"},{"id":"4654fafcfa40ea61d184b1e2373f5a9a07744534c3cf1a951c62c3587dffb8d8","content":"Ventaja competitiva de los servicios odontol\u00f3gicos privados en Asunci\u00f3n y ciudades del departamento central, a\u00f1o 2017 La herramienta b\u00e1sica que diagnostica la Ventaja Competitiva y descubre los medios para que \u00e9sta mejore es la Cadena de Valor, la cual presenta Actividades de Valor: primarias y las de apoyo. El Objetivo General de la investigaci\u00f3n es analizar la Ventaja Competitiva de los Servicios Odontol\u00f3gicos Privados en Asunci\u00f3n y ciudades del Departamento Central, a\u00f1o 2017. La metodolog\u00eda del trabajo de investigaci\u00f3n tiene un enfoque cuantitativo con un dise\u00f1o no experimental de corte transversal y nivel descriptivo. La unidad de an\u00e1lisis estuvo dada por Odont\u00f3logos que prestan sus servicios en el sector privado en Asunci\u00f3n y ciudades del Departamento Central, el tipo de muestreo fue la probabil\u00edstica y compuesta por 320 Odont\u00f3logos. En cuanto a la t\u00e9cnica de recolecci\u00f3n se utiliz\u00f3 la encuesta con un cuestionario semiestructurado cuyo procesamiento de datos fue a trav\u00e9s del formulario de Google. Inc. Las principales conclusiones fueron: Con respecto a las actividades de la cadena de valor se observa que los Odont\u00f3logos consideran m\u00e1s importante: la calidad en las Operaciones (51 % quienes afirmaron de su relevancia), 21% a la calidad de Recursos Humanos, 13% al Desarrollo Tecnol\u00f3gico, 8% al Marketing y Ventas y solo 6% al Servicio de Postventa. Para la obtenci\u00f3n de una ventaja competitiva es indispensable que el Servicio Odontol\u00f3gico tenga en cuenta el desarrollo concatenado de las actividades de valor, para la creaci\u00f3n de una estrategia de diferenciaci\u00f3n. administraci\u00f3n; Diferenciaci\u00f3n; Cadena de valor; Servicios Odontol\u00f3gicos; Actividades de Valor; Ventaja Competitiva Poblaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo, ISSN 2076-0531, N\u00ba. 50, 2020, pags. 106-115 Kwan Chung, Chap Kau"},{"id":"802339d6ec7f17fae7e477b17f8fafc53713ebcbbb839ff46049f8ec12c6d3ac","content":"Sustentabilidad y nanejo agroecol\u00f3gico mediante indicadores en un paisaje agr\u00edcola: estudio de caso a nivel de finca, Amazon\u00eda Ecuatoriana The objective of this work was to evaluatesustainability and agro-ecological management in theGuayac\u00e1n estate, Santa Clara canton, Pastaza province,Ecuador. It was characterized by the methodology forassessing sustainability in the Ecuadorian Amazonregion (MESRAE), which involved 36 indicators toquantify sustainability an ordinal and numerical scale of1 to 10 was used, considering high levels (>6.5 to 10),medium (>5.5 to 6.5) and low (<5.5), distributed in fourdimensions, environmental, socio-cultural, political andeconomic, with the values obtained for each dimensionwere constituted \u201cameba\u201d flowcharts that allow tovisualize the general state and level of sustainabilityof the farm, the average sustainability index presentedthe following order: environmental dimension (6.85),socio-cultural dimension (7.58); political dimension(4.02); economic dimension (4.32), which wereclassified as high, medium or low sustainability; theindex obtained from the farm is 5.69, level one. Theresults suggest that sustainability at the farm levelpresented critical points in the environmental, economicand political dimension. Indicators to be improved are:a) Soil erosion level b) Presence of benzephic insects, c)Low presence of biodiversity d) Monthly net income ofUPA), e) Agricultural input costs (balanced, deparasive,salt), f) Marketing strategies, g) Savings strategy, h)State programs related to the farm (Ganader Systems),i) Level of acceptance of state programs, j) Articulationof the farm with other accompanying institutions. ; El objetivo del presente trabajo fue evaluar lasustentabilidad y el manejo agroecol\u00f3gico en la fincael Guayac\u00e1n, cant\u00f3n Santa Clara, provincia de Pastaza,Ecuador. Se caracteriz\u00f3 mediante la metodolog\u00eda paraevaluar sustentabilidad en la regi\u00f3n amaz\u00f3nica ecuatoriana(MESRAE), que involucr\u00f3 36 indicadores para cuantificarla sustentabilidad se utiliz\u00f3 una escala ordinal y num\u00e9ricadel 1 al 10, considerando niveles de alto (>6.5 a 10),medio (>5.5 a 6.5) y bajo (<5.5), distribuidos en cuatrodimensiones, ambiental, socio-cultural, pol\u00edtica yecon\u00f3mica, con los valores obtenidos para cada dimensi\u00f3nse constituyeron flujogramas tipo \u201cameba\u201d que permitenvisualizar el estado general y nivel de sustentabilidad dela finca, el \u00edndice promedio de sustentabilidad present\u00f3 elsiguiente orden: dimensi\u00f3n ambiental (6.85), dimensi\u00f3nsocio-cultural (7.58); dimensi\u00f3n pol\u00edtica (4.02); dimensi\u00f3necon\u00f3mica (4.32), los cuales fueron clasificados de alta,media o baja sustentabilidad; el \u00edndice obtenido de lafinca es 5.69, nivel uno. Los resultados sugieren que lasustentabilidad a nivel de finca present\u00f3 puntos cr\u00edticosen la dimensi\u00f3n ambiental, econ\u00f3mica y pol\u00edtica. Losindicadores que deben ser mejorados son: a) Nivel deerosi\u00f3n del suelo b) Presencia de insectos ben\u00e9ficos, c) Bajapresencia de diversidad biol\u00f3gica d) Ingreso neto mensual dela UPA), e) Costos de insumos agropecuarios (balanceado,desparasitantes, sal), f) Estrategias de comercializaci\u00f3n, g)Estrategia de ahorro, h) Programas del estado relacionadoscon la finca (Sistemas Ganaderos), i) Nivel de aceptaci\u00f3nde los programas del estado, j) Articulaci\u00f3n de la finca conotras instituciones acompa\u00f1antes. Agroecolog\u00eda; sostenibilidad; resiliencia; Agroecology; sustainability; resilience Revista Ciencia y Tecnolog\u00eda, ISSN 1390-4051, Vol. 13, N\u00ba. 1 (January - June 2020), 2020, pags. 39-48 Macas, Julio; Morales, Jefferson; Chuquimarca, Javier; Reinoso Galora, Betty A.; Soria, Boris; Suigla, Marcela; Bravo Medina, Carlos Alfredo; Alem\u00e1n P\u00e9rez, Reinaldo Demesio"},{"id":"099b980dcb942dc19334eceff4df6a748867400da16382cdb27698ed15feff98","content":"Planificaci\u00f3n estrat\u00e9gica para el desarrollo territorial de la Provincia Esmeraldas en Ecuador Various factors have influenced territorial development and its reality for several decades, where planning is considered a key process for management. The objective of this research is to study the strategic planning for the territorial development of the Esmeraldas-Ecuador province, as a fundamental category the subjects and the designed plans are addressed. The type of investigation is descriptive documentary under a qualitative approach, specifically some normative considerations were addressed in Ecuador. Among the results stand out that planning is a State policy in this country, as a fundamental pillar for the articulation and coordination of efforts of public and private actors, to achieve the economic reactivation of the various dynamic sectors of the economy; Likewise, a road map was developed developing territorial marketing strategies, promoting diplomacy, development in production chains and attracting national or foreign investment. It is concluded that, generating different alternatives to consolidate territorial competitiveness, considering public and private actors as strategic allies, makes strategic planning a tool for decision-making that facilitates political will, a key factor for structural changes and achieving results. sustainable, to make Esmeraldas a Development Pole. ; Diversos factores han incidido en el desarrollo territorial y su realidad por varias d\u00e9cadas, donde la planificaci\u00f3n es considerada un proceso clave para la gesti\u00f3n. El objetivo de esta investigaci\u00f3n es estudiar la planificaci\u00f3n estrat\u00e9gica para el desarrollo territorial de la provincia Esmeraldas-Ecuador, como categor\u00eda fundamental se abordan los sujetos y los planes dise\u00f1ados. El tipo de investigaci\u00f3n es descriptiva documental bajo un enfoque cualitativo, espec\u00edficamente se abordaron algunas consideraciones de tipo normativo en Ecuador. Entre los resultados destacan, que la planificaci\u00f3n es una pol\u00edtica de Estado en este pa\u00eds, como pilar fundamental para la articulaci\u00f3n y coordinaci\u00f3n de esfuerzos de actores p\u00fablicos y privados, para lograr la reactivaci\u00f3n econ\u00f3mica de los diversos sectores dinamizadores de la econom\u00eda; asimismo, se construy\u00f3 una hoja de ruta desarrollando estrategias de marketing territorial, fomentando la diplomacia, desarrollo en las cadenas productivas y atracci\u00f3n de inversi\u00f3n nacional o extranjera. Se concluye que, el generar distintas alternativas para consolidar la competitividad territorial, considerando actores p\u00fablicos y privados como aliados estrat\u00e9gicos, hace de la planificaci\u00f3n estrat\u00e9gica una herramienta para la toma de decisiones que facilita la voluntad pol\u00edtica, factor clave para cambios estructurales y consecuci\u00f3n de resultados sostenibles, para hacer de Esmeraldas un Polo de Desarrollo. planificaci\u00f3n; estrategias; planes de desarrollo; pol\u00edticas p\u00fablicas; desarrollo territorial; planning; strategies; development plans; public politics; territorial development Revista de ciencias sociales, ISSN 1315-9518, Vol. 26, N\u00ba. 3, 2020, pags. 130-147 Alencastro Guerrero, Alex Pa\u00fal; Casta\u00f1\u00f3n Rodr\u00edguez, Julio; Qui\u00f1onez Cabeza, Manuel R.; Egas Moreno, Fanny"},{"id":"fa6ab53436a8c1f6be19ebb5fa5cec96920c6334df689f4d0cf903f6b1ff5b54","content":"Slow profile: Estudo das orienta\u00e7\u00f5es ao consumo de slow fashion Objetivo: Identificar perfis de orienta\u00e7\u00e3o ao consumo de slow fashion, verificando os fatores associados aos diferentes perfis.M\u00e9todo: Trata-se de uma pesquisa do tipo survey com 461 consumidores de vestu\u00e1rio do Estado do Cear\u00e1. Utilizou-se de um question\u00e1rio com quest\u00f5es de perfil do respondente, al\u00e9m de uma se\u00e7\u00e3o dedicada \u00e0 mensura\u00e7\u00e3o da orienta\u00e7\u00e3o ao consumo de slow fashion, por meio da escala de Jin e Jung (2014). Foram utilizados m\u00e9todos de an\u00e1lise descritiva, an\u00e1lise fatorial explorat\u00f3ria (AFE), an\u00e1lise de cluster por k-means e an\u00e1lise de correspond\u00eancia (ANACOR).Principais Resultados: Os resultados indicam validade da escala no contexto desta pesquisa. Verificou-se a exist\u00eancia de tr\u00eas perfis de orienta\u00e7\u00e3o: alta orienta\u00e7\u00e3o, orienta\u00e7\u00e3o parcial, e averso \u00e0 exclusividade. Ainda, observou-se que existe associa\u00e7\u00e3o entre os diferentes perfis e as vari\u00e1veis demogr\u00e1ficas relacionadas \u00e0 localiza\u00e7\u00e3o, renda, faixa et\u00e1ria, orienta\u00e7\u00e3o sexual, escolaridade, estado civil e ocupa\u00e7\u00e3o.Relev\u00e2ncia\/originalidade: Estudos sobre slow fashion ainda carecem de informa\u00e7\u00f5es sobre quem s\u00e3o os seus potenciais consumidores e quais s\u00e3o os seus perfis. Este estudo visa preencher esse gap da literatura. Esta pesquisa \u00e9 relevante teoricamente por estudar o slow fashion e seus potenciais consumidores no Brasil e, do ponto de vista gerencial, pelo crescente n\u00famero de marcas brasileiras seguindo o conceito de slow fashion.Contribui\u00e7\u00f5es te\u00f3ricas\/metodol\u00f3gicas: Como contribui\u00e7\u00e3o te\u00f3rica, estende o corpo de conhecimento sobre perfis de potenciais consumidores de slow fashion.Contribui\u00e7\u00f5es sociais \/ para a gest\u00e3o (opcional): As implica\u00e7\u00f5es gerenciais dizem respeito ao fornecimento de informa\u00e7\u00f5es que possam contribuir para o planejamento de mercadol\u00f3gico e posicionamento de marca eficiente e direcionado a esses potenciais consumidores. Administra\u00e7\u00e3o; Marketing; Slow fashion; Orienta\u00e7\u00f5es ao Consumo; Perfil do Consumidor Revista Eletr\u00f4nica de Neg\u00f3cios Internacionais: Internext, ISSN 1980-4865, Vol. 15, N\u00ba. 3, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Setembro - Dezembro), pags. 103-127 Sobreira, \u00c9rica Maria Cal\u00edope; Silva, Clayton Robson Moreira da; Romero, Claudia Buhamra Abreu"},{"id":"2b7b4238385b5d8c1348252679f7999cadcfecdf3dfc6f5998f1f9e70c6862d4","content":"STRATEGI PEMBERDAYAAN UMKM DI PEDESAAN BERBASIS KEARIFAN LOKAL DI ERA INDUSTRI 4.0 MENUJU ERA SOCIETY 5.0 Abstracs To overcome poverty in rural areas, namely by carrying out community empowerment to be independent, competitive and able to compete in the 4.0 industrial revolution era or the digital era and potentially contribute to national income. The presence of the industrial revolution 4.0 caused the impact of intense competition, MSMEs must be able to overcome these challenges creatively, product innovation, marketing, product packaging, human resource development and technology. In empowering MSMEs, a strategy for preparing economic empowerment in MSMEs is needed in the face of the era of the Industrial Revolution 4.0. The MSME empowerment strategy can be pursued through the Government's role in issuing fiscal and non-fiscal policies, the role of universities in carrying out services to educate and prosper the community, and the role of stakeholders encouraging MSMEs to become more independent and innovative Keywords: Strategy, Empowerment, UMKM, local wisdom Abstrak Untuk menanggulangi kemiskianan di Pedesaan yaitu dengan melaksanakan pemberdayaan masyarakat agar bisa mandiri, kompetitif dan mampu bersaing di era revolusi industri 4.0 atau era digital serta berpotensi menyumbang pendapatan nasional. Hadirnya revolusi industri 4.0 menimbulkan dampak persaingan yang ketat, UMKM harus mampu mengatasi tantangan itu dengan kreatif, inovasi produk, pemasaran, kemasan produk, pengembagan sumber daya manusia dan Teknologi. Dalam pemberdayaan UMKM diperlukan strategi penyiapan pemberdayaan ekonomi pada UMKM dalam menghadapi era revolusi Infdustri 4.0. Strategi pemberdayaan UMKM dapat ditempuh melaui peran Pemerintah mengeluarkan kebijakan fiskal maupun non fiskal, Peran perguruan tinggi dalam melaksanakan pengabdian untuk mencerdaskan dan mensejahterakan masyarakat, dan Peran stekholder mendorong UMKM semakin mandiri dan inovatif Kata kunci : Strategi, Pemberdayaan, UMKM, kearifan lokal  Jurnal Bisnis Indonesia; 2020: Jurnal Bisnis Indonesia Edisi Khusus Pengabdian Masyarakat Nugroho, Rusdi Hidayat; Andarini, Sonja"},{"id":"c64196ca38b4921a4c179a85d4d23b153de158b3e719f73d6501dda0734466a1","content":"USO DAS REDES SOCIAIS PELOS REP\u00d3SIT\u00d3RIOS INSTITUCIONAIS DE ACESSO ABERTO Diante da falta de visibilidade dos reposit\u00f3rios institucionais digitais, esta pesquisa investigar se as redes sociais podem servir como mecanismo de divulga\u00e7\u00e3o para tais reposit\u00f3rios e, ainda, de que forma as institui\u00e7\u00f5es ou os gestores de reposit\u00f3rios v\u00eam utilizando as redes Facebook e Twitter como mecanismo de visibilidade. A amostra foi composta pelos reposit\u00f3rios institucionais listados no site do Instituto Brasileiro de Informa\u00e7\u00e3o em Ci\u00eancia e Tecnologia (Ibict). Usando a metodologia de pesquisa emp\u00edrica, de car\u00e1ter explorat\u00f3rio, o trabalho concluiu que ainda \u00e9 muito t\u00edmido o uso ativo de redes sociais por esses reposit\u00f3rios para fins de divulga\u00e7\u00e3o de sua exist\u00eancia e conte\u00fados. Ci\u00eancia da Informa\u00e7\u00e3o; Reposit\u00f3rios institucionais. Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o cient\u00edfica. Redes sociais. Marketing digital Ci\u00eancia da Informa\u00e7\u00e3o; v. 48, n. 3 (2019): Suplemento: Trabalhos apresentados na 10\u00aa Confer\u00eancia Luso-Brasileira de Ci\u00eancia Aberta - ConfOA ; 1518-8353 ; 0100-1965 Moraes, Lucia Seixas; Sales, Luana Farias"},{"id":"d5d6a5edf527edd2ba000985906a51b8d65f47f2c4643ac63a496ce7c5d1b7f3","content":"M\u00e9todos computacionales en Comunicaci\u00f3n: Presentaci\u00f3n The recent increase in data, tools, and processing power available digitally is encouraging the use of computational methods for the study of communication and in the Social Sciences, in general. A phenomenon that open new lines of research and a practical application. For example the understanding of social aspects in current digital contexts; the identification of factors that affect the occurrence of such events; the application of communication strategies, in the study of new meanings of citizen exercise and consumption of users from current digital scenarios; and in the use of new methodologies that until recently were alien to the field of Social and Humanistic Sciences. This special issue attempts to address the central issue of this issue, from some perspectives established by the authors that are part of this issue, in order to contribute to an overview of more relevant approaches and perspectives of applicability of these types of methods to Communication level today. ; O recente aumento de dados, ferramentas e poder de processamento dispon\u00edvel digitalmente est\u00e1 estimulando o uso de m\u00e9todos computacionais para o estudo da comunica\u00e7\u00e3o e nas Ci\u00eancias Sociais, em geral. Um fen\u00f4meno que est\u00e1 abrindo novas linhas de pesquisa e aplica\u00e7\u00e3o pr\u00e1tica para a compreens\u00e3o dos fen\u00f4menos sociais nos atuais contextos digitais; bem como identificar fatores que influenciam a ocorr\u00eancia de tais eventos, na implementa\u00e7\u00e3o de estrat\u00e9gias de comunica\u00e7\u00e3o, o estudo de novos contextos de exerc\u00edcio cidad\u00e3o e consumo de usu\u00e1rio dos cen\u00e1rios digitais atuais e na implementa\u00e7\u00e3o novas metodologias que at\u00e9 recentemente eram estranhas ao campo das Ci\u00eancias Humanas e Sociais. Esta edi\u00e7\u00e3o convida pesquisadores de todas as \u00e1reas do conhecimento a apresentarem propostas acad\u00eamicas que d\u00eaem relev\u00e2ncia especial ao uso e aplica\u00e7\u00e3o de m\u00e9todos computacionais em torno de temas relacionados \u00e0 comunica\u00e7\u00e3o, tanto no n\u00edvel da pesquisa quanto na sua aplica\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0 an\u00e1lise e ao uso do usu\u00e1rio. suas aplica\u00e7\u00f5es para diferentes \u00e1reas de marketing, design digital de produtos, comunica\u00e7\u00e3o pol\u00edtica, entre outros. Tudo isso com o prop\u00f3sito de que o presente n\u00famero contribua para ter uma vis\u00e3o geral de abordagens e perspectivas mais relevantes para a aplicabilidade deste tipo de m\u00e9todos no n\u00edvel da comunica\u00e7\u00e3o atual. ; El reciente aumento en los datos, herramientas y poder de procesamiento disponibles digitalmente est\u00e1 fomentando el uso de m\u00e9todos computacionales para el estudio de la comunicaci\u00f3n y en las Ciencias Sociales, en general. Un fen\u00f3meno que est\u00e1 abriendo nuevas l\u00edneas de investigaci\u00f3n y aplicaci\u00f3n pr\u00e1ctica para la comprensi\u00f3n de fen\u00f3menos sociales en los contextos digitales actuales; as\u00ed como en la identificaci\u00f3n de factores que inciden en la ocurrencia de dichos eventos, en la aplicaci\u00f3n de estrategias de comunicaci\u00f3n, en el estudio de nuevos contextos de ejercicio ciudadano y de consumo de los usuarios desde los escenarios digitales actuales, y en la aplicaci\u00f3n de nuevas metodolog\u00edas que hasta no hace mucho eran ajenas al campo de las Ciencias Sociales y Human\u00edsticas. El presente n\u00famero intenta abordar el tema central de este n\u00famero, desde algunas perspectivas presentadas por los autores que hacen parte de este n\u00famero, con el fin de contribuir a tener una visi\u00f3n general de enfoques y perspectivas m\u00e1s relevantes de aplicabilidad de este tipo de m\u00e9todos a nivel de la comunicaci\u00f3n en la actualidad. M\u00e9todos computacionales; Comunicaci\u00f3n; Big Data; Inteligencia artificial; Redes sociales; Computational methods; Communication; Artificial intelli-gence; Social Networks; M\u00e9todos computacionais; Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o; Intelig\u00eancia artificial; Redes sociais Icono14, ISSN 1697-8293, Vol. 18, N\u00ba 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: M\u00e9todos computacionales en Comunicaci\u00f3n), pags. 1-9 Said Hung, Elias; Jabba Molinares, Daladier"},{"id":"8bbd202629d04e9a5f168f0f47bc78251febb7f0aa25fc7ef1fa3ff30a787898","content":"Producci\u00f3n cient\u00edfica y evoluci\u00f3n conceptual del merchandising durante las \u00faltimas seis d\u00e9cadas. Un estudio bibliom\u00e9trico This article shows the results of a bibliometric analysis focused on the academic and professional community interested in the study of self-service merchandising or marketing at the point of sale. The objective is to identify past and current issues, predict emerging trends and provide a longitudinal perspective on the research that took place between 1960 and 2019, from around 700 articles taken from the Scopus bibliographic database. Therefore, this approach provides the most comprehensive analysis of the history of point-of-sale marketing in the past six decades. Some of the findings found in the past decade are characterized by the study of simulators such as CAD, and supply chain management applied to the textile sector. Although visual merchandising is not new, it is an emerging theme in this field of research that will gradually integrate the role of virtual merchandising, the atmosphere of the establishment and the application of window dressing techniques. In this decade, advertising appear as a general or transversal topic to others topics. And the future will go through the application of virtual reality and augmented reality to the case of e-merchandising. Conclusions and future lines of research advanced to advance knowledge and understanding of the academic literature on marketing or point-of-sale marketing. ; En este art\u00edculo aparecen los resultados de un an\u00e1lisis bibliom\u00e9trico centrado en la comunidad acad\u00e9mica y profesional interesada por el estudio del merchandising de autoservicio (self-service merchandising) o marketing en el punto de venta. El objetivo es identificar los temas pasados y actuales, predecir las tendencias emergentes y proporcionar una perspectiva longitudinal sobre la investigaci\u00f3n que ha tenido lugar entre 1960 y 2019, a partir de unos 700 art\u00edculos extra\u00eddos de la base bibliogr\u00e1fica Scopus. Por tanto, este enfoque proporciona el an\u00e1lisis m\u00e1s exhaustivo de la historia del merchandising en las \u00faltimas seis d\u00e9cadas. Algunos de los hallazgos muestran que la d\u00e9cada pasada se caracteriz\u00f3 por el estudio de simuladores como CAD, y de la gesti\u00f3n de la cadena de suministro aplicado al sector textil. Si bien, el merchandising visual no es algo nuevo, se trata una tem\u00e1tica emergente en este campo de investigaci\u00f3n que ir\u00e1 integrando el papel del merchandising virtual, la atm\u00f3sfera del establecimiento y la aplicaci\u00f3n de t\u00e9cnicas de escaparatismo. En esta d\u00e9cada, la publicidad aparece como un tema general o transversales a otras tem\u00e1ticas. Y el futuro pasar\u00e1 por la aplicaci\u00f3n de la realidad virtual y la realidad aumentada al caso del e-merchandising. Las conclusiones y futuras l\u00edneas de investigaci\u00f3n contribuyen a avanzar en el conocimiento y la comprensi\u00f3n de la literatura acad\u00e9mica sobre el merchandising o el marketing en el punto de venta. Bibliometric study; co-word analysis; merchandising; point-of-sale marketing; Estudio bibliom\u00e9trico; an\u00e1lisis co-word; marketing en el punto de venta Revista de Estudios Empresariales. Segunda \u00e9poca, ISSN 1988-9046, N\u00ba. 1, 2020, pags. 50-74 Mu\u00f1oz Leiva, Francisco; Rodr\u00edguez L\u00f3pez, Mar\u00eda Eugenia; Li\u00e9bana Cabanillas, Francisco"},{"id":"a2127590c8786bef9ed9807f7efbff687f0ba5d00b04a15a66b4ece83fc2abb1","content":"Empresas familiares: definiciones, caracter\u00edsticas y contribuciones The family business can be understood as a complex organization, crossed by a family bond that directs business policy, its objectives and goals. In it theproperty, its management and its subsequent succession are areas that, classically, show the problems that have been most commonly studied, and which determine the continuity of the organization beyond the second generation. Objective: to identify studies carried out on family businesses from different disciplines in the period from 2007 to 2019. Method: It was carried out under the methodology of systematic review, by searching for articles in the Dialnet, Redalyc, Scielo and IDEA databases. Results: Academic commercial, financial and marketing areas lead research related to family businesses. It is visualized that the succession, the relations between the owners and the relevance of family businesses in the economy in general have been the most discussed topics, showing themselves as an opportunity for improvement and contribution by the disciplines interested in family businesses. On the other hand, the possibility of generating models of analysis of GTH processes in the EF is articulated as an opportunity to respond to the specific needs of this type of companies. ; A empresa familiar pode ser entendida como uma organiza\u00e7\u00e3o complexa, atravessada por um v\u00ednculo familiar que direciona a pol\u00edtica comercial, seusobjetivos e metas. Nele, a propriedade, sua gest\u00e3o e sua subsequente sucess\u00e3o s\u00e3o \u00e1reas que, classicamente, mostram os problemas que foram mais comumente estudados e que determinam a continuidade da organiza\u00e7\u00e3o al\u00e9m da segunda gera\u00e7\u00e3o. Objetivo: identificar estudos realizados em empresas familiares de diferentes disciplinas no per\u00edodo de 2007 a 2019. M\u00e9todo: Foi realizado sob a metodologia de revis\u00e3o sistem\u00e1tica, buscando artigos nas bases de dados Dialnet, Redalyc, Scielo e IDEA. Resultados: As \u00e1reas acad\u00eamica comercial, financeira e de marketing lideram pesquisas relacionadas a empresas familiares. Visualiza-se que a sucess\u00e3o, as rela\u00e7\u00f5es entre os propriet\u00e1rios e a relev\u00e2ncia das empresas familiares na economia em geral t\u00eam sido os t\u00f3picos mais discutidos, mostrando-se como uma oportunidade de melhoria e contribui\u00e7\u00e3o pelas disciplinas interessadas nas empresas familiares. Por outro lado, a possibilidade de gerar modelos de an\u00e1lise de processos de GTH na EF \u00e9 articulada como uma oportunidade de responder \u00e0s necessidades espec\u00edficas desse tipo de empresa. ; La empresa familiar se puede entender como una organizaci\u00f3n compleja, atravesada por un v\u00ednculo familiar que direcciona la pol\u00edtica empresarial, sus objetivos y metas. En ella la propiedad, su gesti\u00f3n y su posterior sucesi\u00f3n son \u00e1reas que, cl\u00e1sicamente, evidencian los problemas que m\u00e1s com\u00fanmente se han estudiado, y los cuales determinan la continuidad de la organizaci\u00f3n m\u00e1s all\u00e1 de la segunda generaci\u00f3n. Objetivo: identificar estudios realizados sobre empresas familiares desde diferentes disciplinas en el periodo de 2007 a 2019. M\u00e9todo: Se realiz\u00f3 bajo la metodolog\u00eda de revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica, mediante la b\u00fasqueda de art\u00edculos en las bases de datos Dialnet, Redalyc, Scielo e IDEA. Resultados: las \u00e1reas acad\u00e9micas comerciales, financieras y de mercadeo lideran la investigaci\u00f3n relacionada a las empresas familiares. Se visualiza que la sucesi\u00f3n, las relaciones entre los propietarios y la relevancia de las empresas familiares en la econom\u00eda en general han sido los temas m\u00e1s abordados, mostr\u00e1ndose como una oportunidad de mejora y de aporte por parte de las disciplinas interesadas en las empresas familiares. Por otro lado, la posibilidad de generar modelos de an\u00e1lisis de los procesos de GTH en las EF se articula como una oportunidad para responder a las necesidades espec\u00edficas de este tipo de empresas.  Tendencias, ISSN 2539-0554, Vol. 21, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Vol. XXI No. 1 Primer Semestre Enero - Junio 2020), pags. 197-220 Mu\u00f1oz Mu\u00f1oz, Diego Fernando; Matabanchoy Tulcan, Sonia Maritza; Guevara Canchala, Nayive Tatiana"},{"id":"5ca34a3051e7f016bf65675747e6656894fc0df50f448014e627b05ad82f264c","content":"Tipificaci\u00f3n integral de sistemas caprinos de la provincia de Santa Elena, Ecuador As a preliminary step to propose development strategies in the goat productive systems (SPC) of the Santa Elena province, Ecuador, the SPC were typified by means of socio-economic, productive and environmental indicators. A sample of 172 producers was surveyed on family composition and participation in work, adopted technology, communications, composition of the herd, livestock stock, land use, income, infrastructure and basic services, access to farms, technical assistance and training, off-farm work and income, management and facilities, water sources and food supplement, reproductive aspects, difficulties in the production of goats, marketing of goats. The number of proposed variables was reduced by principal component analysis (PCA) and \u03c72 tests for quantitative and qualitative variables, respectively. Based on the main components that explained 80% of the variability, a conglomerate analysis (CA) was carried out, resulting in the division of the SPC into 7 groups. Through a multiple correspondence analysis (MCA), associations between groups and modalities of qualitative variables were identified. The variables that contributed most to the differentiation of SPC groups were related to goat production, family size, poultry, agricultural, pig and bovine production, participation in family work, income from social benefits, the size of the farm and the technology adopted. Two groups were mixed, one with a predominance of livestock activity and the other with agricultural activity; a group with greater swine activity; two groups were characterized by the breeding of goats for consumption, whose income came from external sources; and two groups were defined by the age of their producers. ; Como uma primeira medida para propor estrat\u00e9gias de desenvolvimento nos sistemas de produ\u00e7\u00e3o de caprinos (SPC) da prov\u00edncia de Santa Elena, Equador, foi proposto organizar os sistemas por meio de indicadores socioecon\u00f4micos, produtivos e ambientais. 172 produtores foram entrevistados sobre a composi\u00e7\u00e3o familiar e participa\u00e7\u00e3o no trabalho, tecnologia adotada, comunica\u00e7\u00e3o, composi\u00e7\u00e3o do rebanho, uso da terra, renda, infraestrutura e servi\u00e7os b\u00e1sicos, acesso as fazendas, treinamento t\u00e9cnico, trabalho e renda extra predial, administra\u00e7\u00e3o e instala\u00e7\u00f5es, fonte de \u00e1gua e suplemento alimentar, aspectos reprodutivos, dificuldades na produ\u00e7\u00e3o de caprinos e comercializa\u00e7\u00e3o de caprinos. O n\u00famero de vari\u00e1veis foi reduzido pelas an\u00e1lises de componentes principais (ACP) e teste de x2 para vari\u00e1veis quantitativas e qualitativas, respectivamente. Com o CP, foram explicadas 80% da variabilidade. Foi realizada uma an\u00e1lise de agrupamento (AC) que dividiu os estabelecimentos em 7 grupos. Atrav\u00e9s da an\u00e1lise de correspond\u00eancia m\u00faltipla (ACM), foram identificadas associa\u00e7\u00f5es entre os grupos e as modalidades de vari\u00e1veis qualitativas. As vari\u00e1veis que mais contribu\u00edram para a diferencia\u00e7\u00e3o dos grupos SP estavam relacionadas com a produ\u00e7\u00e3o caprina, tamanho da fam\u00edlia, produ\u00e7\u00e3o av\u00edcola, agricultura, produ\u00e7\u00e3o su\u00edna e bovina, participa\u00e7\u00e3o no trabalho familiar, renda de benef\u00edcios sociais, tamanho da fazenda e tecnologia adotada. Dois grupos eram mistos, um tinha a maior atividade su\u00edna, dois foram caracterizados pela cria\u00e7\u00e3o de cabras para consumo, cuja renda era proveniente de fontes externas e dois grupos foram definidos pela idade de seus produtores. ; Como paso previo para proponer estrategias de desarrollo en sistemas de producci\u00f3n caprina (SPC) de la provincia de Santa Elena, Ecuador, se propuso tipificar los sistemas mediante indicadores socio-econ\u00f3micos, productivos y ambientales. Se encuestaron a 172 productores y se les pregunt\u00f3 sobre composici\u00f3n familiar y participaci\u00f3n en el trabajo, tecnolog\u00eda adoptada, comunicaciones, composici\u00f3n del hato, existencias ganaderas, uso del suelo, ingresos, infraestructura y servicios b\u00e1sicos, acceso a las explotaciones, asistencia t\u00e9cnica y capacitaci\u00f3n, trabajo e ingresos extraprediales, manejo e instalaciones, fuente de agua y suplemento alimenticio, aspecto reproductivo, dificultades en la producci\u00f3n de caprinos, comercializaci\u00f3n de caprinos. Se redujo el n\u00famero de variables mediante el an\u00e1lisis de componentes principales (ACP) y las pruebas de \u03c72, para las variables cuantitativas y cualitativas, respectivamente. Con las CP, que explicaron el 80% de la variabilidad, se llev\u00f3 a cabo un an\u00e1lisis de conglomerados (AC) que dividi\u00f3 a los establecimientos en 7 grupos. Mediante un an\u00e1lisis de correspondencias m\u00faltiples (ACM) se identificaron asociaciones entre grupos y modalidades de las variables cualitativas. Las variables que m\u00e1s aportaron a la diferenciaci\u00f3n de los grupos de SP estuvieron relacionadas con la producci\u00f3n caprina, el tama\u00f1o de la familia, las producciones av\u00edcola, agr\u00edcola, porcina y bovina, la participaci\u00f3n en el trabajo de la familia, los ingresos por beneficios sociales, el tama\u00f1o de la finca y la tecnolog\u00eda adoptada. Dos grupos eran mixtos; uno con mayor actividad porcina; dos se caracterizaron por la cr\u00eda de cabras para el consumo cuyos ingresos proven\u00edan de fuentes externas y dos grupos se definieron por la edad de sus productores. Economic indicators; productive indicators; socio-cultural indicators; production systems; goats; Indicadores econ\u00f3micos; indicadores productivos; indicadores socio-culturales; sistemas de producci\u00f3n; cabras; Indicadores econ\u00f4micos; indicadores produtivos; indicadores socioculturais; sistemas de produ\u00e7\u00e3o La Granja: Revista de Ciencias de la Vida, ISSN 1390-3799, Vol. 31, N\u00ba. 1, 2020, pags. 72-85 Sol\u00eds Lucas, Ligia Araceli; Lanari, Mar\u00eda Rosa; Oyarzabal, Mar\u00eda In\u00e9s"},{"id":"658970225eb940e80486420be44bb026872a3b0b1d7f98607eb50d87b1c6fbcf","content":"Revisi\u00f3n de las principales investigaciones sobre responsabilidad social corporativa y reputaci\u00f3n The actions of companies, as economic agents integrated into a community, influence the well-being of society. That is why, in addition to carrying out its productive activity, it must be socially responsible. It has been shown that the actions of Corporate Social Responsibility (hereinafter CSR) are essential in building the reputation of companies. In the last decades, we have seen an increase in the interest of the scientific and professional community to determine the influence of CSR and Reputation in different areas of the company. This research shows the main researchers, magazines and articles on these matters. Thus, Web of Science has been used as the main source of information to download the citations reports, and we have performed an analysis of the trend of scientific production, citations, magazines, authorships and lines of research. Among the main conclusions, it stands out that the topic CSR and Reputation is of growing interest and still in a phase of expansion. There are specialized magazines on CSR and Reputation, but most of them use only sources from English speaking countries (UK and USA) and published in English. European and especially Spanish authors (University of Cantabria and Salamanca) occupy a position of relevance in the matter. The main lines of research indicate that sincere CSR is a key element in building Reputation; likewise, it attracts and retains talent. Finally, the importance of marketing actions aimed at informing stakeholders about CSR is highlighted. ; Las actuaciones de las empresas, como agentes econ\u00f3micos partes de una comunidad, influyen en el bienestar de la sociedad. Es por ello que, adem\u00e1s de realizar su actividad productiva esta debe ser socialmente responsable. Se ha evidenciado que las actuaciones de Responsabilidad Social Corporativa (RSC en adelante) son esenciales en la construcci\u00f3n de la Reputaci\u00f3n de las empresas. En las \u00faltimas d\u00e9cadas ha aumentado el inter\u00e9s de la comunidad cient\u00edfica y profesional por determinar la influencia de la RSC y la Reputaci\u00f3n en diferentes \u00e1mbitos de la empresa. Esta investigaci\u00f3n muestra a los principales investigadores, revistas y art\u00edculos sobre estas materias. Para ello se ha empleado Web of Science como fuente de informaci\u00f3n para descargar los informes de citas y se ha realizado un an\u00e1lisis de la tendencia de la producci\u00f3n cient\u00edfica, citas, revistas, autor\u00edas y l\u00edneas de investigaci\u00f3n. Entre las principales conclusiones destaca que las investigaciones en RSC y Reputaci\u00f3n es de inter\u00e9s creciente y todav\u00eda est\u00e1 en fase de expansi\u00f3n. Existen revistas especializadas en temas sobre RSC y Reputaci\u00f3n, pero en su mayor\u00eda publican en ingl\u00e9s y son de nacionalidad inglesa y americana. Los autores europeos y en especial los espa\u00f1oles (Universidad de Cantabria y Salamanca) ocupan un puesto de relevancia en la materia. Las principales l\u00edneas de investigaci\u00f3n indican que la RSC sincera es un elemento clave en la construcci\u00f3n de la Reputaci\u00f3n; as\u00ed mismo, atrae y retiene el talento. Por \u00faltimo, se destaca la importancia las acciones de marketing dirigidas a informar sobre las RSC a los agentes de inter\u00e9s. Social responsibility; reputation; business; ethic; Responsabilidad social empresarial; reputaci\u00f3n; empresa; \u00e9tica Revista de Estudios Empresariales. Segunda \u00e9poca, ISSN 1988-9046, N\u00ba. 1, 2020, pags. 155-181 S\u00e1nchez Torn\u00e9, Isadora; Mor\u00e1n-\u00c1lvarez, Carlos; P\u00e9rez-L\u00f3pez, Jos\u00e9 A."},{"id":"55df3b94f75b3083cc095e373965514e50d3e341137e808041d3b5e885fb6e4a","content":"Discussions on Public Relations and Marketing: Trends in Spanish University Degrees. Comparative Study on Portugal, the US and the UK The following is a reflection on Spanish undergraduate studies that combine the concepts of marketing and public relations. Sharing origins and often functions and specialists, both concepts have run parallel paths that have merged on multiple occasions. This evolution has been studied from different points of view. Initially, marketing experts included PR techniques as an additional tool to grant it a greater specific instrumental relevance over time. On the other hand, PR scholars have tried to dissociate themselves from marketing in order acquire an independent position within the field of communication. In Spain, these conceptual differences are currently blurred due to the creation of new university degrees and double degrees combining both disciplines. This trend is evidenced within the Spanish university market which, throughout this article, will be compared to other markets, namely the American and the British ones, as a scientific reference for both concepts, and to the Portuguese one, given its geographical proximity. We will reflect on the reasons that have led the Spanish university market to combine both concepts and to offer official studies that include them in their nomenclature, far from the historical tradition in this country, where studies in public relations have been related to the field of communication, while those in marketing have been related to the field of economics. The identification of this trend in the job market of organisational communication professionals poses new challenges to training institutions, especially to universities. ; Presentamos una reflexi\u00f3n sobre los estudios universitarios espa\u00f1oles que combinan los conceptos de marketing y relaciones p\u00fablicas. Compartiendo or\u00edgenes y a menudo funciones y especialistas, ambos conceptos han recorrido caminos paralelos que se han fusionado en m\u00faltiples ocasiones. Esta evoluci\u00f3n ha sido estudiada desde diferentes puntos de vista. Inicialmente, los expertos en marketing incluyeron las t\u00e9cnicas de relaciones p\u00fablicas como una herramienta propia, pero \u00e9stas fueron alcanzando una mayor relevancia a lo largo del tiempo. Por otro lado, los estudiosos de las relaciones p\u00fablicas han tratado de disociarse del marketing para adquirir una posici\u00f3n independiente dentro del campo de la comunicaci\u00f3n. En Espa\u00f1a, estas diferencias conceptuales est\u00e1n actualmente desdibujadas debido a la creaci\u00f3n de nuevos t\u00edtulos universitarios y dobles t\u00edtulos que combinan ambas disciplinas. Esta tendencia se evidencia en el mercado universitario espa\u00f1ol que, a lo largo de este art\u00edculo, se comparar\u00e1 con otros mercados: el americano y el brit\u00e1nico, como referencia cient\u00edfica para ambos conceptos, y con el portugu\u00e9s, dada su proximidad geogr\u00e1fica. Reflexionaremos sobre las razones que han llevado al mercado universitario espa\u00f1ol a conjugar ambos conceptos y a ofrecer estudios oficiales que los incluyan en su nomenclatura, lejos de la tradici\u00f3n hist\u00f3rica de este pa\u00eds, donde los estudios de relaciones p\u00fablicas han estado relacionados con el campo de la comunicaci\u00f3n, mientras que los de marketing han estado relacionados con el campo de la econom\u00eda. La identificaci\u00f3n de esta tendencia en el mercado laboral de los profesionales de la comunicaci\u00f3n organizativa plantea nuevos retos a las instituciones de formaci\u00f3n, especialmente a las universidades. Marketing; Relaciones P\u00fablicas; Espa\u00f1a; Portugal; UK; USA; Public Relations; Spain Revista Internacional de Relaciones P\u00fablicas, ISSN 2174-3681, Vol. 10, N\u00ba. 19 (enero-junio), 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Relaciones P\u00fablicas en tiempos del confinamiento), pags. 157-178 Fern\u00e1ndez Souto, Ana Bel\u00e9n; V\u00e1zquez Gestal, Montserrat; R\u00faas Ara\u00fajo, Jos\u00e9"},{"id":"6e43ec0fbb12938530bce9ae611a981f68de7e40e4eed29b8f8734f1eff0ce68","content":"Proceso de comportamiento del consumidor Consumers are usually the decision-makers to accept or not what businesses offer. In this way, the survival of a company could depend on them. If companies develop marketing strategies without considering the consumer, they risk all their investment. Therefore, the objective of this article is to analyze the elements of the consumer behavior process. The theoretical review was the methodology used. The development section of this article includes external influences (marketing and sociocultural factors), psychological factors, recognition of a need, pre-purchase search, evaluation of alternatives, post-decision behavior, and post-purchase evaluation. The main conclusion extracted from this research is the need for companies to know consumer behavior needs, to achieve this goal, it is necessary to approximate from different points of view and areas of study, such as economic, psychological, sociological, and anthropological. ; Los consumidores suelen ser los decisores para aceptar o no los productos que ofertan las empresas. As\u00ed, la supervivencia misma de los negocios podr\u00eda depender de ellos. En consecuencia, si los ejecutivos desarrollan estrategias de marketing sin considerar al consumidor, arriesgan todo lo que han invertido. Por tanto, el objetivo de este art\u00edculo es describir los elementos del proceso de comportamiento del consumidor. La metodolog\u00eda utilizada fue la revisi\u00f3n te\u00f3rica. En la secci\u00f3n de desarrollo de este art\u00edculo se presenta las influencias externas (factores de marketing y socioculturales), factores psicol\u00f3gicos, reconocimiento de una necesidad, b\u00fasqueda previa a la compra, evaluaci\u00f3n de alternativas, comportamiento posterior a la decisi\u00f3n y evaluaci\u00f3n posterior a la compra. La principal conclusi\u00f3n que se extrae de esta investigaci\u00f3n es la necesidad de que las empresas conozcan las necesidades de comportamiento del consumidor, para lograr este objetivo es necesario aproximarse desde diferentes puntos de vista y \u00e1reas de estudio, como el econ\u00f3mico, el psicol\u00f3gico, el sociol\u00f3gico y el antropol\u00f3gico. comportamiento de decisi\u00f3n; consumidor; marketing; precompra; poscompra; consumer; decision-behavior; pre-purchase; post-purchase 593 Digital Publisher CEIT, ISSN 2588-0705, Vol. 5, N\u00ba. 6, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Administration (nov-dec)), pags. 105-116 Palacio Fierro, Andr\u00e9s"},{"id":"cf3e4e4e484b257d54671d342fef7e7a7c83f910fcfec572f2ac72a65db959ac","content":"Brand at a digital marketing system The subject of the research is the evolutionary development of the brand and the modern approach to its development in the world practice in the field of entertainment services. The purpose of this study is to analyze the historical formation of a brand, to successfully create its modern appearance, to identify the components of internal branding and to reflect the brand as an intangible asset of the enterprise. The urgency of the problem. One of the most important prerequisites for a successful business is the existence of a well\u2013established brand. Considerable attention was paid to the development of the brand in the marketing of enterprises by such scientists as D. Aaker, F. Kotler, and J. Myers. However, the processes of creating and developing brands in service companies, in particular entertainment, have certain characteristics. According to the World Entertainment and Media Industry Survey: 2018\u2013 2022 forecast, the fast\u2013paced evolution of the entertainment industry is now in a new dynamic phase. Against the backdrop of complex and steady but uneven growth, companies, without exception, face new challenges \u2013 building consumer relationships and the need to build trust, which is the actual definition of a competitive environment. It is on the analysis of these features and directed the study of the authors. Results of work. The interrelation of brand formation and its modern formation in the market of services, connection between brand strength and quality of management of the owner of the enterprise, as well as the issues of implementation of corporate ERP\u2013systems are investigated. Conclusions. The choice of conceptual model of the brand is becoming increasingly necessary in the conditions fierce competition. Management must be able to create both an internal and external image of the company. Implementation of ERP\u2013systems allows to raise to a new level a system of internal corporate governance and interaction with the environment. brand; ERP\u2013system; managerial innovation Market Relations Development in Ukraine \u211611(222)2019 135 81-86 CHUBUKOVA O.Y.; MATVIEIEV O.O."},{"id":"e28235c5c056afb6366c47089eeecb0b5587f7c7cd6205f955acf3a0c769a795","content":"Diagnosis of the System for Sharing Knowledge, Innovation and Digitalization in Agriculture (AKIS) in Bulgaria Unlike in many other countries, in Bulgaria there are no comprehensive analysis of the state and evolution of the system of knowledge sharing, innovation and digitalization in agriculture (AKIS). The goal of this paper is to fill the gap and analyze the state, efficiency and factors of the agricultural knowledge sharing, innovation and digitalization in Bulgaria at current stage of development. Analysis is based on 2019 expert assessment with 32 leading experts from research institutes of the Agricultural Academy, Bulgarian Academy of Sciences, agrarian and other universities, National Agricultural Advisory Service, and major professional associations of agricultural producers. The study has found out that AKIS of the country consists of diverse and numerous organizations, for which activities and complex relations have no sufficient official or other reliable information. The expert assessments in that study let us identify the state, and major achievements and challenges in development in of that complex system. The lack of data however, only partially can be compensated by experts\u2019 assessments of this type. It is also necessary to carry out in-depth and representative surveys of individual components and the AKIS as a whole. Furthermore, it is necessary to institutionalize and regulate collection of official statistical, report, etc. information for the state and efficiency of that important system. knowledge sharing; innovation; digitalization; agriculture; Management Journal of Integrated Marketing Communications and Digital Marketing 1(1) 1-17 Hrabrin Bachev"},{"id":"bc00718c759ec9aa8f6c99a96ae53952c8d35c08232e0238677abb40e6997272","content":"Management of the employer brand in the digital era: the case of call centers in Morocco Businesses increasingly rely on human capital as a sustainable competitive advantage in order to compete in an economy characterized by continuous turbulence. Based on HR marketing practices in the digital age, they continue their quest to attract, recruit and retain high-potential candidates capable of generating the desired competitive advantages. The objective of this research aims to understand how call centers in Morocco manage their employer brand via through social network sites (SNS) in order to attract potential candidates, retain recruits and limit turnover. To address this problem, a multiple case study was carried out with managers from four call centers. Employer brand management; Social Network Sites; Call centers; Turnover; e-Reputation International Journal of Business and Technology Studies And Research 1(3) 10 pages Zakaria LISSANEDDINE; Farid CHAOUKI; Florence RODHAIN"},{"id":"f94861bae5dba3c45c77d74eadb789cfc95bbadbff49832e11ab5e0c4b3eddaa","content":"Nuevas estrategias de contenidos en los medios de Puerto Rico. Estudios de casos ; New content strategies in the media of Puerto Rico. Case studies Este trabajo analiza c\u00f3mo han innovado en sus estrategias de contenidos los principales medios de comunicaci\u00f3n impresos en Puerto Rico, en sus plataformas digitales. Se pretende examinar la variedad de los productos digitales que ofrecen los medios (aplicaciones y p\u00e1ginas web) y estudiar su presencia en las redes sociales (Facebook y Twitter), utilizando para ello el an\u00e1lisis de contenido como instrumento de recogida de informaci\u00f3n. Entre las conclusiones destaca que los principales medios presentan poca variedad de contenido en sus versiones impresas y digitales, y en general, comparten la misma cobertura. Los formatos audiovisuales utilizados son simples y, en la mayor\u00eda de los casos, se limitan a publicar fotograf\u00edas y v\u00eddeos de las conferencias de prensa cubiertas por sus reporteros. ; This study analyses how the main print media in Puerto Rico have transformed their content strategies on their digital platforms. The aim of the study is to examine the different digital products offered by media companies (applications and websites) and to study their presence on social networks (Facebook and Twitter) using data collected through content analysis. The main media companies show little difference in content and coverage between their print and digital editions. The audiovisual formats used are simple and, in most cases, limited to photographs and videos of the press conferences covered by their reporters. digital; media; Puerto Rico; social media; apps; medios; redes sociales; aplicaciones Redmarka. Revista de Marketing Aplicado; v. 24 n. 1 (2020); 38-52 ; 1852-2300 ; 10.17979\/redma.2020.24.1 Vera Fern\u00e1ndez, Mar\u00eda; Paniagua-Rojano, Francisco Javier"},{"id":"b922cfaa053ce562888f7c9230d09124d7fd3d062af8c7431ff7090ec52ca07e","content":"La evoluci\u00f3n visual de los informativos de Telecinco entre 1990 y 2010. La transici\u00f3n hacia la era digital ; The visual evolution of Telecinco news, 1990-2010: The transition to the digital age Desde los inicios del medio audiovisual los informativos han sido espacios emblem\u00e1ticos para la conformaci\u00f3n de la opini\u00f3n ciudadana dentro de la televisi\u00f3n. La competencia propici\u00f3 que el modelo televisivo de los informativos se replantease acerc\u00e1ndose progresivamente al entretenimiento. Y es en este punto donde la parte visual y el contenido deben de ir de la mano para establecer una relaci\u00f3n de complementariedad. En esta investigaci\u00f3n se estudia la evoluci\u00f3n visual de los informativos de Telecinco teniendo en cuenta los principales aspectos de la identidad visual: identificaci\u00f3n, elementos de identidad y escenograf\u00eda y decorados. Del estudio se extrae como conclusi\u00f3n la evoluci\u00f3n de los espacios informativos hacia un modelo gr\u00e1fico e intuitivo, un producto mucho m\u00e1s \u00e1gil con informaciones segmentadas enlazadas por tem\u00e1tica, con el objetivo de ayudar a reducir la distancia entre emisor y receptor cambiando as\u00ed el modelo de negocio. ; Since the beginning of television, news programmes have been used to shape public opinion. Over time, increased competition has changed the model of television news by gradually bringing it closer to entertainment and increasing complementarity between content and visuals. This research analyses the visual evolution of the news on Spanish TV channel Telecinco, including sets and scenery, corporate image and identification. The findings confirm a change in the business model towards a more intuitive, visual style of news programmes with themed segments and a more agile product aimed at reducing the distance between broadcaster and audience. television news; television; visual language; branding; bussines model; informativos; televisi\u00f3n; lenguaje visual; modelo de negocio Redmarka. Revista de Marketing Aplicado; v. 24 n. 1 (2020); 83-105 ; 1852-2300 ; 10.17979\/redma.2020.24.1 Molares Cardoso, Julinda; Leger\u00e9n Lago, Beatriz; L\u00f3pez de Aguileta Clemente, Carmen"},{"id":"a559c06bc21037033f0e3570db7351b2b3b97263c65221bfbdd02bd8213cf0ad","content":"The Continuous Materiality of Blockchain Both cryptocurrency researchers and early adopters of cryptocurrencies agree that they possess a special kind of materiality, based on the laborious productive process of digital \u2018mining\u2019 [1]. This idea first appears in the Bitcoin White Paper [2] that encourages Bitcoin adopters to construct and justify its value in metaphoric comparison to gold mining. In this paper, I explore three material aspects of blockchain: physical infrastructure, human language and computer code. I apply the concept of 'continuous materiality' [3] to show how these three aspects interact in practical implementations of blockchain such as Bitcoin and Ethereum. I start from the concept of \u2018digital metallism\u2019 that stands for \u2018fundamental value\u2019 of cryptocurrencies, and end with the move of Ethereum to \u2018proof-of-stake\u2019, partially as a countermeasure against \u2018evil miners\u2019. I conclude that ignoring material aspects of blockchain technology can only further problematize complicated relations between their technical, semiotic and social materiality. Faktor-faktor apa sajakah yang menghambat penerapan Marketing 4.0 sebagai media pemasaran digital dalam mempromosikan Politeknik Negeri Sriwijaya?. Model yang digunakan untuk penelitian ini adalah menggunakan persentase dari jawaban responden. Untuk melihat persentasi dari jawaban responden terhadap pertanyaan-pertanyaan yang ada pada kuesioner maka digunakan rumus Indeks Skor (IS). Analisis data digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah dengan cara mengumpulkan data-data yang kemudian diolah dengan menggunakan analisis kuantitatif, analisis kualitatif dan analisis komparatif. Kesimpulan dari penelitian ini adalah Politeknik Negeri Sriwijaya dalam menerapkan Marketing 4.0 berdasarkan penilaian dari para siswa SMAN 8, SMAN 4, SMAN 2 menyatakan bahwa semua pernyataan mendapatkan nilai rata-rata di atas 80% dan termasuk dalam kategori interprestasi skor (IS) \u201cSangat Kuat\u201d. Penilaian berbeda yang diberikan oleh para siswa dari SMAN 1 Palembang yang memberikan nilai rata-rata 70% dan termasuk dalam kategori interprestasi skor (IS) = \u201cKuat\u201d. Faktor-faktor yang dapat menghambat penerapan Marketing 4.0 sebagai media pemasaran digital dalam mempromosikan Politeknik Negeri Sriwijaya adalah sarana dan prasarana yang belum memadai seperti seringkali web site Polsri tidak berfungsi dengan baik (down) apalagi bila grafik penggunaannya meningkat. Marketing 4.0; promosi pemasaran JURNAL RISET TERAPAN AKUNTANSI; Vol 4, No 1 (2020): JURNAL RISET TERAPAN AKUNTANSI; 96-104 Ummasyroh, Ummasyroh; Firdaus, Yusnizal; Andriyani, Titi"},{"id":"b9458cf22c72b86cc73f569af209540c31e5677a6ef6b0fb4b9d7a5ce4062e5b","content":"Knowledge and Attitude\u2019s Men in Family Planning with Stop Motion Video Design in Tasikmalaya District Indonesia is facing problems with the quantity and quality of human resources. One of the controls on this population is the family planning program. Currently, implementation of development-oriented to justice and gender equality in Indonesia has been implemented, it needs efforts to increase men's participation in family planning, namely by promoting media using digital marketing, one of which is by stop motion animation video media. The purpose of this study is to know the differences in knowledge and attitudes of men\/husbands about male contraception in family planning before and after the screening of stop motion videos and to know the picture of male participation in family planning. The research method used was Pre-Experimental with one group pre-test and post-test design. The statistical test used is Wilcoxon. Based on data in Tasikmalaya in 2017 the coverage of contraceptive use from 8589 active acceptors there were 134 condom users (1.56%) and 10 MOP (0.11%) while in 2018 the contraceptive use coverage of 9376 active acceptors contained users 134 condoms (0.014%) and MOP 14 people (0.10%) the data shows that although there was an increase in the number of active family planning acceptors which was 0.22%, the number of male acceptor users decreased including 0.01% MOP and condom 1,54%. An increase in average knowledge after video viewing to 72.42 with an increase of 16.08 for knowledge and attitude variables to become 33.77 with an increase of 1.65 it illustrates the use of video stop motion media effective in increasing male knowledge. stop motion video; male participation; knowledge; attitudes; family planning JURNAL KEBIDANAN; Vol 10, No 1 (2020): April 2020; 54-59 ; 2621-2870 ; 2089-7669 Apriasih, Hapi; Danefi, Tupriliany"},{"id":"549e99309c4e99d1d54b818bbe1a2bb1d5a5ac513de62f4cca0dc6ccefee9777","content":"Evaluation of drug advertising in the main television, radio, and written media in Costa Rica ; Evaluaci\u00f3n de la publicidad de medicamentos en los principales medios televisivos, radiof\u00f3nicos y escritos en Costa Rica This research evaluated drug advertising in the main television, radio, and written media in Costa Rica to find out the information that is transmitted to the consumer. The media are interesting objects of study because they are used by industries as a tool to reach the consumer. This is an observational, descriptive cross-sectional study, a survey was conducted of the student population of the Universidad Latina de Costa Rica and with it an observation was made of the advertising patterns on radio, newspapers, and television at different times. The investigation determined that most of the advertisements found in the different media lacked certain provisions requested by the regulation. The faults found were product composition (active ingredients), manufacturer, product category, available presentations. Regulations in the promotion part of a drug have been shown to be of great importance to protect consumers, because the profits of the pharmaceutical industries depend largely on their marketing. The promotion of products seeks to increase profits, however, if this is not done correctly there could be a misuse of medications. ; La presente investigaci\u00f3n evalu\u00f3 la publicidad de medicamentos en los principales medios televisivos, radiof\u00f3nicos y escritos en Costa Rica para conocer la informaci\u00f3n que se transmite al consumidor. Los medios de comunicaci\u00f3n son interesantes objetos de estudios porque son usados por las industrias como una herramienta para poder llegar al consumidor. Este es un estudio observacional, descriptivo de tipo transversal, se realiz\u00f3 una encuesta a la poblaci\u00f3n estudiantil de la Universidad Latina de Costa Rica y con la misma se hizo una observaci\u00f3n de las pautas publicitarias en la radio, peri\u00f3dicos y la televisi\u00f3n en diferentes horarios. En la investigaci\u00f3n se determin\u00f3 que la mayor\u00eda de los anuncios encontrados en los diferentes medios de comunicaci\u00f3n carecieron de ciertas disposiciones solicitadas por el reglamento. Las faltas que se encontraron fueron: composici\u00f3n del producto (principios activos), casa fabricante, categor\u00eda del producto, presentaciones disponibles. Se demostr\u00f3 que las regulaciones en la parte de la promoci\u00f3n de un medicamento son de gran importancia para poder proteger a los consumidores, porque las ganancias de las industrias farmac\u00e9uticas dependen en gran medida de su mercadotecnia. La promoci\u00f3n de productos busca aumentar las ganancias, sin embargo, si esto no se hace correctamente podr\u00eda haber una mala utilizaci\u00f3n de los medicamentos. Advertising; medications; regulations; media; Publicidad; medicamentos; reglamento; medios de comunicaci\u00f3n Revista Colombiana de Ciencias Qu\u00edmico-Farmac\u00e9uticas; Vol. 49, N\u00fam. 2 (2020) ; 1909-6356 ; 0034-7418 Corrales-Cubillo, Yenifer; Sabor\u00edo-Quesada, Nathalie; Alfaro-Mora, Rams\u00e9s"},{"id":"1f871563ea12656dd0448c9fecb1c1944264ebeee23b41a1ff7c63748bfdc7cf","content":"Study of qualitative seismic vulnerability in armed concrete educational institutions in the Falc\u00f3n State ; Estudio de la vulnerabilidad s\u00edsmica cualitativa en instituciones escolares de concreto armado del Estado Falc\u00f3n The methodology for calculating the Prioritization Index for the Management of Seismic Risk in existing Buildings, came out as a result of the poor performance of structures that during the Cariaco 1997 earthquake, and the 1967 Caracas earthquake where the buildings collapsed, despite their apparent good state of conservation. In the case of four structures analyzed in this research, the Agust\u00edn Ocando Prosper School, the Agua Salobre Basic Bolivarian School, the Agust\u00edn Ocando Prosperous High School, and the Las Delicias Initial Education Center, these reinforced concrete buildings are located in the coastal zone of the Falc\u00f3n State, in Venezuela, under the influence of the aggressive marine environment, and in the presence of the San Sebastian tectonic fault. The evaluation was carried out by applying the qualitative method of the Priority Index for Seismic Risk Management, verifying that the structures of the Agust\u00edn Ocando Prosperous School have a medium to high average vulnerability, however it is recommended to conduct detailed studies in modules 1 and 2 that have a very high frequency rating. For the Agua Salobre Bolivarian Basic School, the vulnerability index, corresponding to module 1, is medium high and the other group its classification is medium low; in Liceo Pr\u00f3spero Agust\u00edn Ocando modules 1 and 3 have a medium-high risk index and modules 1 and 3 are high. The Center of Initial Education Las Delicias, has the average risk index medium to low ; La metodolog\u00eda para el c\u00e1lculo del \u00cdndice de Priorizaci\u00f3n para la Gesti\u00f3n de Riesgo S\u00edsmico en Edificaciones existentes, surge debido al inadecuado desempe\u00f1o de estructuras que durante el sismo de Cariaco 1997, y el sismo de Caracas 1967 donde las edificaciones colapsaron, a pesar de su aparente buen estado de conservaci\u00f3n. En el caso de cuatro estructuras analizadas en esta investigaci\u00f3n la Escuela Pr\u00f3spero Agust\u00edn Ocando, la Escuela B\u00e1sica Bolivariana Agua Salobre, el Liceo Pr\u00f3spero Agust\u00edn Ocando, y el Centro de Educaci\u00f3n Inicial Las Delicias, las edificaciones de concreto armado se encuentran en la zona costera del Estado Falc\u00f3n, en Venezuela, est\u00e1n bajo la incidencia del ambiente marino agresivo, y en presencia de la falla tect\u00f3nica de San Sebasti\u00e1n. La evaluaci\u00f3n se realiz\u00f3 aplicando el m\u00e9todo cualitativo del \u00cdndice de Priorizaci\u00f3n para la Gesti\u00f3n de Riesgo S\u00edsmico, verific\u00e1ndose que las estructuras de la Escuela Pr\u00f3spero Agust\u00edn Ocando cuentan con un promedio de vulnerabilidad media alta, sin embargo se recomienda realizar estudios detallados en los m\u00f3dulos 1 y 2 que poseen una calificaci\u00f3n de vulnerabilidad muy elevada. Para la Escuela B\u00e1sica Bolivariana Agua Salobre el \u00edndice de vulnerabilidad, correspondiente al m\u00f3dulo 1, es media alta y el otro grupo su clasificaci\u00f3n es media baja; en Liceo Pr\u00f3spero Agust\u00edn Ocando los m\u00f3dulos 1 y 3 tiene \u00edndice de riesgo medio alto y los m\u00f3dulos 1 y 3 elevado. El Centro de Educaci\u00f3n Inicial Las Delicias, tiene el \u00edndice de riesgo y vulnerabilidad medio bajo  Gaceta T\u00e9cnica; Vol 21 No 1 (2020): January-June; 64-75 ; Gaceta T\u00e9cnica; Vol. 21 N\u00fam. 1 (2020): Enero-Junio; 64-75 ; Gaceta T\u00e9cnica; v. 21 n. 1 (2020): Enero-Junio; 64-75 ; 2477-9539 Gim\u00e9nez, Alejandro; Olavarrieta, Mar\u00eda Alice; Acero, Ana; Chong, Francisco; Ramones, Karelia; Reinoza, Luis"},{"id":"e6f9bf1eeccff37097c1c6416289a1199b4fd52de4f72bb1799c7d42f25ae47a","content":"STRATEGI PEMASARAN DIGITAL PADA PRODUK TEMPE, KOTA SURABAYA Tempe is a traditional Indonesian food consumed by almost all levels of society. The problem experienced in marketing this product is perishable. This study aims to identify the internal and external factors of marketing tempe producers and evaluate alternative strategies for digital marketing. The method of determining the sample is purposive sampling with 40 respondents. Methods of data analysis using IE analysis, SWOT analysis, and QSPM analysis. The results show in the IE analysis, the position of the company that produces tempe is in quadrant 2 with the use of a marketing system horizontally. The SWOT analysis explains that tempe is located in quadrant 1 with the use of the power possessed to achieve marketing opportunities. QSPM analysis, the highest TAS result is an alternative strategy in the form of consumer convenience in ordering tempe through social media. DOI : https:\/\/doi.org\/10.33005\/adv.v8i2.1843 Digital Marketing Strategy; direct selling; modern selling Berkala Ilmiah AGRIDEVINA; Vol 8, No 2 (2019): Berkala Ilmiah Agribisnis Agridevina; 127- 134 Uula, Prameswari Maulidatul; Indah, Pawana Nur; abidin, Zainal"},{"id":"9356461dbe82c077356390db68a81c9b0d8deb654e45a05a2fb56e677abca91f","content":"El marketing educativo como estrategia para la satisfacci\u00f3n de alumnos universitarios ; Educational Marketing as a Strategy for the Satisfaction of University Students Las instituciones de educaci\u00f3n superior se enfocan en la captaci\u00f3n de alumnado, as\u00ed como de su fidelizaci\u00f3n a la instituci\u00f3n, esto se logra mediante la satisfacci\u00f3n en el estudiante. El objetivo de esta investigaci\u00f3n fue analizar el marketing educativo como estrategia de satisfacci\u00f3n de los alumnos de la Universidad Polit\u00e9cnica de Francisco I, Madero (UPFIN). El estudio tiene un enfoque cuantitativo de tipo descriptiva, se aplic\u00f3 a una muestra de 361 estudiantes de la UPFIN y algunos resultados fueron que para lograr la satisfacci\u00f3n del educando intervienen variables como: los v\u00eddeos de ense\u00f1anza, servicio de biblioteca digital, vinculaci\u00f3n con microempresas, clases extras para los que reprueban, horas extras de ense\u00f1anza de segundo idioma, orientaci\u00f3n psicol\u00f3gica y social, gu\u00eda de estudios para presentar ex\u00e1menes, salones y laboratorios en buenas condiciones, plan acorde a la carrera, congresos y simposium en diferentes carreras, involucramiento de estudiantes en proyectos de investigaci\u00f3n, trato amable de los administrativos, becas para pasajes de alumnos, demostraciones y capacitaciones con microempresarios y p\u00fablico en general de lo que se realiza en la universidad. ; In a globalized and competitive world, the need for the Higher Education Institutions to have a competitive advantage and exceed the expectations of the learners becomes more and more imperative, although the fundamental part of the Institutions is also true in addition to capturing enrollment is to retain it. and to retain it, and to achieve the above, it requires student satisfaction, so the objective of this research was to propose educational marketing as a strategy for student satisfaction at the Polytechnic University of Francisco I, Madero (UPFIN). The study has a quantitative approach of a descriptive type, it was applied to a sample of 361 UPFIN students and some results were that in order to achieve student satisfaction, variables such as: teaching videos, digital library service, linkage with microenterprises, extra classes for those who fail, overtime teaching second language, psychological and social guidance, study guide to present exams, classrooms and laboratories in good condition, plan according to the race, congresses and symposium in different careers, student involvement in research projects, friendly treatment of administrative staff, scholarships for student tickets, demonstrations and training with microentrepreneurs and the general public of what is done in the university. Marketing educativo; Satisfacci\u00f3n; Estrategia; Educational Marketing; Satisfaction; Strategy Prop\u00f3sitos y Representaciones.
